title: 俄前防長紹伊古會金正恩 強調永久雙邊關係
summary: 俄羅斯前防長、現任聯邦安全會議秘書紹伊古（Sergei Shoigu）週五（13）訪問北韓平壤，並會見了北韓領導人金正恩，預計本次會談將為落實全面戰略夥伴條約做出重要貢獻。 🚨Update: Russian General Shoigu is in Pyongyang today, meeting Kim Jong-un! - Russian Security Council pic.twitte...
text: 俄羅斯前防長、現任聯邦安全會議秘書紹伊古（Sergei Shoigu）週五（13）訪問北韓平壤，並會見了北韓領導人金正恩，預計本次會談將為落實全面戰略夥伴條約做出重要貢獻。 🚨Update: Russian General Shoigu is in Pyongyang today, meeting Kim Jong-un! - Russian Security Council pic.twitter.com/iTc04WRZhp — US Civil Defense News (@CaptCoronado) September 13, 2024 綜合《韓聯社》、《NHK》13日報導，本次會晤引發外界關注，因為目前有關北韓與俄羅斯武器交易的疑慮正在升溫。根據俄羅斯聯邦安全會議的說法，紹伊古與金正恩的會談是基於今年6月兩國領導人達成共識的基礎上進行的，氣氛友好且具高度信任。 此次會晤預計將推動北韓與俄羅斯之間的全面戰略合作夥伴關係。該條約於6月簽署，但尚未在兩國國會通過。隨著金正恩可能受邀訪問莫斯科，外界猜測此次訪問或將討論具體行程。紹伊古先前曾於2022年7月以俄羅斯國防部長的身份訪問北韓，並與金正恩會晤。此後，俄羅斯高層人士多次訪問北韓。 日本《NHK》報導指出，同樣在週五，北韓外交部副部長發表聲明，紀念金正恩和普丁在俄羅斯遠東航太中心舉行峰會一週年。聲明稱，北韓致力於與其戰略夥伴俄羅斯合作並永久發展雙邊關係。 美國聲稱，平壤正在向俄羅斯提供彈藥和其他軍事物資，用於莫斯科入侵烏克蘭，作為回報，平壤正在尋求軍事技術和能源的援助。 美國防部監察報告：軍援台灣彈藥「1983年產」 防彈背心發霉
translated_summary: Former Russian Defense Minister and current Secretary of the Federal Security Council Sergei Shoigu visited Pyongyang, North Korea on Friday (13) and met with North Korean leader Kim Jong-un. It is expected that this meeting will make an important contribution to the implementation of the Comprehensive Strategic Partnership Treaty. 🚨Update: Russian General Shoigu is in Pyongyang today, meeting Kim Jong-un! - Russian Security Council pic.twitter.com/iTc04WRZhp — US Civil Defense News (@CaptCoronado) September 13, 2024 According to reports from Yonhap News Agency and NHK on the 13th, this meeting has attracted attention from the outside world because concerns about arms trade between North Korea and Russia are currently heating up. According to the Russian Federation Security Council, the talks between Shoigu and Kim Jong-un were based on the consensus reached by the leaders of the two countries in June this year, and the atmosphere was friendly and trusting. The meeting is expected to promote the comprehensive strategic partnership between North Korea and Russia. The treaty was signed in June but has not yet been passed by the parliaments of the two countries. With Kim Jong-un likely to be invited to visit Moscow, it is speculated that the specific itinerary may be discussed during this visit. Shoigu previously visited North Korea in July 2022 as the Russian Defense Minister and met with Kim Jong-un. Since then, senior Russian officials have visited North Korea many times. Japan's NHK reported that also on Friday, North Korea's deputy foreign minister issued a statement to mark the first anniversary of the summit between Kim Jong-un and Putin at Russia's Far East Space Center. The statement said that North Korea is committed to cooperating with its strategic partner Russia and permanently developing bilateral relations. The United States claims that Pyongyang is providing Russia with ammunition and other military supplies for Moscow's invasion of Ukraine, and in return, Pyongyang is seeking military technology and energy assistance. U.S. Department of Defense surveillance report: Military aid to Taiwan ammunition "produced in 1983" bulletproof vests moldy

title: 朝鲜76年国庆 与北京关系降温得到证实
summary: 朝鲜今天周一庆祝建国 76 周年，放烟花，向朝鲜领导人金正恩的祖父金日成和父亲金正日致敬，但是没有举行阅兵和游行等盛大庆祝活动。 平壤的传统盟友，北京，莫斯科和古巴向金正恩发出贺电引人关注。 习近平的这封贺信不仅没有表明两个盟国之间的关系达到了历史最高点，反而证实了两国关系的降温，这与平壤和莫斯科的升温形成了鲜明对比。 金正恩和普京在不到一年的时间里会晤了两次，而同期习近平只向平壤发出了两封贺信。...
text: 朝鲜今天周一庆祝建国 76 周年，放烟花，向朝鲜领导人金正恩的祖父金日成和父亲金正日致敬，但是没有举行阅兵和游行等盛大庆祝活动。 平壤的传统盟友，北京，莫斯科和古巴向金正恩发出贺电引人关注。 习近平的这封贺信不仅没有表明两个盟国之间的关系达到了历史最高点，反而证实了两国关系的降温，这与平壤和莫斯科的升温形成了鲜明对比。 金正恩和普京在不到一年的时间里会晤了两次，而同期习近平只向平壤发出了两封贺信。一次是在新年前夕，另一次是在今天9 月 9 日朝鲜建国纪念日。朝鲜领导人与中国国家主席的最后一次会晤是在 2019 年。 习近平给金正恩发出的本次贺电中提及两国友谊的内容少于 2023 年为同一纪念日发出的贺电，去年习近平强调了两国领导人会晤的 '重要性'。 尽管朝中两国将于今年 10 月 6 日庆祝建交 76 周年，但本次中方发出的贺信中却没有涉及该内容。 据朝鲜官方通讯社朝中社报道，习近平在信中简单地强调："我们将加强与朝方的战略沟通与合作，巩固和进一步发展两国友好关系。' 这与普京贺电中表示的热情形成鲜明对比。俄罗斯总统在 9 月 7 日就发出的贺电中表示，他对加强两国关系充满信心，并强调了莫斯科与平壤之间的 '高水平 '关系，而且两国将继续 '逐步加强俄罗斯和朝鲜之间的全面战略伙伴关系'。
translated_summary:
North Korea celebrated its 76th anniversary today on Monday, setting off fireworks to pay tribute to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un's grandfather Kim Il Sung and father Kim Jong Il, but held no grand celebrations such as military parades and parades.
 Pyongyang's traditional allies, Beijing, Moscow and Cuba, sent congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un that attracted attention.
 Xi Jinping's congratulatory letter not only did not indicate that relations between the two allies have reached an all-time high, but confirmed the cooling of relations between the two countries, which is in sharp contrast to the warming of Pyongyang and Moscow.
 Kim Jong Un and Putin met twice in less than a year, while Xi Jinping sent only two congratulatory letters to Pyongyang during the same period. One is on New Year's Eve, and the other is today, September 9, the anniversary of the founding of North Korea. The last meeting between North Korean leaders and the Chinese president was in 2019.
 Xi Jinping's congratulatory message to Kim Jong-un mentioned less about the friendship between the two countries than the congratulatory message sent for the same anniversary in 2023. Last year, Xi Jinping emphasized the 'importance' of the meeting between the two leaders.
 Although North Korea and China will celebrate the 76th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations on October 6 this year, this content is not covered in the congratulatory letter sent by China.
 According to North Korea's official news agency KCNA, Xi Jinping simply emphasized in the letter: "We will strengthen strategic communication and cooperation with North Korea and consolidate and further develop friendly relations between the two countries."'
 This is in sharp contrast to the enthusiasm expressed in Putin's congratulatory message. In a congratulatory message on September 7, the Russian president expressed his confidence in strengthening relations between the two countries and emphasized the 'high level' of relations between Moscow and Pyongyang, and that the two countries will continue to 'gradually strengthen relations between Russia and North Korea' comprehensive strategic partnership'.

title: 南韓媒：金正恩稱陸為「宿敵」
summary: 南韓中央日報廿日獨家報導，北韓國家領導人金正恩據稱將中國大陸定為「宿敵」。 據報導，大陸與北韓最近似乎出現了不尋常的跡象。多名北韓消息人士前一天表示，金正恩據了解「最近將加大對北（韓）施壓力道的中國稱為『宿敵』」，此前也曾於七月向駐陸外交官下了「不要看中國臉色」的指示，前述發言的意圖似乎跟當時的指示類似。 南韓中央日報指出，金正恩的發言在北韓勞動黨和人民軍組織內部進行系統性傳播，發揮了一種行動方針...
text: 南韓中央日報廿日獨家報導，北韓國家領導人金正恩據稱將中國大陸定為「宿敵」。 據報導，大陸與北韓最近似乎出現了不尋常的跡象。多名北韓消息人士前一天表示，金正恩據了解「最近將加大對北（韓）施壓力道的中國稱為『宿敵』」，此前也曾於七月向駐陸外交官下了「不要看中國臉色」的指示，前述發言的意圖似乎跟當時的指示類似。 南韓中央日報指出，金正恩的發言在北韓勞動黨和人民軍組織內部進行系統性傳播，發揮了一種行動方針的作用，此次講話的具體背景和對象尚未獲得確認，但有可能是出自平壤對北京的抗議。據指陸方最近強化管制對北韓的走私行為，甚至扣押了金正恩使用的「一號物品」後拒絕返還。 根據報導，北韓近期實際上毫不掩飾對陸方的不滿，甚至未派外交使節參加主要國家都有出席的大陸官方慶祝活動。一位消息人士表示，大陸國防部七月卅一日在北京人民大會堂舉行了人民解放軍建軍九十七周年招待會，但駐中北韓武官並未出席。 北京據報向北韓在內的所有駐在外國武官發出邀請函，南韓也獲得邀請，作為陸方血盟的北韓卻沒派代表與會。另一位消息人士表示，確認過北韓使館人員不僅沒在大陸境內的解放軍建軍招待會現身，也不參加海外多個陸方使館舉行的紀念活動。 金正恩過去也曾將大陸稱為「宿敵」，曾任南韓國情院第一與第三次長的峨山政策研究院客座研究委員韓基範三月發表報告指出，金正恩曾在二○一五年初表示，美國和日本是百年宿敵，但大陸是五千年的宿敵。 韓基範稱，大陸國家主席習近平上台後，在訪問北韓前，先於二○一四年七月赴南韓國是訪問，金正恩認為此舉是一種「背叛行為」。
translated_summary: South Korea's JoongAng Ilbo exclusively reported on the 20th that North Korean leader Kim Jong-un is said to have designated China as an "old enemy". According to the report, there seem to be unusual signs between China and North Korea recently. Several North Korean sources said the day before that Kim Jong-un is understood to have "recently called China, which has increased pressure on North Korea, an 'old enemy'". He had previously instructed mainland diplomats in July not to "look at China's face", and the intention of the above remarks seems to be similar to the instructions at that time. South Korea's JoongAng Ilbo pointed out that Kim Jong-un's speech was systematically disseminated within the North Korean Workers' Party and the People's Army organizations, playing the role of a policy of action. The specific background and target of this speech have not been confirmed, but it is possible that it was a protest from Pyongyang against Beijing. It is said that the Chinese side has recently strengthened the control of smuggling into North Korea, and even seized the "No. 1 item" used by Kim Jong-un and refused to return it. According to reports, North Korea has actually made no secret of its dissatisfaction with the Chinese side recently, and even did not send diplomatic envoys to participate in the official celebration activities of the Chinese side attended by major countries. A source said that the Chinese Ministry of National Defense held a reception for the 97th anniversary of the founding of the People's Liberation Army at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on July 31, but the North Korean military attaché stationed in China did not attend. Beijing reportedly sent invitations to all military attachés stationed abroad, including North Korea. South Korea was also invited, but North Korea, as a blood ally of the mainland, did not send representatives to attend. Another source said that it was confirmed that North Korean embassy personnel not only did not appear at the PLA’s army-building reception in mainland China, but also did not participate in commemorative activities held by many mainland embassies overseas. Kim Jong-un has also called China an "old enemy" in the past. Han Ki-hwan, a visiting research fellow at the Asan Institute for Policy Studies who served as the first and third directors of South Korea's National Intelligence Service, published a report in March pointing out that Kim Jong-un said in early 2015 that the United States and Japan are century-old enemies, but China is a 5,000-year-old enemy. Han Ki-hwan said that after Chinese President Xi Jinping came to power, he visited South Korea in July 2014 before visiting North Korea. Kim Jong-un considered this move to be an "act of betrayal."

title: 北韓不演了！金正恩再批中方「宿敵」 這大場面0出席
summary: 北韓領導人金正恩去（2023）年訪問俄羅斯會見俄國總統普丁，普丁今年6月回訪平壤並與北韓簽署《全面戰略夥伴協議》。2022年喊出與俄羅斯邦誼「無止境、無上限」的中國大陸對此默不作聲，但近期小動作頻頻。南韓媒體周五（20日）報導，金正恩7月底不僅未派代表出席中共解放軍建軍紀念活動，更定調稱中方為「宿敵」。金正恩早在2015年就以這個名詞怒批北京，近日舊話重提，可見兩國關係降溫明顯。 南韓《中央日報》...
text: 北韓領導人金正恩去（2023）年訪問俄羅斯會見俄國總統普丁，普丁今年6月回訪平壤並與北韓簽署《全面戰略夥伴協議》。2022年喊出與俄羅斯邦誼「無止境、無上限」的中國大陸對此默不作聲，但近期小動作頻頻。南韓媒體周五（20日）報導，金正恩7月底不僅未派代表出席中共解放軍建軍紀念活動，更定調稱中方為「宿敵」。金正恩早在2015年就以這個名詞怒批北京，近日舊話重提，可見兩國關係降溫明顯。 南韓《中央日報》周五獨家報導，多名北韓消息人士透露，據悉領導人金正恩對於向平壤增加施壓力道的中方，以「宿敵」二字稱之。上述這番發言的背景與對象未明，有可能源於北韓對中方的極度不滿。近來中方加強管制北韓走私行為，就連金正恩本人使用的物品也予以扣押，北韓要求返還遭中方拒絕。中方還陸續遣返境內北韓勞工。 金正恩去年搭乘專列火車訪問俄羅斯遠東地區，普丁從莫斯科飛去東方太空發射場相迎會談，這是金正恩2011年上台以來首度訪俄。今年5月北京「普習會」的主舞台一帶一路高峰論壇，中國國家主席習近平未再提中俄友好「無上限」。6月普丁快閃平壤，兩人共乘豪車輪流駕駛上演「溫馨兄弟情」，雙方簽署《全面戰略夥伴協議》結盟，也是普丁24年來首度訪問北韓的重大成果。 「不必看中國臉色」 金正恩身兼北韓國務委員會委員長，重大談話在黨政體系具有行動方針的位階，平壤近期毫不掩飾對於中方諸多不滿。今年7月31日在北京舉行的人民解放軍建軍97周年接待會，駐華北韓武官並未到場，同一天還傳出金正恩下令要求北韓駐華外交人員「不必看中國臉色」指令。《中央日報》引述知情人士19日說法指，中方已向北韓、南韓與所有駐華使館的武官發送建軍紀念活動邀請函，北韓卻未派代表出席；另一消息人士說，就連海外的中國大使館舉行的建軍紀念活動，北韓也未派員參加。8月， 平壤下令全國禁看中國電影與電視劇 ，與中國歷史有關的影音也禁播。 「5000年宿敵」 金正恩不是第一次以「宿敵」稱呼中方。曾在南韓國家情報院擔任次長的峨山政策研究院客座研究委員韓基範今年3月發布報告稱，金正恩2015年說，美國與日本是百年宿敵，但中國是北韓「5000年宿敵」，還強調「沒有中國也能生存下去」、「哪怕是小事也不必讓步」。韓基範分析，2013年上台的習近平2014年出訪未選擇北韓卻去了南韓，這讓金正恩有「背叛」之感，畢竟此前中方與北韓長期友好。 平壤與莫斯科幾十年來並未優先維護雙邊關係，普丁與金正恩友好代表俄國對北韓政策明顯轉變。英國廣播公司（BBC）中國特派員比克（ Laura Bicker）今年7月分析俄、中、北韓3角關係指，普丁早年與西方交好時期曾2度制裁北韓，甚至與美、中、日、南韓一同勸說北韓放棄核武計畫。金正恩2018年出席峰會時刻意與南韓時任總統文在寅互動，當時金正恩只與普丁見過一面。金正恩甚至三度與時任美國總統川普會面，川普是他會見的第一位國際領導人。 北韓換了「老大哥」 總部位於美國華府的智庫「軍備管制與禁止核武擴散中心」（Center for Arms Control and Non-Proliferation）今年7月分析，中方並不看好普丁協助金正恩的核武野心，北京的沉默充分說明對於平壤與莫斯科關係大幅升溫的不滿態度。普丁在俄烏戰場獲北韓軍援，金正恩則可能透過貿易轉移部份資金以躲避國際嚴厲制裁，北韓核武測試屢次失敗，有可能向莫斯科求助，雙方恢復軍事關係對於東北亞、太平洋區域安全可能產生重大影響。北韓的「老大哥」以從中國換成了俄羅斯，莫斯科比北京更具有對平壤的影響力，然而這兩個政權同樣以信用不佳出名，新的「兄弟情」能維繫多久有待觀察。
translated_summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un visited Russia last year (2023) to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin. Putin returned to Pyongyang in June this year and signed the Comprehensive Strategic Partnership Agreement with North Korea. China, which declared in 2022 that its friendship with Russia is "endless and unlimited", has remained silent on this, but has made small moves recently. South Korean media reported on Friday (20th) that Kim Jong-un not only did not send representatives to attend the founding ceremony of the Chinese People's Liberation Army at the end of July, but also called China an "old enemy". Kim Jong-un criticized Beijing with this term as early as 2015, and the recent reiteration of the old words shows that the relationship between the two countries has cooled significantly. South Korea's JoongAng Ilbo exclusively reported on Friday that multiple North Korean sources revealed that leader Kim Jong-un reportedly called China, which has increased pressure on Pyongyang, an "old enemy." The background and target of the above remarks are unclear, but it may be due to North Korea's extreme dissatisfaction with China. Recently, China has strengthened its control over North Korean smuggling activities, and even seized items used by Kim Jong-un himself. North Korea's request for return was rejected by China. China has also continued to repatriate North Korean workers in the country. Kim Jong-un took a special train to visit Russia's Far East last year. Putin flew from Moscow to the Eastern Space Launch Center to meet him for talks. This was Kim Jong-un's first visit to Russia since he came to power in 2011. In May this year, at the Belt and Road Summit Forum held on the main stage of the Beijing "Putin Conference", Chinese President Xi Jinping did not mention the "unlimited" friendship between China and Russia. In June, Putin made a flash trip to Pyongyang, and the two took turns driving in a luxury car to show their "warm brotherhood". The two sides signed the "Comprehensive Strategic Partnership Agreement" to form an alliance, which was also a major achievement of Putin's first visit to North Korea in 24 years. "No need to look at China's face" Kim Jong-un is also the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of North Korea. Major talks have the status of action guidelines in the party-state system. Pyongyang has recently made no secret of its many dissatisfactions with China. On July 31 this year, the People's Liberation Army held a reception in Beijing to celebrate the 97th anniversary of its founding. The North Korean military attachés stationed in China did not attend. On the same day, it was reported that Kim Jong-un ordered North Korean diplomats stationed in China to "not look at China's face." The JoongAng Ilbo quoted an informed source on the 19th saying that China had sent invitations to military attachés in North Korea, South Korea and all embassies in China to celebrate the founding of the army, but North Korea did not send representatives to attend. Another source said that even the celebrations held by Chinese embassies overseas to celebrate the founding of the army were not attended by North Korea. In August, Pyongyang ordered a nationwide ban on watching Chinese movies and TV series, and also banned videos and audios related to Chinese history. "5,000-year-old enemy" This is not the first time Kim Jong-un has called China an "old enemy." Han Ki-beom, a visiting research fellow at the Asan Institute for Policy Studies who once served as deputy director of the South Korean National Intelligence Service, released a report in March this year saying that Kim Jong-un said in 2015 that the United States and Japan are century-old enemies, but China is North Korea's "5,000-year-old enemy," and also emphasized that "we can survive without China" and "there is no need to give in even on small matters." Han Ki-beom analyzed that Xi Jinping, who came to power in 2013, did not choose North Korea for his visit in 2014 but went to South Korea, which made Kim Jong-un feel "betrayed," after all, China and North Korea had long been friendly. Pyongyang and Moscow have not prioritized maintaining bilateral relations for decades, and Putin's friendship with Kim Jong-un represents a clear change in Russia's policy toward North Korea. In July this year, Laura Bicker, a China correspondent for the BBC, analyzed the triangular relationship between Russia, China and North Korea and pointed out that Putin had imposed sanctions on North Korea twice during his early years of friendship with the West, and even persuaded North Korea to abandon its nuclear weapons program together with the United States, China, Japan and South Korea. Kim Jong-un deliberately interacted with then-South Korean President Moon Jae-in when he attended the summit in 2018. At that time, Kim Jong-un only met with Putin once. Kim Jong-un even met with then-US President Trump three times. Trump was the first international leader he met. North Korea has changed its "big brother". The Center for Arms Control and Non-Proliferation, a think tank based in Washington, D.C., analyzed in July this year that China does not look favorably on Putin's assistance to Kim Jong-un's nuclear ambitions. Beijing's silence fully demonstrates its dissatisfaction with the sharp warming of relations between Pyongyang and Moscow. Putin received military assistance from North Korea on the Russian-Ukrainian battlefield, while Kim Jong-un may transfer some funds through trade to evade severe international sanctions. North Korea's nuclear weapons tests have failed repeatedly, and it may seek help from Moscow. The restoration of military relations between the two sides may have a significant impact on the security of Northeast Asia and the Pacific region. North Korea's "big brother" has changed from China to Russia. Moscow has more influence on Pyongyang than Beijing. However, both regimes are equally known for their poor credibility. How long the new "brotherhood" can last remains to be seen.

This is another reunion of the China-Africa friendship family, and it is also the largest home diplomacy held by China in recent years with the most foreign leaders attending. On September 2, on the eve of the opening of the Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, President Xi Jinping met with a number of African leaders who came to China to attend the Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation. Chinese and African leaders shared friendship, discussed cooperation, and talked about the future. What are the highlights of these important meetings? "News Broadcast Observation" will show you. title: 中非合作论坛丨习近平出席中非合作论坛北京峰会开幕式并发表主旨讲话 _光明网
summary: 新华社北京9月5日电（记者杨依军、孙奕）9月5日上午，国家主席习近平在北京人民大会堂出席中非合作论坛北京峰会开幕式并发表主旨讲话。习近平宣布，中国同所有非洲建交国的双边关系提升到战略关系层面，中非关系整体定位提升至新时代全天候中非命运共同体，将实施中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动。 中共中央政治局常委李强、赵乐际、王沪宁、蔡奇、丁薛祥、李希出席。 初秋北京，高远澄明。天安门广场和长安街两侧，鲜艳的五...
text: 新华社北京9月5日电（记者杨依军、孙奕）9月5日上午，国家主席习近平在北京人民大会堂出席中非合作论坛北京峰会开幕式并发表主旨讲话。习近平宣布，中国同所有非洲建交国的双边关系提升到战略关系层面，中非关系整体定位提升至新时代全天候中非命运共同体，将实施中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动。 中共中央政治局常委李强、赵乐际、王沪宁、蔡奇、丁薛祥、李希出席。 初秋北京，高远澄明。天安门广场和长安街两侧，鲜艳的五星红旗同53个非洲国家和非洲联盟旗帜迎风飘扬。 习近平同出席峰会的51位非洲国家元首、政府首脑以及2位总统代表，非盟委员会主席和联合国秘书长集体合影。 在《和平－命运共同体》乐曲和热烈掌声中，习近平同外方领导人共同步入会场，在主席台就座。 习近平发表题为《携手推进现代化，共筑命运共同体》的主旨讲话。 习近平首先代表中国政府和中国人民对出席峰会的外方嘉宾表示热烈欢迎。 习近平指出，在这收获的季节，很高兴同各位新老朋友相聚北京，共商新时代中非友好合作大计。中非友好穿越时空、跨越山海、薪火相传。中非合作论坛成立24年来特别是新时代以来，中国同非洲兄弟姐妹们本着真实亲诚理念，在世界百年变局中肩并肩、手拉手，坚定捍卫彼此正当权益；在经济全球化大潮中强筋骨、壮体魄，累累硕果惠及中非亿万百姓；在大灾大疫面前同甘苦、共拼搏，书写了一个个中非友好的感人故事；始终相互理解、彼此支持，树立了新型国际关系的典范。经过近70年辛勤耕耘，中非关系正处于历史最好时期。面向未来，中方提议将中国同所有非洲建交国的双边关系提升到战略关系层面，将中非关系整体定位提升至新时代全天候中非命运共同体。 习近平指出，实现现代化是世界各国不可剥夺的权利。中国正坚定不移以中国式现代化全面推进强国建设、民族复兴伟业。非洲也正朝着非盟《2063年议程》描绘的现代化目标稳步迈进。中非共逐现代化之梦，必将掀起全球南方的现代化热潮，谱写构建人类命运共同体的崭新篇章。 习近平提出，中非要携手推进'六个现代化'。 ——要携手推进公正合理的现代化。推进国家现代化建设，既要遵循现代化一般规律，更要符合本国实际。中方愿同非方加强治国理政经验交流，支持各国探索适合本国国情的现代化道路，确保各国权利平等、机会平等。 ——要携手推进开放共赢的现代化。互利合作是符合各国长远和根本利益的阳光大道。中方愿同非方深化工业、农业、基础设施、贸易投资等领域合作，树立高质量共建'一带一路'的标杆，共同打造落实全球发展倡议的样板。 ——要携手推进人民至上的现代化。实现人的自由全面发展是现代化的最终目标。中方愿同非方积极开展人才培养、减贫、就业等领域合作，提升人民在现代化进程中的获得感、幸福感、安全感，共同推动现代化惠及全体人民。 ——要携手推进多元包容的现代化。实现物质文明和精神文明协调发展是现代化的崇高追求。中方愿同非方密切人文交流，倡导不同文明相互尊重、包容共存，共同推动全球文明倡议结出更多硕果。 ——要携手推进生态友好的现代化。绿色发展是新时代现代化的鲜明标识。中方愿帮助非方打造'绿色增长引擎'，缩小能源可及性差距，坚持共同但有区别的责任原则，共同推动全球绿色低碳转型。 ——要携手推进和平安全的现代化。现代化离不开和平稳定的发展环境。中方愿帮助非洲提升自主维护和平稳定的能力，推动全球安全倡议率先在非洲落地，促进高质量发展和高水平安全良性互动，共同维护世界和平稳定。 习近平强调，中国和非洲占世界总人口的三分之一，没有中非的现代化，就没有世界的现代化。未来3年，中方愿同非方携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动，深化中非合作，引领全球南方现代化。 第一，文明互鉴伙伴行动。中方愿同非方打造治国理政经验交流平台，设立中非发展知识网络和25个中非研究中心，邀请1000名非洲政党人士来华交流。 第二，贸易繁荣伙伴行动。中方愿主动单方面扩大市场开放，决定给予包括33个非洲国家在内的所有同中国建交的最不发达国家100%税目产品零关税待遇，推动中国大市场成为非洲大机遇。扩大非洲农产品准入，深化电商等领域合作，实施'中非质量提升计划'。中方愿同非方商签共同发展经济伙伴关系框架协定，为中非贸易投资提供长期、稳定、可预期的制度保障。 第三，产业链合作伙伴行动。中方愿同非方打造产业合作增长圈，着力建设中非经贸深度合作先行区，启动'非洲中小企业赋能计划'。共建中非数字技术合作中心，建设20个数字示范项目。 第四，互联互通伙伴行动。中方愿在非洲实施30个基础设施联通项目，携手推进高质量共建'一带一路'，打造陆海联动、协同发展的中非互联互通网络。为非洲大陆自由贸易区建设提供帮助，深化物流和金融合作，助力非洲跨区域发展。 第五，发展合作伙伴行动。中方愿和非方共同发表在全球发展倡议框架内深化合作的联合声明，实施1000个'小而美'民生项目。注资中国－世界银行伙伴关系基金。支持举办2026年青奥会和2027年非洲杯，促进发展成果更好惠及中非人民。 第六，卫生健康伙伴行动。中方愿同非方成立中非医院联盟，共建联合医学中心。向非洲派遣2000名医疗队员，实施20个医疗卫生和抗疟项目，推动中国企业投资药品生产，继续对非洲遭遇的疫情提供力所能及的帮助。支持非洲疾控中心建设，提升非洲各国公共卫生能力。 第七，兴农惠民伙伴行动。中方将向非洲提供10亿元人民币紧急粮食援助，建设10万亩农业标准化示范区，派遣500名农业专家，建设中非农业科技创新联盟。实施500个公益项目。鼓励中非企业'双向奔赴'投资创业，为非洲创造不少于100万个就业岗位。 第八，人文交流伙伴行动。中方愿同非方深入推进'未来非洲职业教育'计划，共建工程技术学院，建设10个'鲁班工坊'。重点面向非洲妇女和青年，提供6万个研修名额。共同实施中非'文化丝路'计划和'广电视听创新合作计划'。将2026年确定为'中非人文交流年'。 第九，绿色发展伙伴行动。中方愿在非洲实施30个清洁能源项目，建设气象早期预警业务平台，开展防灾减灾救灾和生物多样性保护合作。设立中非和平利用核技术论坛，开展卫星遥感、月球和深空探测合作，助力非洲实现绿色发展。 第十，安全共筑伙伴行动。中方愿同非方建立落实全球安全倡议伙伴关系，为非方培训6000名军队人才和1000名警务执法人员，邀请500名青年军官访华。开展中非军队联演联训、联合巡航，实施'助力非洲摆脱雷患行动'，共同维护人员和项目安全。 为推动'十大伙伴行动'实施，中国政府愿为中非各领域务实合作提供强有力支持。 习近平最后强调，中国共产党二十届三中全会对进一步全面深化改革、推进中国式现代化作出系统部署。这将进一步深刻改变中国，也必将为非洲国家、为中非共逐现代化之梦提供新机遇、注入新动能。非洲有句谚语'同路人才是真朋友'。现代化道路上一个都不能少，一国都不能掉队。让我们凝聚起28亿多中非人民的磅礴力量，在现代化征程上携手同行，以中非现代化助力全球南方现代化，绘就人类发展史上崭新画卷，共同推动世界走向和平、安全、繁荣、进步的光明前景！ 中非合作论坛共同主席国塞内加尔总统法耶，非盟轮值主席国毛里塔尼亚总统加兹瓦尼，非洲次区域代表南非总统拉马福萨、刚果（布）总统萨苏、尼日利亚总统提努布、坦桑尼亚总统哈桑，峰会特邀嘉宾、联合国秘书长古特雷斯，非盟委员会主席法基也在开幕式致辞。 非方领导人感谢中方主办此次中非合作论坛北京峰会，高度评价非中深厚传统友谊和中非合作论坛成立以来特别是2018年北京峰会以来取得的积极成果，高度赞赏习近平主席提出中非携手推进现代化'十大伙伴行动'。他们表示，中非合作论坛不仅是促进非中伙伴关系发展的有效平台，也已经成为引领南南合作的光辉典范。论坛合作基于友谊、尊重和互利共赢，中国对非合作不带任何政治附加条件，极大促进了非洲国家互联互通和经济社会发展。在当前复杂动荡国际形势下，深化对华合作更加成为非洲国家实现安全、稳定和可持续发展的希望。非中理念相近。非方高度赞赏并完全支持习近平主席提出的构建人类命运共同体重要理念和共建'一带一路'倡议、全球发展倡议、全球安全倡议、全球文明倡议，愿同中方共同倡导全人类共同价值，支持各国探索符合本国国情的现代化道路。非方坚定奉行一个中国政策，坚定支持中国政府为实现国家统一所作的一切努力，坚决反对外部势力借台湾、人权等问题干涉中国内政。非方祝贺中国共产党二十届三中全会成功召开，相信中国进一步全面深化改革、推进中国式现代化将为包括非洲国家在内的世界各国带来更多发展机遇。非方愿同中方继续秉持和平共处五项原则和中非友好合作精神，积极落实此次峰会成果，携手推进工业化和农业现代化，构建新时代全天候非中命运共同体，共同迈向和平、安全、繁荣、进步的光明前景。 峰会通过《关于共筑新时代全天候中非命运共同体的北京宣言》《中非合作论坛－北京行动计划（2025－2027）》。 中非合作论坛非方成员国国家元首、政府首脑、代表团团长及国际和地区组织负责人等中外各界人士3200余人出席开幕式。 尹力、李书磊、何立峰、王小洪等出席。 王毅主持开幕式。 中非合作论坛成立于2000年，目前有中国、53个与中国建交的非洲国家和非盟委员会共55个成员。本次峰会主题为'携手推进现代化，共筑高水平中非命运共同体'。开幕式后还将举行主题分别为治国理政、工业化和农业现代化、和平安全和高质量共建'一带一路'4场高级别会议。 [ 责编：袁晴 ] 阅读剩余全文（ ）

title: 霍守業：威權衝擊國際秩序 遠大於建構嚇阻能力成本
summary: （中央社記者游凱翔、廖文綺台北12日電）國防院今天舉辦台北安全對話，國防院董事長、一級上將霍守業致詞表示，中共不斷襲擾，雖嚇阻能力建構有其代價風險，但戰爭浩劫與威權勢力主導國際秩序可能帶來的衝擊，將遠大於嚇阻建構的成本。 國防部智庫、國防安全研究院在台北君悅飯店舉辦「2024台北安全對話」 ，聚焦中國對全球威脅及台海安全，霍守業、陸委會主委邱垂正開幕致詞，前美國駐聯合國大使克拉夫特（Kelly C...
text: （中央社記者游凱翔、廖文綺台北12日電）國防院今天舉辦台北安全對話，國防院董事長、一級上將霍守業致詞表示，中共不斷襲擾，雖嚇阻能力建構有其代價風險，但戰爭浩劫與威權勢力主導國際秩序可能帶來的衝擊，將遠大於嚇阻建構的成本。 國防部智庫、國防安全研究院在台北君悅飯店舉辦「2024台北安全對話」 ，聚焦中國對全球威脅及台海安全，霍守業、陸委會主委邱垂正開幕致詞，前美國駐聯合國大使克拉夫特（Kelly Craft，另譯：克拉芙特）、前澳洲國防、外交部長潘恩（Marise Payne）也應邀發表演說。 霍守業指出，國際局勢目前正處於動盪的時代，俄烏戰爭從2022年迄今尚未結束；以色列與哈瑪斯的衝突及伊朗介入，讓中東戰火持續擴大；北韓試射飛彈讓朝鮮半島的危險加劇，也造成區域與全球的不穩定。 霍守業表示，這些衝突與不穩定的背後，都可以看到威權國家的擴張。隨著中共在台灣海峽、南海與東海等灰色地帶持續不斷的襲擾，混和式威脅與軍演，各界也擔心印太區域與全球經貿、科技、供應鏈與安全秩序將面臨另一場衝突。 霍守業指出，非常期待印太及全世界愛好和平的國家，共同強化嚇阻能力與韌性，深化相互協調機制來維持和平，穩定與繁榮，及以規則為基礎法治的國際秩序，抵擋威權的擴張，避免印太區域及全球陷入戰爭浩劫。 霍守業表示，雖然嚇阻能力的建構有其代價與風險，但戰爭浩劫與威權勢力主導國際秩序可能帶來的衝擊，將遠大於嚇阻建構的成本，這也是今天這場安全對話目的所在。 邱垂正指出，目前亞洲與歐洲都面臨前所未有的國際秩序震盪，自從習近平2012年掌權後，中國大陸便籠罩於極端的民族主義，在沒有民主制度的管理與平衡下，中國的發展前景充滿不確定性，且可能導致區域混亂。而習近平延長任期，目的就是在他的任期內完成統一台灣的民族復興歷史任務，這願景就是造成台海現狀的主因。 邱垂正表示，從蔡政府時期，台灣就致力於維護台海和平，是北京政府想改變現狀。他說，北京不斷升高軍事威脅，意圖就是要破壞中華民國的主權，破壞目前穩定的台海現狀，以及區域和平穩定。 邱垂正指出，北京目前所堅持的九二共識，事實上就是一中原則，他說，如果台灣接受了九二共識，就表示接受台灣是中華人民共和國的一部分，台灣好像就走上統一的進程。他強調，台灣未來也不會接受這類說法。 邱垂正表示，台灣目前遭遇來自北京的壓力，包括軍事威脅、經濟脅迫、法律戰，以及心理戰等灰色戰略。雖然台灣面臨前所未有的壓力，但是台灣不會向中國的威脅屈服。台灣政府政策將致力於維持穩定的台海關係，也會維持不主動挑釁的任務。 邱垂正指出，台灣非常願意促進有意義的對話，只要合理、互相尊重、平等的平台，台灣願意和北京政府達成雙方可接受的協議以維持台海和平穩定。面對中國越來越強大的威脅與壓力，台灣會維持賴總統的4大和平支柱，包括加強國防、增進經濟安全、增進和民主國家之間的夥伴關係，並且以「穩定而有原則」的兩岸關係領導能力，維持台海和平穩定。（編輯：蘇志宗）1130912 霍守業 前美駐聯合國大使：台灣民主是世界與中國的希望燈塔 邱垂正 國防院12日辦台北安全對話 前美駐聯合國大使將演說 金門快艇案海巡不起訴 陸委會：尊重調查結果
translated_summary: (Central News Agency reporters You Kai-hsiang and Liao Wen-chi, Taipei, 12th) The National Defense Academy held the Taipei Security Dialogue today. In his speech, the Chairman of the National Defense Academy, General Huo Shou-ye, said that the constant attacks by the Chinese Communist Party have brought risks and costs to the construction of deterrence capabilities, but the impact of the catastrophe of war and the dominance of authoritarian forces on the international order will far outweigh the cost of deterrence construction. The National Defense Ministry think tank, the National Defense Security Research Institute, held the "2024 Taipei Security Dialogue" at the Grand Hyatt Hotel in Taipei, focusing on China's global threats and the security of the Taiwan Strait. Huo Shouye and Mainland Affairs Council Chairman Chiu Chui-cheng delivered opening speeches. Former US Ambassador to the United Nations Kelly Craft and former Australian Defense and Foreign Minister Marise Payne were also invited to give speeches. Huo Shouye pointed out that the international situation is currently in a turbulent era. The Russo-Ukrainian war has not ended since 2022; the conflict between Israel and Hamas and Iran's intervention have continued to expand the war in the Middle East; North Korea's missile test has exacerbated the danger on the Korean Peninsula and caused regional and global instability. Huo Shouye said that behind these conflicts and instability, we can see the expansion of authoritarian countries. With the continuous harassment, hybrid threats and military exercises by the Chinese Communist Party in gray areas such as the Taiwan Strait, the South China Sea and the East China Sea, people from all walks of life are also worried that the Indo-Pacific region and the global trade, technology, supply chain and security order will face another conflict. Huo Shouye pointed out that he very much hopes that the peace-loving countries in the Indo-Pacific and the world will jointly strengthen their deterrence capabilities and resilience, deepen mutual coordination mechanisms to maintain peace, stability and prosperity, and the international order based on rules and the rule of law, resist the expansion of authoritarianism, and prevent the Indo-Pacific region and the world from falling into the catastrophe of war. Huo Shouye said that although the construction of deterrence capabilities has its costs and risks, the impact of war and authoritarian forces dominating the international order will far outweigh the cost of deterrence construction, which is also the purpose of today's security dialogue. Chiu Chui-cheng pointed out that Asia and Europe are currently facing unprecedented turmoil in the international order. Since Xi Jinping came to power in 2012, mainland China has been shrouded in extreme nationalism. Without the management and balance of a democratic system, China's development prospects are full of uncertainty and may lead to regional chaos. Xi Jinping's purpose of extending his term is to complete the historical mission of national rejuvenation of the unification of Taiwan during his term. This vision is the main cause of the current situation in the Taiwan Strait. Chiu Chui-cheng said that since the Tsai Ing-wen administration, Taiwan has been committed to maintaining peace in the Taiwan Strait, and it is the Beijing government that wants to change the status quo. He said that Beijing's continuous escalation of military threats is intended to undermine the sovereignty of the Republic of China, the current stable status quo in the Taiwan Strait, and regional peace and stability. Chiu Chui-cheng pointed out that the 1992 Consensus that Beijing currently adheres to is in fact the one-China principle. He said that if Taiwan accepts the 1992 Consensus, it means accepting that Taiwan is part of the People's Republic of China, and Taiwan seems to be on the road to unification. He emphasized that Taiwan will not accept such statements in the future. Chiu Chui-cheng said that Taiwan is currently facing pressure from Beijing, including military threats, economic coercion, legal warfare, and gray strategies such as psychological warfare. Although Taiwan is facing unprecedented pressure, it will not succumb to China's threats. The Taiwan government's policy will be committed to maintaining stable cross-strait relations and will also maintain the mission of not actively provoking. Chiu Chui-cheng pointed out that Taiwan is very willing to promote meaningful dialogue. As long as it is reasonable, mutually respectful, and on an equal platform, Taiwan is willing to reach a mutually acceptable agreement with the Beijing government to maintain peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait. In the face of China's increasingly powerful threats and pressures, Taiwan will maintain President Lai's four pillars of peace, including strengthening national defense, enhancing economic security, and enhancing partnerships with democratic countries, and maintain peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait with "stable and principled" leadership in cross-strait relations. (Editor: Su Zhizong) 1130912 Huo Shouye Former US Ambassador to the United Nations: Taiwan democracy is a beacon of hope for the world and China Qiu Chuizheng The National Defense Academy will hold the Taipei Security Dialogue on the 12th Former US Ambassador to the United Nations will give a speech The Coast Guard will not prosecute the Kinmen speedboat case The Mainland Affairs Council: Respect the investigation results

title: 习近平向第十一届北京香山论坛致贺信
summary: 新华报业网 > 首页 > 正文 习近平向第十一届北京香山论坛致贺信 新华社北京9月13日电 9月13日，国家主席习近平向第十一届北京香山论坛致贺信。 习近平指出，面对世界百年未有之大变局，面对世界人民对安全稳定的期盼，中国践行全球安全倡议，不断凝聚各方共识，推动消弭国际冲突根源、完善全球安全治理，为共建持久和平、普遍安全的世界作出不懈努力。希望本届论坛继续秉持平等、开放、包容、互鉴精神，凝聚共识、...
text: 新华报业网 > 首页 > 正文 习近平向第十一届北京香山论坛致贺信 新华社北京9月13日电 9月13日，国家主席习近平向第十一届北京香山论坛致贺信。 习近平指出，面对世界百年未有之大变局，面对世界人民对安全稳定的期盼，中国践行全球安全倡议，不断凝聚各方共识，推动消弭国际冲突根源、完善全球安全治理，为共建持久和平、普遍安全的世界作出不懈努力。希望本届论坛继续秉持平等、开放、包容、互鉴精神，凝聚共识、深化互信，为共同应对全球性安全挑战、推动构建人类命运共同体作出新的更大贡献。 第十一届北京香山论坛主题为'共筑和平、共享未来'，当日在北京开幕。 责编：严红兰 版权和免责声明 版权声明： 凡来源为"交汇点、新华日报及其子报"或电头为"新华报业网"的稿件，均为新华报业网独家版权所有，未经许可不得转载或镜像；授权转载必须注明来源为"新华报业网"，并保留"新华报业网"的电头。 免责声明： 本站转载稿件仅代表作者个人观点，与新华报业网无关。其原创性以及文中陈述文字和内容未经本站证实，对本文以及其中全部或者部分内容、文字的真实性、完整性、及时性本站不作任何保证或者承诺，请读者仅作参考，并请自行核实相关内容。
translated_summary: Xinhua News Network > Home > Text Xi Jinping sends a congratulatory letter to the 11th Beijing Xiangshan Forum Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 13th On September 13th, President Xi Jinping sent a congratulatory letter to the 11th Beijing Xiangshan Forum. Xi Jinping pointed out that in the face of the great changes in the world that have not been seen in a century, and in the face of the world's people's expectations for security and stability, China has implemented the global security initiative, continuously gathered consensus among all parties, promoted the elimination of the root causes of international conflicts, improved global security governance, and made unremitting efforts to build a world of lasting peace and universal security. It is hoped that this forum will continue to uphold the spirit of equality, openness, inclusiveness and mutual learning, build consensus, deepen mutual trust, and make new and greater contributions to jointly responding to global security challenges and promoting the building of a community with a shared future for mankind. The theme of the 11th Beijing Xiangshan Forum is "Building Peace and Sharing the Future Together", and it opened in Beijing on the same day. title: 中非合作論壇 習近平：中非提升至全天候命運共同體
summary: 中非合作論壇北京峰會4日至6日召開，開幕式於5日上午在北京人民大會堂舉行。大陸國家主席習近平出席開幕式時宣布，中國同所有非洲建交國的雙邊關係提升到戰略關係層面，中非關係整體定位提升至新時代全天候中非命運共同體。 習習近在發表題為《攜手推進現代化，共築命運共同體》的主旨講話時指出，經過近70年的辛勤耕耘，中非關係正處於歷史最好時期。面向未來，他提議將中國同所有非洲建交國的雙邊關係提升到戰略關係層面，...
text: 中非合作論壇北京峰會4日至6日召開，開幕式於5日上午在北京人民大會堂舉行。大陸國家主席習近平出席開幕式時宣布，中國同所有非洲建交國的雙邊關係提升到戰略關係層面，中非關係整體定位提升至新時代全天候中非命運共同體。 習習近在發表題為《攜手推進現代化，共築命運共同體》的主旨講話時指出，經過近70年的辛勤耕耘，中非關係正處於歷史最好時期。面向未來，他提議將中國同所有非洲建交國的雙邊關係提升到戰略關係層面，將中非關係整體定位提升至新時代全天候中非命運共同體。 習近平表示，非洲也正經歷新的覺醒，朝著非盟《2063年議程》描繪的現代化目標穩步邁進。中非共逐現代化之夢，必將掀起全球南方現代化熱潮，譜寫構建人類命運共同體的嶄新篇章。 習近平指出，中非要攜手推進「六個現代化」，要攜手推進公正合理的現代化，要攜手推進開放共贏的現代化，要攜手推進人民至上的現代化，要攜手推進多元包容的現代化，要攜手推進生態友好的現代化，要攜手推進和平安全的現代化。 據央視，9月4日晚，習近平和夫人彭麗媛在北京人民大會堂舉行宴會，歡迎到中國大陸出席中非合作論壇北京峰會的非方及國際貴賓。習近平於會上表示，只要28億多中非人民同心同向，就一定能在現代化道路上共創輝煌，引領「全球南方」現代化事業蓬勃發展，為建構人類命運共同體作出更大貢獻。 本屆中非合作論壇峰會主題為「攜手推進現代化，共築高水準中非命運共同體」，是大陸近年規模最大的主場外交活動，邀請非洲53國及非洲聯盟等地區國際組織出席。
translated_summary: The Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation was held from the 4th to the 6th, and the opening ceremony was held at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on the morning of the 5th. At the opening ceremony, Chinese President Xi Jinping announced that China's bilateral relations with all African countries that have diplomatic ties with China have been elevated to the level of strategic relations, and the overall positioning of China-Africa relations has been elevated to the all-weather China-Africa community with a shared future in the new era. Xi recently delivered a keynote speech entitled "Joining Hands to Promote Modernization and Build a Community with a Shared Future" and pointed out that after nearly 70 years of hard work, China-Africa relations are at their best in history. Looking to the future, he proposed to elevate China's bilateral relations with all African countries that have diplomatic ties with China to the level of strategic relations, and to elevate the overall positioning of China-Africa relations to the all-weather China-Africa community with a shared future in the new era. Xi Jinping said that Africa is also experiencing a new awakening and is moving steadily towards the modernization goals outlined in the AU's Agenda 2063. The dream of modernization pursued by China and Africa will surely set off a modernization boom in the global South and write a new chapter in building a community with a shared future for mankind. Xi Jinping pointed out that China and Africa should work together to promote the "six modernizations", to promote fair and reasonable modernization, to promote open and win-win modernization, to promote people-first modernization, to promote diversified and inclusive modernization, to promote ecologically friendly modernization, and to promote peaceful and secure modernization. According to CCTV, on the evening of September 4, Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan held a banquet at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing to welcome African and international guests who came to China to attend the Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation. Xi Jinping said at the meeting that as long as the more than 2.8 billion Chinese and African people work together, they will surely create brilliance on the road to modernization, lead the modernization cause of the "Global South" to flourish, and make greater contributions to building a community with a shared future for mankind. The theme of this year's Forum on China-Africa Cooperation Summit is "Join hands to promote modernization and build a high-level China-Africa community with a shared future". It is the largest home-based diplomatic event in recent years in the mainland, inviting 53 African countries and regional international organizations such as the African Union to attend.

title: 时政新闻眼丨三中全会后首次考察，习近平来到这两座西部名城
summary: 初秋时节，岁物丰成。中非合作论坛北京峰会刚刚落下帷幕，习近平总书记就开启了国内考察行程。 9月10日下午至11日上午，总书记先后踏访陕西宝鸡、甘肃天水两地。从博物馆、文物保护单位，到生态公园、苹果基地，总书记重点关注文化遗产保护传承、生态保护、特色产业发展等主题。 △ 视频：习近平在陕西宝鸡市和甘肃天水市考察 01 关中平原的两颗'明珠' 习近平总书记此次考察的陕西宝鸡市和甘肃天水市，位于关中平原...
text: 初秋时节，岁物丰成。中非合作论坛北京峰会刚刚落下帷幕，习近平总书记就开启了国内考察行程。 9月10日下午至11日上午，总书记先后踏访陕西宝鸡、甘肃天水两地。从博物馆、文物保护单位，到生态公园、苹果基地，总书记重点关注文化遗产保护传承、生态保护、特色产业发展等主题。 △ 视频：习近平在陕西宝鸡市和甘肃天水市考察 01 关中平原的两颗'明珠' 习近平总书记此次考察的陕西宝鸡市和甘肃天水市，位于关中平原。两市毗邻交界，都是秦岭之上、渭河之畔、底蕴深厚的历史文化名城，堪称关中平原上的两颗'明珠'。 △ 宝鸡。（总台记者刘海涛拍摄） 宝鸡，炎帝故里。这里是周秦王朝发祥地，孕育了《周礼》《周易》等灿烂的文化经典。宝鸡历来是战略要地和兵家必争之地，'暗度陈仓''五出祁山'等历史典故发生于此。域内现有国家重点文物保护单位27处。 △ 天水。（总台央视记者范凯拍摄） 天水，羲皇故里。这里有着8000多年的文明史和2700多年的建城史，是全国首批确定的国家历史文化名城，伏羲文化、石窟文化、三国古战场文化等'五大文化'构成了其独具魅力的历史文化资源。 △ 宝鸡。（图/视觉中国） 总书记此次赴西部地区考察，是在一个重要的时间节点。 一个多月前，党的二十届三中全会召开，科学谋划了围绕中国式现代化进一步全面深化改革的总体部署。此次考察，是三中全会之后总书记首次国内考察。 庆祝新中国成立75周年，是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事。这次考察，正值国庆前夕。 △ 天水。（总台记者马凌峰拍摄） 02 中华文明的'宝库' 习近平总书记在宝鸡和天水考察中，有一个共同的关注重点，就是文化遗产保护传承。 △ 宝鸡青铜器博物院。（总台记者赵振凯拍摄） 在陕西宝鸡，总书记首先考察了宝鸡青铜器博物院。这是我国第一座以青铜器命名的青铜文化专题博物馆。 博物院位于宝鸡市渭滨区渭河南岸石鼓山上，采用高台门阙、青铜后土的建筑语言，形成'平台五鼎'的独特建筑风格。博物院以集中收藏、研究和展示商周青铜器为主，拥有青铜器等文物48万余件。 △ 宝鸡青铜器博物院内展陈。（总台记者崔刚拍摄） 一日经四季，宝鸡看'中国'。宝鸡青铜器最大的一个特点是它的铭文字数多。 1963年出土于陕西宝鸡的西周青铜器'何尊'，内底刻有铭文'宅兹中国'，留下'中国'一词的最早文字记录。 △ 宝鸡青铜器博物院内展陈——何尊。（总台央视记者丁欣、彭汉明拍摄） 2019年5月，亚洲文明对话大会开幕式前，总书记同外方领导人一道参观文物展，何尊就是其中9件文物珍品之一。2023年5月，中国—中亚峰会上，在赠送中亚国家元首的礼品中，就有一件'何尊'。 透过'宅兹中国'，人们不断理解'何以中国'。 △ 宝鸡青铜器博物院内展陈——逨盘。（总台央视记者丁欣、彭汉明拍摄） △ 宝鸡青铜器博物院内展陈——逨盘。（总台央视记者丁欣、彭汉明拍摄） 走在天水街头，历史气息扑面而来。这里不仅是伏羲文化的发源地，还坐落着享誉世界的'东方雕塑陈列馆'。 在天水，总书记先后前往伏羲庙、麦积山石窟考察。 △ 伏羲庙。（总台央视记者郭鸿拍摄） 伏羲庙，是我国保存最为完整、建筑年代最早的祭祀伏羲氏的庙宇，现为全国重点文物保护单位。伏羲庙整体建筑坐北朝南，包括牌坊、仪门、先天殿、太极殿等主要建筑，具有典型的中国古代宫廷式建筑格局。 △ 麦积山石窟。（总台央视记者范凯拍摄） 麦积山石窟，始建于十六国时期的后秦，距今已有1600多年的历史，因山形酷似西北地区农家麦垛而得名。 石窟现存窟龛221个、泥塑石雕造像1.06万余尊、壁画1000多平方米。2014年，麦积山石窟作为丝路遗产点被列入《世界遗产名录》。麦积山石窟艺术研究所是麦积山石窟的保护管理机构，由敦煌研究院管理。 △ 麦积山石窟。（总台记者马凌峰拍摄） 总书记对文化遗产保护传承的关注，一以贯之。 5年前到甘肃考察时，总书记第一站就前往敦煌莫高窟。他强调，要十分珍惜祖先留给我们的这份珍贵文化遗产，'将这一世界文化遗产代代相传'。去年在陕西汉中考察时，总书记也专程走进汉中市博物馆。 这次在宝鸡、天水考察时，总书记说，中华文明五千年，还要进一步挖掘，深入研究、阐释它的内涵和精神，宣传好其中蕴含的伟大智慧，从而让大家更加尊崇热爱，增强对中华文明的自豪感，弘扬爱国主义精神，把中华优秀传统文化一代一代传下去。 03 和谐共生的'幸福园' 在陕西宝鸡考察期间，总书记来到渭河生态公园，了解当地开展渭河生态保护治理等情况。 渭河是黄河的最大支流。渭河宝鸡段长200多公里，平均宽度600米。渭河流域生态保护治理与修复于2000年开始实施，相继建成3个国家级水利风景区和国家级湿地公园、17处渭河滩区生态涵养区。 △ 渭河。（总台央视记者范一鸣拍摄） 渭河生态公园地处宝鸡市中心，紧靠渭河北岸，2004年10月建成开放。公园融水、堤、路、园林、广场为一体，打造'四时荣枯、自然野趣'的滨河生态景观，为市区人均提供公共绿地近2平方米。 △ 渭河。（图/视觉中国） 去年7月在陕西考察时，总书记曾专程考察了地处汉江汉中城区段的天汉湿地公园。他当时强调，生态公园建设要顺应自然，加强湿地生态系统的整体性保护和系统性修复，促进生态保护同生产生活相互融合，努力建设环境优美、绿色低碳、宜居宜游的生态城市。 △ 渭河沿岸。（图/视觉中国） 党的二十届三中全会对健全生态环境治理体系作出重要部署。《中共中央关于进一步全面深化改革 推进中国式现代化的决定》指出，要'推动重要流域构建上下游贯通一体的生态环境治理体系'。 04 乡村振兴的'致富果' 麦积区南山花牛苹果基地，是习近平总书记在甘肃天水的考察点之一。 △ 麦积区南山花牛苹果基地。（总台央视记者范凯拍摄） 花牛苹果，是中国国家地理标志产品，在天水开始种植可以追溯到1925年。 天水地处高海拔区，山多川少，大部分果园位于山地，具备土层深厚、光照充足、雨水适中、冬无严寒、夏无酷暑、四季分明的独特条件，非常有利于果实生长、着色和糖分积累等。当地独特的地理和气候资源优势，孕育了独具特色的花牛苹果。 △ 麦积区南山花牛苹果基地。（总台央视记者程铖拍摄） 花牛苹果肉质细腻，致密松脆，风味独特，香气浓郁，口感上佳。花牛苹果被誉为世界三大著名苹果品牌之一，是中国在国际市场上第一个获得正式商标的苹果品牌。 麦积区南山花牛苹果基地，现有苹果种植面积15万亩。去年，基地实现果品总产量22万吨，带动4万多人实现增收。 △ 麦积区南山花牛苹果基地。（总台央视记者范一鸣拍摄） 2022年10月，总书记在陕西延安南沟村考察时，曾专门看了山上的苹果园和村里的苹果洗选车间。他对乡亲们说，大力发展苹果种植业可谓天时地利人和，这是最好的、最合适的产业，大有前途。 这次踏访西部，总书记再次关注当地的'致富果'，重点了解发展特色现代山地果业等情况。 △ 麦积区南山花牛苹果基地。（总台央视记者黎兵拍摄） 习近平总书记说，'中华文明是革故鼎新、辉光日新的文明，静水深流与波澜壮阔交织。' 在重要的时间节点，总书记考察两座西部名城，既寻访历史，又指导实践，既关注生态，又情牵民生，既立足西部，又放眼全国，蕴含深远的战略考量。 赓续历史文脉，谱写当代华章，中国式现代化阔步向前。 【责任编辑：万月英】
translated_summary: In early autumn, the harvest is abundant. The Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation has just ended, and General Secretary Xi Jinping has started his domestic inspection trip. From the afternoon of September 10 to the morning of September 11, the General Secretary visited Baoji, Shaanxi and Tianshui, Gansu. From museums, cultural relics protection units, to ecological parks and apple bases, the General Secretary focused on themes such as cultural heritage protection and inheritance, ecological protection, and characteristic industrial development. △ Video: Xi Jinping inspected Baoji, Shaanxi and Tianshui, Gansu 01 Two "Pearls" of the Guanzhong Plain Baoji, Shaanxi and Tianshui, Gansu, which General Secretary Xi Jinping inspected this time, are located in the Guanzhong Plain. The two cities are adjacent to each other and are both historical and cultural cities with profound cultural heritage on the Qinling Mountains and the banks of the Wei River. They can be called two "Pearls" on the Guanzhong Plain. △ Baoji. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Liu Haitao) Baoji, the hometown of Emperor Yan. This is the birthplace of the Zhou and Qin dynasties, and it gave birth to brilliant cultural classics such as "Zhou Li" and "Zhou Yi". Baoji has always been a strategic location and a place of contention for military strategists. Historical allusions such as "Secretly Crossing Chencang" and "Five Expeditions to Qishan" took place here. There are 27 national key cultural relics protection units in the region. △ Tianshui. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Fan Kai) Tianshui, the hometown of Emperor Xi. It has a civilization history of more than 8,000 years and a city history of more than 2,700 years. It is one of the first national historical and cultural cities identified in the country. The "five major cultures" such as Fuxi culture, grotto culture, and the ancient battlefield culture of the Three Kingdoms constitute its unique historical and cultural resources. △ Baoji. (Photo/Visual China) The general secretary's visit to the western region this time is at an important time node. More than a month ago, the Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee was held, and a scientific plan was made for the overall deployment of further deepening reforms around Chinese-style modernization. This inspection is the first domestic inspection by the general secretary after the Third Plenary Session. Celebrating the 75th anniversary of the founding of New China is a major event in the political life of the Party and the country. This inspection was on the eve of National Day. △ Tianshui. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Ma Lingfeng) 02 The 'treasure house' of Chinese civilization During his inspections in Baoji and Tianshui, General Secretary Xi Jinping had a common focus, which was the protection and inheritance of cultural heritage. △ Baoji Bronze Museum. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Zhao Zhenkai) In Baoji, Shaanxi, the General Secretary first visited the Baoji Bronze Museum. This is the first bronze culture museum in my country named after bronze ware. The museum is located on Shigu Mountain on the south bank of the Weihe River in Weibin District, Baoji City. It adopts the architectural language of high-platform gates and bronze Hou Tu, forming a unique architectural style of "platform five tripods". The museum focuses on the collection, research and display of Shang and Zhou bronze ware, and has more than 480,000 bronze ware and other cultural relics. △ Exhibition in the Baoji Bronze Museum. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Cui Gang) One day through four seasons, Baoji sees "China". One of the biggest features of Baoji bronze ware is that it has a large number of inscriptions. The Western Zhou bronze ware "He Zun", unearthed in Baoji, Shaanxi in 1963, has the inscription "Zhezi China" engraved on the bottom, leaving the earliest written record of the word "China". △ He Zun, exhibited in the Baoji Bronze Museum. (Photographed by CCTV reporters Ding Xin and Peng Hanming) In May 2019, before the opening ceremony of the Conference on Dialogue of Asian Civilizations, the General Secretary visited the cultural relics exhibition with foreign leaders. He Zun was one of the 9 cultural relics. In May 2023, at the China-Central Asia Summit, among the gifts presented to the heads of state of Central Asian countries, there was a "He Zun". Through "Zhezi China", people continue to understand "Why China". △ The exhibition in the Baoji Bronze Museum - Nian Pan. (Photographed by CCTV reporters Ding Xin and Peng Hanming) △ The exhibition in the Baoji Bronze Museum - Nian Pan. (Photographed by CCTV reporters Ding Xin and Peng Hanming) Walking on the streets of Tianshui, the breath of history hits you. This is not only the birthplace of Fuxi culture, but also the world-renowned "Oriental Sculpture Exhibition Hall". In Tianshui, the General Secretary visited Fuxi Temple and Maijishan Grottoes. △ Fuxi Temple. (Photographed by CCTV reporter Guo Hong) Fuxi Temple is the most complete and earliest temple dedicated to Fuxi in my country. It is now a national key cultural relic protection unit. The overall building of Fuxi Temple faces north and south, including archways, ceremonial gates, Xiantian Hall, Taiji Hall and other main buildings, with a typical ancient Chinese palace-style architectural pattern. △ Maijishan Grottoes. (Photographed by CCTV reporter Fan Kai) Maijishan Grottoes, first built in the Sixteen Kingdoms period of the Later Qin Dynasty, has a history of more than 1,600 years. It is named because the mountain shape resembles the wheat stacks of farmers in the northwest region. There are 221 caves and niches in the grottoes, more than 10,600 clay sculptures and stone sculptures, and more than 1,000 square meters of murals. In 2014, the Maijishan Grottoes were listed in the World Heritage List as a Silk Road heritage site. The Maijishan Grottoes Art Research Institute is the protection and management agency of the Maijishan Grottoes, which is managed by the Dunhuang Academy. △ Maijishan Grottoes. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Ma Lingfeng) The General Secretary has always been concerned about the protection and inheritance of cultural heritage. When he visited Gansu five years ago, the first stop of the General Secretary was the Mogao Grottoes in Dunhuang. He emphasized that we must cherish this precious cultural heritage left to us by our ancestors and "pass this world cultural heritage from generation to generation." When he visited Hanzhong, Shaanxi last year, the General Secretary also made a special trip to the Hanzhong City Museum. During the inspection in Baoji and Tianshui this time, the General Secretary said that the Chinese civilization has a history of 5,000 years, and we must further explore, deeply study and explain its connotation and spirit, and publicize the great wisdom contained in it, so that everyone can respect and love it more, enhance their pride in Chinese civilization, promote the spirit of patriotism, and pass on the excellent traditional Chinese culture from generation to generation. 03 A 'happy garden' of harmonious coexistence During his inspection in Baoji, Shaanxi, the General Secretary visited the Weihe Ecological Park to learn about the local ecological protection and management of the Weihe River. The Weihe River is the largest tributary of the Yellow River. The Baoji section of the Weihe River is more than 200 kilometers long and has an average width of 600 meters. The ecological protection, management and restoration of the Weihe River Basin began in 2000, and three national-level water conservancy scenic spots and national-level wetland parks and 17 Weihe River beach ecological conservation areas have been built successively. △ Weihe River. (Photo by CCTV reporter Fan Yiming) The Weihe Ecological Park is located in the center of Baoji City, close to the north bank of the Weihe River. It was completed and opened in October 2004. The park integrates water, embankments, roads, gardens and squares to create a riverside ecological landscape of "prosperity and decline in all seasons, natural wildness", providing nearly 2 square meters of public green space per capita in the urban area. △ Weihe River. (Photo/Visual China) When inspecting Shaanxi in July last year, the General Secretary made a special trip to inspect the Tianhan Wetland Park located in the Hanzhong urban section of the Hanjiang River. He emphasized at the time that the construction of ecological parks should conform to nature, strengthen the overall protection and systematic restoration of wetland ecosystems, promote the integration of ecological protection with production and life, and strive to build an ecological city with beautiful environment, green and low-carbon, livable and tourist-friendly. △ Along the Weihe River. (Photo/Visual China) The Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee made important arrangements for improving the ecological environment governance system. The "Decision of the CPC Central Committee on Further Deepening Reform and Promoting Chinese-style Modernization" pointed out that it is necessary to "promote the construction of an ecological environment governance system that connects upstream and downstream in important river basins." 04 The "fruit of wealth" for rural revitalization The Nanshan Huaniu Apple Base in Maiji District is one of the inspection points of General Secretary Xi Jinping in Tianshui, Gansu. △ Nanshan Huaniu Apple Base in Maiji District. (Photographed by CCTV reporter Fan Kai) Huaniu Apple is a national geographical indication product of China, and its cultivation in Tianshui can be traced back to 1925. Tianshui is located in a high-altitude area with many mountains and few rivers. Most of the orchards are located in the mountains. It has unique conditions such as deep soil, sufficient sunlight, moderate rainfall, no severe cold in winter, no scorching heat in summer, and distinct four seasons, which are very conducive to fruit growth, coloring and sugar accumulation. The unique geographical and climatic resource advantages of the local area have given birth to the unique Huaniu apple. △ Nanshan Huaniu Apple Base in Maiji District. (Photographed by CCTV reporter Cheng Cheng) Huaniu apples have delicate flesh, dense and crispy, unique flavor, rich aroma and excellent taste. Huaniu apples are known as one of the three most famous apple brands in the world and are the first Chinese apple brand to obtain an official trademark in the international market. The Nanshan Huaniu Apple Base in Maiji District currently has an apple planting area of 150,000 mu. Last year, the base achieved a total fruit output of 220,000 tons, driving more than 40,000 people to increase their income. △ Nanshan Huaniu Apple Base in Maiji District. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Fan Yiming) In October 2022, when the General Secretary visited Nangou Village in Yan'an, Shaanxi, he specifically visited the apple orchard on the mountain and the apple washing workshop in the village. He told the villagers that vigorously developing the apple planting industry can be said to be the right time, right place and right people. This is the best and most suitable industry with great prospects. During this visit to the west, the General Secretary once again paid attention to the local "fruit of wealth", focusing on understanding the development of characteristic modern mountain fruit industry and other situations. △ Nanshan Huaniu Apple Base in Maiji District. (Photo taken by CCTV reporter Li Bing) General Secretary Xi Jinping said, "Chinese civilization is a civilization that reforms the old and establishes the new, and its glory is renewed day by day. The deep flow of quiet waters is intertwined with the magnificent waves. " At an important time node, the General Secretary visited two famous western cities, not only looking for history, but also guiding practice, not only paying attention to ecology, but also caring about people's livelihood, not only based in the west, but also looking at the whole country, which contains far-reaching strategic considerations. Continuing the historical context and composing a contemporary chapter, Chinese-style modernization strides forward. [Editor: Wan Yueying]

title: 非洲媒体：非中合作新举措将推动非中携手迈向现代化_中非_峰会_经济
summary: 2024-09-14 08:34 来源: 人民网 发布于： 北京市 9月4日至6日，2024年中非合作论坛北京峰会在中国举行。国家主席习近平宣布将实施中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动，引起非洲媒体热烈反响。非洲媒体盛赞本次峰会成果丰硕，非中合作新举措将推动非中迈向现代化，为非中人民带来实实在在的经济利益。 坦桑尼亚官方英文报纸《每日新闻报》刊发题为《2024中非合作论坛北京峰会召开，非洲前途光明》的...
text: 2024-09-14 08:34 来源: 人民网 发布于： 北京市 9月4日至6日，2024年中非合作论坛北京峰会在中国举行。国家主席习近平宣布将实施中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动，引起非洲媒体热烈反响。非洲媒体盛赞本次峰会成果丰硕，非中合作新举措将推动非中迈向现代化，为非中人民带来实实在在的经济利益。 坦桑尼亚官方英文报纸《每日新闻报》刊发题为《2024中非合作论坛北京峰会召开，非洲前途光明》的文章。文章表示，此次峰会为非洲国家和中国提供了一个交流思想、达成协议和制定战略的平台，旨在加强经济合作和促进非洲的可持续发展。非中双方相互尊重、平等相待、合作共赢。非中合作改变了非洲的命运，必将作为国际合作的典范载入史册，非方愿同中方一道，落实好峰会成果和双方共识，深化非中友谊，实现共同发展和共同繁荣。 肯尼亚《人民报》刊发评论文章称，非中合作互利共赢。在日前举行的2024年中非合作论坛北京峰会上，中方宣布采取支持非洲基础设施、农业、绿色能源等诸多领域的新举措，将有力助推非洲发展。非洲拥有丰富的资源、优质的劳动力和大量未被开发的绿色能源。以绿色能源为例，拥有先进技术的中国可以为非洲释放巨大的可再生能源潜力，为工业提供源源不断的能源动力，有助于非中携手推进工业化进程，创造更多就业岗位，造福民生。 津巴布韦《先驱报》刊文称，近年来津中合作成果丰硕，双边贸易大幅增长，卫生和农业领域合作紧密。中国在津修建水电站、机场，改善基础设施面貌，推动了津巴布韦现代化进程，助力该国实现2030年愿景。中国发展取得的巨大成就，鼓舞着发展中国家走符合自身国情的现代化道路。习近平主席宣布将实施中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动，这必将有力推动津巴布韦等非洲国家的工业化和现代化。此次峰会强调经贸合作，鼓励投资和基础设施建设，支持可持续发展和减贫，促进人文交流和文化合作，推动非中携手迈向现代化。 尼日利亚《民族报》刊文称，2024年中非合作论坛北京峰会成果丰硕，尼中两国双边和外交关系得到进一步强化。尼中强调加强基础设施合作，有望提高尼日利亚出口驱动型工业生产能力，加快尼工业化进程并促进经济长期增长。尼中加强安全合作不仅有助于保护投资，还有助于加强尼日利亚的整体经济稳定，这对于吸引外国直接投资至关重要。尼中合作有助于提升尼工业能力、释放尼经济潜力，还将为中国进入不断增长的非洲市场提供更多便利，为人民带来实实在在的经济利益。 南非独立在线网站发表评论文章表示，习近平主席在2024年中非合作论坛北京峰会发表主旨讲话，深刻阐述了中非携手实现现代化的理念将如何引领世界进入和平、 安全与稳定的新时代。 习近平主席宣布的对非合作新举措，将加强非中经济联系并刺激非洲在基础设施建设、能源、农业等关键经济领域的增长，促进非洲迈进现代化。中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动将为更美好的未来铺平道路，不让任何一个人掉队。 返回搜狐，查看更多 责任编辑： 平台声明：该文观点仅代表作者本人，搜狐号系信息发布平台，搜狐仅提供信息存储空间服务。
translated_summary: 2024-09-14 08:34 Source: People's Daily Online Published in: Beijing From September 4 to 6, the 2024 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation was held in China. President Xi Jinping announced that China and Africa will implement the Ten Major Partnership Actions for Jointly Promoting Modernization, which has aroused enthusiastic response from African media. African media praised the fruitful results of this summit, saying that the new measures for China-Africa cooperation will promote the modernization of Africa and China and bring tangible economic benefits to the people of Africa and China. Tanzania's official English newspaper, the Daily News, published an article entitled "The 2024 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation was held, and Africa has a bright future." The article stated that the summit provided a platform for African countries and China to exchange ideas, reach agreements and formulate strategies, aiming to strengthen economic cooperation and promote sustainable development in Africa. Africa and China respect each other, treat each other as equals, and cooperate for win-win results. China-Africa cooperation has changed the destiny of Africa and will surely go down in history as a model of international cooperation. Africa is willing to work with China to implement the outcomes of the summit and the consensus of both sides, deepen China-Africa friendship, and achieve common development and common prosperity. Kenya's People's Daily published a commentary saying that China-Africa cooperation is mutually beneficial and win-win. At the 2024 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, China announced new measures to support Africa's infrastructure, agriculture, green energy and many other fields, which will effectively promote Africa's development. Africa has rich resources, high-quality labor and a large amount of untapped green energy. Taking green energy as an example, China, with its advanced technology, can release huge renewable energy potential for Africa, provide a steady stream of energy power for industry, and help Africa and China to jointly promote the industrialization process, create more jobs and benefit people's livelihood. Zimbabwe's Herald published an article saying that in recent years, Zimbabwe-China cooperation has achieved fruitful results, bilateral trade has increased significantly, and cooperation in the fields of health and agriculture has been close. China has built hydropower stations and airports in Zimbabwe to improve the appearance of infrastructure, promote Zimbabwe's modernization process, and help the country achieve its 2030 vision. The great achievements made in China's development have inspired developing countries to take a path of modernization that suits their national conditions. President Xi Jinping announced that the China-Africa Jointly Promote Modernization Ten Partnership Actions will be implemented, which will surely strongly promote the industrialization and modernization of African countries such as Zimbabwe. The summit emphasized economic and trade cooperation, encouraged investment and infrastructure construction, supported sustainable development and poverty reduction, promoted cultural exchanges and cultural cooperation, and promoted Africa and China to work together towards modernization. Nigeria's "Nation" newspaper published an article saying that the 2024 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation was fruitful, and the bilateral and diplomatic relations between Nigeria and China were further strengthened. Nigeria and China emphasized strengthening infrastructure cooperation, which is expected to improve Nigeria's export-driven industrial production capacity, accelerate Nigeria's industrialization process and promote long-term economic growth. Strengthening security cooperation between Nigeria and China will not only help protect investment, but also help strengthen Nigeria's overall economic stability, which is crucial to attracting foreign direct investment. Nigeria-China cooperation will help enhance Nigeria's industrial capacity and unleash Nigeria's economic potential. It will also provide more convenience for China to enter the growing African market and bring tangible economic benefits to the people. South Africa's Independent Online website published a commentary article stating that President Xi Jinping delivered a keynote speech at the 2024 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, profoundly expounding how the concept of China and Africa working together to achieve modernization will lead the world into a new era of peace, security and stability. The new measures for cooperation with Africa announced by President Xi Jinping will strengthen economic ties between China and Africa and stimulate growth in key economic sectors such as infrastructure construction, energy, and agriculture, and promote Africa's modernization. The China-Africa cooperation in promoting modernization will pave the way for a better future and leave no one behind. Return to Sohu to see more Editor: Platform statement: The views of this article only represent the author himself. Sohu account is an information release platform. Sohu only provides information storage space services.

title: 零关税待遇 zero-tariff treatment
summary: 根据国务院关税税则委员会发布的公告，为扩大对最不发达国家单边开放，实现共同发展，自2024年12月1日起，对原产于同中国建交的最不发达国家100%税目产品适用税率为零的特惠税率。 China will give all the least developed countries having diplomatic relations with China zero-tariff treatment...
text: 根据国务院关税税则委员会发布的公告，为扩大对最不发达国家单边开放，实现共同发展，自2024年12月1日起，对原产于同中国建交的最不发达国家100%税目产品适用税率为零的特惠税率。 China will give all the least developed countries having diplomatic relations with China zero-tariff treatment for 100 percent tariff lines, according to a statement from the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council. The treatment, effective from Dec. 1 of this year, aims to expand unilateral opening to the least developed countries and achieve common development, the statement said. 2023年9月27日，在位于厄立特里亚阿斯马拉的农业技术援助项目示范地，中国援厄第三期高级农业专家组豆类作物专家刘运民（右）指导当地农户进行蚕豆作物的田间管理。图片来源：新华社 【知识点】 零关税是指进出口商品在经过一国关境时，由政府设置的海关不向进出口国征收关税。 9月5日，习近平主席在中非合作论坛北京峰会开幕式上的主旨讲话中宣布，中方愿主动单方面扩大市场开放，决定给予包括33个非洲国家在内的所有同中国建交的最不发达国家100%税目产品零关税待遇，成为实施这一举措的首个发展中大国和世界主要经济体，推动中国大市场成为非洲大机遇。国务院关税税则委员会发布公告，自2024年12月1日起，对原产于同中国建交的最不发达国家100%税目产品适用税率为零的特惠税率。其中，关税配额产品仅将配额内关税税率降为零，配额外关税税率不变。 给予最不发达国家100%税目产品零关税待遇，将有利于促进中非经贸合作，推动共筑高水平中非命运共同体，有利于帮助最不发达国家发展，实现互利共赢。 【重要讲话】 中国始终是'全球南方'的一员，永远属于发展中国家。中国将积极扩大从其他发展中国家的进口，加强贸易、投资、发展合作，助力落实联合国2030年可持续发展议程。 China will always be a member of the Global South and the developing world. China will actively seek to import more from other developing countries, step up cooperation in trade, investment and development, and help implement the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. ——2024年6月12日，习近平向联合国贸易和发展会议成立60周年庆祝活动开幕式发表的视频致辞 【相关词汇】 中非命运共同体 China-Africa community with a shared future 经贸合作 economic and trade cooperation 中国日报网英语点津工作室（本文于'学习强国'学习平台首发） 【责任编辑：陈丹妮】
translated_summary: China will give all the least developed countries having diplomatic relations with China zero-tariff treatment for 100 percent tariff lines, according to a statement from the Customs Tariff Commission of the State Council. The treatment, effective from Dec. 1 of this year, aims to expand unilateral opening to the least developed countries and achieve common development, the statement said. Liu Yunmin (right), a pulse crop expert of the third phase of the Chinese-aided Eritrea senior agricultural expert group, guides local farmers in field management of broad bean crops at the demonstration site of the agricultural technical assistance project in Asmara, Eritrea, on Sept. 27, 2023. Image source: Xinhua News Agency [Knowledge point] Zero tariff means that when imported and exported goods pass through the customs border of a country, the customs set up by the government does not collect tariffs from the importing and exporting countries. On September 5, President Xi Jinping announced in his keynote speech at the opening ceremony of the Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation that China is willing to take the initiative to unilaterally expand market opening and decide to grant zero tariff treatment to 100% of tariff items of all the least developed countries that have established diplomatic relations with China, including 33 African countries, becoming the first major developing country and major world economy to implement this measure, and promoting the Chinese market to become a great opportunity for Africa. The Tariff Commission of the State Council issued an announcement that from December 1, 2024, a preferential tariff rate of zero will be applied to 100% of tariff items of products originating from the least developed countries that have established diplomatic relations with China. Among them, tariff quota products will only reduce the tariff rate within the quota to zero, and the tariff rate outside the quota will remain unchanged. Granting zero tariff treatment to 100% of tariff items of the least developed countries will be conducive to promoting China-Africa economic and trade cooperation, promoting the building of a high-level China-Africa community with a shared future, and helping the least developed countries develop and achieve mutual benefit and win-win results. [Important Speech] China has always been a member of the 'Global South' and will always belong to developing countries. China will actively expand imports from other developing countries, strengthen trade, investment and development cooperation, and help implement the UN 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. China will always be a member of the Global South and the developing world. China will actively seek to import more from other developing countries, step up cooperation in trade, investment and development, and help implement the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. -- On June 12, 2024, Xi Jinping delivered a video speech at the opening ceremony of the celebration of the 60th anniversary of the founding of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development [Related words] China-Africa community with a shared future economic and trade cooperation China Daily English Studio (This article was first published on the 'Study Strong Country' learning platform) [Editor: Chen Danni]

title: 向非洲提供三千六百亿 习近平用意何在？
summary: 第九届中非合作论坛北京峰会正在举行。中国国家主席习近平周四（9月5日）宣布，将在未来三年向非洲国家提供三千六百亿元人民币的资金支持。有数据表明，中国对非洲的贷款近年已大幅下降。中国这次重新向非洲注入大笔资金其用意何在？ 中非合作论坛进行到第二天，中国国家主席习近平在开幕式的主旨讲话中宣布，将在未来三年向非洲国家提供三千六百亿元人民币的资金支持。 但有数据表明，中国近年来已经大幅削减对非洲的贷款；同...
text: 第九届中非合作论坛北京峰会正在举行。中国国家主席习近平周四（9月5日）宣布，将在未来三年向非洲国家提供三千六百亿元人民币的资金支持。有数据表明，中国对非洲的贷款近年已大幅下降。中国这次重新向非洲注入大笔资金其用意何在？ 中非合作论坛进行到第二天，中国国家主席习近平在开幕式的主旨讲话中宣布，将在未来三年向非洲国家提供三千六百亿元人民币的资金支持。 但有数据表明，中国近年来已经大幅削减对非洲的贷款；同时，中国此前通过'一带一路倡议'向非洲国家提供的大量贷款，在国际社会一再引起有关中国是否让非洲国家陷入'债务陷阱'的辩论。习近平在此时宣布这笔三千六百亿援非资金，引发了外界的广泛关注和质疑。 重新大笔投入 据彭博社报道，波士顿大学全球发展政策研究中心（Global Development Policy Center）的最新数据表明，中国通过其国有政策性银行对非洲的传统贷款从2000年的近一亿美元激增至2016年的288亿美元，成为非洲最大的双边债权国；但这一数字随后下降，尤其在疫情期间，2022年降至仅约10亿美元，2023年又回升至46亿美元。 曾长期驻非洲的美国前外交官、乔治·华盛顿大学兼任教授大卫·希恩(Dr. David Hamilton Shinn)对本台分析说，从这些数据可以看出，这些年中，中国和非洲国家正摆脱以传统贷款方式为主的经济合作。 但习近平在开幕式上提到，这次总额为三千六百亿元人民币的援非资金中包括两千一百亿信贷、八百亿各类援助，以及中国企业对非投资不少于七百亿元人民币。这个资金量相对于前几年有大幅提升。 对于中国再次提升对非洲的资金投入，来自南非的美国霍华德大学（Howard University）非洲研究中心副主任菲沃库勒博士（Dr. Phiwokuhle Mnyandu）认为，这可能主要是出于国际竞争的压力，'中国过去几年降低对非洲的贷款或援助，实际上留下了一些影响力的真空，很快被其他国家占据，这次中国的举动可以看作是他们想重新夺回他们在非洲的地位，继续维护与这些非洲国家的关系。'他提到，中国在非洲面临的竞争，不仅来自西方国家，也包括印度、土耳其等新势力。 新的合作方式 在仍然依靠传统的贷款和援助方式之外，外界已经注意到中国与非洲国家的合作方式正在转向'政府与社会资本合作'的新型模式。 就在这次中非合作论坛召开前，国务院推进'一带一路'建设工作领导小组办公室于8月29日发布了《中国—非洲国家共建'一带一路'发展报告》，其中提到，中国企业以政府和社会资本合作(PPP)以及三方、多方合作等模式在非洲实施了多个互联互通项目，实现了较好的经济效益和社会效益。 彭博社在报道中提及了这一趋势，但指出，这种合作方式允许非洲国家政府在不增加主权债务的同时，仍然能向中国借钱。报道中提到了几内亚的西芒杜铁矿（Simandou），中国宝武钢铁集团和中国铝业股份有限公司两家公司控制了这个铁矿40%的股份。但这两家公司都是中国国资全资公司。 希恩教授对这种合作方式持怀疑态度，他分析说，所谓政府与社会资本合作就是允许私人资本进入这些公共项目，但它们所占的资金比并不大，所能起到的作用还有待观察。他强调，这种公共与私人资金合作的方式在中国国内有一定的经验，可能中国政府主要是想在其他国家复制这种经验。 在另一面，据彭博社的报道，在这种新的合作方式中，中资合作方可以用非洲国家的铜矿等矿藏作为项目后期支付的担保，而这些合作条款往往是不透明的，外界难以得知详情。 菲沃库勒博士分析说，这种合作方式实际上并不新颖，这让他想到了非洲国家早期和西方公司合作的过程中，也有类似的方式，最后往往以矿藏资源作为补偿，'这种公共和私人资本合作的方式所受到的监控往往比民族国家之间的合作要少，这种情况下，非洲国家所做的让步往往还要多一些，因为与他们打交道的是私人机构（银行）。' 路透社在五月底的一篇报道中指出，政府和社会资本合作(PPP)的方式在非洲尚未产生显著的吸引力。 非洲国家的反应 本次中非合作论坛有五十三个非洲国家的国家元首、政府首脑或代表团团长参与。到目前为止，其中不少国家都与中国签订了新的合作协议。 尼日利亚与中国共同宣布了在基础设施领域合作建设 '运输、港口和自由贸易区'。中国向坦桑尼亚总统哈桑承诺，与赞比亚之间的铁路项目。习近平也向肯尼亚承诺将向其农产品开放中国市场。国际上一直争论中国通过'一带一路倡议'让非洲国家陷入债务陷阱，这似乎并未阻碍中非合作论坛上这些合作意向的达成。 菲沃库勒博指出，中国与非洲国家的关系必须具体深入到每个非洲国家与中国的双边关系中去分析，因为非洲国家差别较大，'穷的国家不会把这些与中国的债务看作是陷阱，因为你不可能从天堂获得发展的资金，钱总得有来处，中国在某种时候似乎是唯一能给钱的国家。'他举例说，布隆迪、刚果共和国等国家可以归入此类。 但经济情况相对较好，与西方国家打交道比较多的非洲国家看法则可能不同，比如像南非这样的国家，可能更认同西方所提出的在共享价值观的基础上建立合作。
translated_summary:
The 9th Forum on China-Africa Cooperation Beijing Summit is being held. Chinese President Xi Jinping announced on Thursday (September 5) that he would provide 360 billion yuan in financial support to African countries in the next three years. Data shows that China's loans to Africa have dropped significantly in recent years. What is China’s intention in reinjecting large sums of money into Africa this time?
 The day after the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, Chinese President Xi Jinping announced in his keynote speech at the opening ceremony that he would provide 360 billion yuan in financial support to African countries in the next three years.
 However, some data show that China has significantly reduced its loans to Africa in recent years; at the same time, China's previous large loans to African countries through the 'Belt and Road Initiative' have repeatedly caused controversy in the international community about whether China has plunged African countries into a 'debt trap' debate. Xi Jinping announced this 360 billion aid fund to Africa at this time, which aroused widespread attention and doubts from the outside world.
 Reinvest big money
 According to Bloomberg, the latest data from Boston University’s Global Development Policy Center shows that China’s traditional lending to Africa through its state-owned policy banks surged from nearly $100 million in 2000 to $28.8 billion in 2016, becoming Africa’s largest bilateral creditor; but this number subsequently fell, especially during the epidemic It dropped to only about $1 billion in 2022 and rose back to $4.6 billion in 2023.
 David Sheehan, a long-time former U.S. diplomat in Africa and adjunct professor at George Washington University (Dr  David Hamilton Shinn) analyzed for this station and said that from these data, it can be seen that in recent years, China and African countries have been getting rid of economic cooperation that is mainly based on traditional lending methods.
 However, Xi Jinping mentioned at the opening ceremony that the total aid funds to Africa this time, which are 360 billion yuan, include 210 billion in credit, 80 billion in various types of aid, and Chinese companies investing no less than 70 billion yuan in Africa. Ten billion yuan. This amount of funds has increased significantly compared with previous years.
 Regarding China's renewed investment in Africa, Dr. Fivokule, deputy director of the African Studies Center at Howard University in South Africa  Phiwokuhle Mnyandu believes that this may be mainly due to the pressure of international competition. 'China's reduction of loans or aid to Africa in the past few years has actually left some influence vacuum and was soon occupied by other countries. This time China's move can be seen as They want to regain their position in Africa and continue to maintain relations with these African countries.' He mentioned that the competition China faces in Africa not only comes from Western countries, but also includes new forces such as India and Turkey.
 New ways of working together
 In addition to still relying on traditional loan and aid methods, the outside world has noticed that China's cooperation methods with African countries are shifting to a new model of 'government-social capital cooperation'.
 Just before the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation was held, the Office of the State Council Leading Group for Promoting the Construction of the 'Belt and Road' released the 《 China— African Countries Co-Build the 'Belt and Road' Development Report on August 29, which mentioned that Chinese enterprises A number of connectivity projects have been implemented in Africa through government-social capital cooperation 》PPP( and trilateral and multi-party cooperation Achieve better economic and social benefits.
 Bloomberg mentioned this trend in the report, but pointed out that this cooperative approach allows African governments to still borrow money from China without increasing sovereign debt. The report mentioned the Simandou iron ore mine in Guinea. Two companies, China Baowu Steel Group and China Aluminum Co., Ltd., control 40% of the iron ore mine. But both companies are wholly state-owned companies in China.
 Professor Sheehan is skeptical of this method of cooperation. He analyzed that the so-called cooperation between the government and social capital is to allow private capital to enter these public projects, but they do not account for a large proportion of funds, and the role they can play remains to be seen. He emphasized that this method of cooperation between public and private funds has certain experience in China, and the Chinese government may mainly want to replicate this experience in other countries.
 On the other hand, according to Bloomberg, in this new cooperation method, Chinese partners can use copper mines and other mineral deposits in African countries as guarantees for later payment of projects, and the terms of these cooperation are often opaque and difficult for the outside world to know. details.
 Dr. Fivokule analyzed that this method of cooperation is actually not new, which reminds him that in the early process of cooperation between African countries and Western companies, there were similar methods, and in the end, mineral resources were often used as compensation,' This method of cooperation between public and private capital is often less monitored than cooperation between nation-states, in this case African countries often make more concessions because they deal with private institutions (banks). '
 Reuters pointed out in a report at the end of May that the way governments and social capital cooperate (PPP) has not yet produced significant appeal in Africa.
 African countries' responses
 This Forum on China-Africa Cooperation involves heads of state, heads of government or heads of delegations from fifty-three African countries. So far, many of these countries have signed new cooperation agreements with China.
 Nigeria and China jointly announced cooperation in the construction of a 'transportation, port and free trade area' in the field of infrastructure. China has promised Tanzanian President Hassan a railway project with Zambia. Xi Jinping also promised Kenya that he would open the Chinese market to its agricultural products. There has been international debate that China has plunged African countries into a debt trap through the 'Belt and Road Initiative', which does not seem to have hindered the achievement of these cooperation intentions at the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation.
 Fivokulebo pointed out that China's relations with African countries must be analyzed in detail and deeply into each African country's bilateral relations with China, because African countries are very different. 'Poor countries will not regard these debts with China as It's a trap, because you can't get development funds from heaven, money has to come from somewhere, and China seems to be the only country that can give money at some point.' For example, he said that countries such as Burundi and the Republic of Congo could be classified into this category.
 However, the economic situation is relatively good, and African countries that deal more with Western countries may have different views. For example, countries like South Africa may agree more with the West's proposal to establish cooperation based on shared values.

title: 中非新時代 習近平：中非將掀起「全球南方」現代化熱潮
summary: 2024年中非合作論壇北京峰會5日在人民大會堂開幕。中國國家主席習近平出席開幕式並發表題為《攜手推進現代化，共築命運共同體》的主旨講話。 綜合陸媒報導，習近平指出，中非友好穿越時空、跨越山海、薪火相傳。2000年中非合作論壇成立，在中非關係歷史上具有重要里程碑意義。24年來特別是新時代以來，中國同非洲兄弟姐妹們本著真實親誠理念，攜手前行。 習近平稱，中非在世界百年變局中肩並肩、手把手，堅定捍衛彼此...
text: 2024年中非合作論壇北京峰會5日在人民大會堂開幕。中國國家主席習近平出席開幕式並發表題為《攜手推進現代化，共築命運共同體》的主旨講話。 綜合陸媒報導，習近平指出，中非友好穿越時空、跨越山海、薪火相傳。2000年中非合作論壇成立，在中非關係歷史上具有重要里程碑意義。24年來特別是新時代以來，中國同非洲兄弟姐妹們本著真實親誠理念，攜手前行。 習近平稱，中非在世界百年變局中肩並肩、手把手，堅定捍衛彼此正當權益；在經濟全球化大潮中強筋骨、壯體魄，累累碩果惠及中非億萬百姓；在大災大疫面前同甘苦、共拼搏，書寫一個個中非友好的感人故事；始終相互理解、彼此支援，樹立新型國際關係的典範。 習近平稱，中非共逐現代化之夢，必將掀起全球南方現代化熱潮，譜寫構建人類命運共同體的嶄新篇章。要攜手推進公正合理的現代化。要攜手推進開放共贏的現代化。要攜手推進人民至上的現代化。要攜手推進多元包容的現代化。要攜手推進生態友好的現代化。要攜手推進和平安全的現代化。 習近平還當場宣布，中國與所有非洲建交國的雙邊關係提升到戰略關係層面，中非關係整體定位提升至新時代全天候中非命運共同體。習近平指出，經過近70年的辛勤耕耘，中非關係正處於歷史最好時期。 習近平強調，面向未來，他提議，將中國與所有非洲建交國的雙邊關係提升到戰略關係層面，將中非關係整體定位提升至新時代全天候中非命運共同體。
translated_summary: The 2024 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation opened at the Great Hall of the People on the 5th. Chinese President Xi Jinping attended the opening ceremony and delivered a keynote speech entitled "Join Hands to Promote Modernization and Build a Community with a Shared Future". According to reports from mainland media, Xi Jinping pointed out that China-Africa friendship transcends time and space, crosses mountains and seas, and is passed on from generation to generation. The establishment of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation in 2000 is an important milestone in the history of China-Africa relations. Over the past 24 years, especially since the new era, China and African brothers and sisters have moved forward hand in hand in the spirit of sincerity, affinity and honesty. Xi Jinping said that China and Africa have stood shoulder to shoulder and hand in hand in the midst of a century of change in the world, firmly defending each other's legitimate rights and interests; they have strengthened their muscles and bodies in the tide of economic globalization, and their fruitful results have benefited hundreds of millions of people in China and Africa; they have shared joys and sorrows and worked together in the face of disasters and epidemics, writing touching stories of China-Africa friendship; they have always understood and supported each other, setting an example of a new type of international relations. Xi Jinping said that China and Africa's common dream of modernization will surely set off a wave of modernization in the global South and write a new chapter in building a community with a shared future for mankind. We must work together to promote fair and reasonable modernization. We must work together to promote open and win-win modernization. We must work together to promote people-first modernization. We must work together to promote diversified and inclusive modernization. We should work together to promote ecologically friendly modernization. We should work together to promote peaceful and secure modernization. Xi Jinping also announced on the spot that China's bilateral relations with all African countries that have diplomatic ties with China have been elevated to the level of strategic relations, and the overall positioning of China-Africa relations has been elevated to the all-weather China-Africa community with a shared future in the new era. Xi Jinping pointed out that after nearly 70 years of hard work, China-Africa relations are at their best in history. Xi Jinping emphasized that looking to the future, he proposed to elevate China's bilateral relations with all African countries that have diplomatic ties with China to the level of strategic relations, and to elevate the overall positioning of China-Africa relations to the all-weather China-Africa community with a shared future in the new era.

title: 时政微观察丨中非一家亲 共享发展成果
summary: 2 4JGxp63G8HC world.huanqiu.com article 时政微观察丨中非一家亲 共享发展成果 /e3pmh22ph/e3pn61ka0 初秋的北京，迎来中非大家庭的盛事——2024年中非合作论坛峰会。中非领导人将再次聚首北京，围绕'携手推进现代化，共筑高水平中非命运共同体'这一主题，共叙友情，共商合作，共话未来。 '中国是世界上最大的发展中国家，非洲是发展中国家最集中的大陆...
text: 2 4JGxp63G8HC world.huanqiu.com article 时政微观察丨中非一家亲 共享发展成果 /e3pmh22ph/e3pn61ka0 初秋的北京，迎来中非大家庭的盛事——2024年中非合作论坛峰会。中非领导人将再次聚首北京，围绕'携手推进现代化，共筑高水平中非命运共同体'这一主题，共叙友情，共商合作，共话未来。 '中国是世界上最大的发展中国家，非洲是发展中国家最集中的大陆，中非早已结成休戚与共的命运共同体。'6年前的9月3日，习近平主席在2018年中非合作论坛北京峰会开幕式上的一席话，道出中国和非洲虽远隔重洋却心心相印的情谊。 新时代以来，习近平主席高度重视中非关系，亲自擘画、亲力亲为，引领中非合作达到前所未有的新高度。在元首外交引领下，无数手牵手、心连心的友好合作故事，汇聚成一幅中非携手开创未来的生动画卷。 '患难之交不能忘' 在坦桑尼亚港口城市达累斯萨拉姆西郊，援坦中国专家公墓庄严肃静。'异国青山埋忠骨，往昔峥嵘今犹酣'，碑上的一字一句印刻着一段可歌可泣的中非交往史。 20世纪70年代，数万名中国专家和技术人员远涉重洋来到非洲，同坦桑尼亚和赞比亚人民并肩奋斗，用汗水和鲜血乃至生命筑成了被誉为友谊之路、自由之路的坦赞铁路。 2013年3月，当选国家主席后首次出访非洲，习近平主席来到坦桑尼亚。他冒着细雨来到援坦中国专家公墓，缅怀长眠于此的烈士。习主席称颂他们是'铸就中坦、中非友谊丰碑的英雄'。 '中非一家亲。我这个年纪的中国人，从小就是在中非友好的热烈气氛中长大的，对非洲有很浓厚的兴趣，熟知一些非洲国家老一代领导人的名字，熟知坦赞铁路等中非友好佳话。'在出访前夕接受金砖国家媒体联合采访时，习近平主席深情讲述中非关系。 正是在这次非洲之行中，习近平主席首次提出真实亲诚对非政策理念和正确义利观，宣示中非永远做可靠朋友和真诚伙伴。 友谊的丰碑永不褪色，中非是休戚与共的命运共同体。 今年5月，来华进行国事访问的赤道几内亚总统奥比昂在北京同云南金平苗族瑶族傣族自治县一所小学的师生代表视频连线。2015年4月，对中国进行国事访问期间，奥比昂总统宣布为金平县捐建'中国—赤道几内亚友谊小学'。9年来，已经有2000多个孩子从这里毕业。 在津巴布韦，中国政府援建的水井项目让当地居民用上清洁安全水。当地居民说，中国援助的水井是'拯救生命的礼物'，将认真爱护，使其成为经得起岁月考验的'友谊井'。 11年来，中国与非洲国家共建'一带一路'取得巨大合作成效。比如，在卫生健康方面，中国在非洲援建了130多家医院和诊所，向45个非洲国家派遣中国医疗队，与46家非洲医院建立对口合作机制，帮助非洲国家提升医疗卫生水平。 习近平主席深刻总结：'中非关系不是一天就发展起来的，更不是什么人赐予的，而是我们双方风雨同舟、患难与共，一步一个脚印走出来的。''中国和非洲国家是患难之交，患难之交不能忘。' 中国秉持真实亲诚理念，同非洲朋友一道，从中非友好合作精神中汲取力量，推动中非关系不断迈上新台阶。 '共享发展成果' 经过7年试种，由上海市农业生物基因中心研发的面向非洲的节水抗旱稻，有望于今年年内在肯尼亚通过新品种审定。这将为80%以上大米依赖进口的肯尼亚带来粮食自给的新希望，为消除饥饿和贫困作出新贡献。 这是中非合作的生动缩影。 习近平主席曾说：'中非关系最大的'义'，就是用中国发展助力非洲的发展，最终实现互利共赢、共同发展。''我们愿同非洲兄弟并肩奋斗，共享发展成果，共同走上让人民生活更加美好的幸福之路。' 从2015年提出中非共同实施'十大合作计划'，到2018年提出重点实施'八大行动'，再到2021年宣布中非务实合作'九项工程'……在习近平主席引领下，中非合作论坛不断发展壮大，中非多领域合作取得丰硕成果。 在中非合作论坛机制下，中国企业为非洲新增和升级铁路超过1万公里、公路近10万公里、桥梁近千座、港口近百个，为推进非洲大陆互联互通作出重要贡献。 截至去年底，中国已在非洲建成24个农业技术示范中心，推广了300多项先进农业技术，惠及100多万非洲小农户。 随着非洲农产品输华'绿色通道'等举措落地见效，肯尼亚的牛油果、坦桑尼亚的芝麻、塞内加尔的花生、南非的鲜梨等一大批农产品进入中国市场，成为中非贸易新的增长点。 中非共同实施数百个清洁能源发电和电网项目，点亮了非洲大陆万家灯火，照亮了非洲可持续发展之路。 中国以实际行动证明，无论中国发展到哪一步，始终对非洲朋友以诚相待，真心实意为非洲发展提供支持。 '携手推进现代化事业' '现代化'是中非发展共同的命题，是当今中国和非洲最恢弘的乐章。 中华大地上生长出来的现代化，描绘了现代化另一幅图景，创造了人类文明的新形态。中国实践向探索中的非洲分享了一个深刻道理：世界上既不存在定于一尊的现代化模式，也不存在放之四海而皆准的现代化标准。 '什么样的发展道路最适合非洲，非洲人民最有发言权。推进一体化是非洲国家和人民自主选择的现代化道路。中国一直予以坚定支持并愿做非洲现代化道路的同行者。'去年8月，在南非约翰内斯堡举行的中非领导人对话会上，习近平主席生动阐释。 对话会上，面向未来，习近平主席提出3项务实举措：中方愿发起'支持非洲工业化倡议'，愿实施'中国助力非洲农业现代化计划'，愿实施'中非人才培养合作计划'。 如今，中非双方同心协力，为实现各自发展愿景创造良好环境—— 中国在非洲已建成17个鲁班工坊，不仅促进了非洲职业教育发展创新，也为当地制造业和科技产业发展注入新动力。 今年7月底，中非共同制定并发布《中非数字合作发展行动计划》，双方将推广普及数字技术，加快各领域数字化转型，未来3年共建10个数字转型示范项目，共同培养1000名数字人才。 今年以来，中国援刚果（布）农业技术示范中心好消息不断：豇豆、螺丝椒大获丰收；玉米新品种试种成功，亩产近700公斤，是当地品种产量的3倍以上……刚果（布）农业部部长保罗·恩戈博表示，增加产量、提高生产效率、发展木薯加工业，农民收入大幅提高，生活条件得以改善。'中国农业专家到来之前，这些成果我们不能想象。' 中国正在向第二个百年奋斗目标迈进，非洲也正朝着非盟《2063年议程》描绘的美好愿景加速前行。中非合作与时俱进、提质升级，正呈现出更广阔的前景和更光明的未来。 习近平主席指出：'面对百年变局，中非关系行得稳、中非合作搞得好，全球发展就有更多新动能，世界就有更多稳定性。' 秉持'真诚友好、平等相待，互利共赢、共同发展，主持公道、捍卫正义，顺应时势、开放包容'的中非友好合作精神，中非双方休戚与共、并肩奋斗。 这是中非友好关系继往开来的力量源泉，也是28亿中非人民的共同选择。 总监制丨闫帅南 王姗姗 监制丨耿志民 制片人丨兴来 宁黎黎 执笔丨张亚楠 视觉丨江雨航 审校丨杨彩云 1725247491522 责编：王丹 央视新闻客户端 1725247491522 1 2
