translated_summary: 2 4JGxp63G8HC world.huanqiu.com article Current Affairs Micro-Observation丨China and Africa are one family, sharing the fruits of development /e3pmh22ph/e3pn61ka0 In early autumn, Beijing welcomes the grand event of the China-Africa family-the 2024 Forum on China-Africa Cooperation Summit. Chinese and African leaders will gather in Beijing again to discuss friendship, cooperation and the future around the theme of "joining hands to promote modernization and build a high-level China-Africa community with a shared future". "China is the largest developing country in the world, and Africa is the continent with the most concentrated developing countries. China and Africa have long formed a community with a shared future. "On September 3, six years ago, President Xi Jinping's speech at the opening ceremony of the 2018 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation expressed the friendship between China and Africa, although they are separated by oceans. Since the new era, President Xi Jinping has attached great importance to China-Africa relations, personally planned and personally led China-Africa cooperation to an unprecedented new height. Under the guidance of the diplomacy of heads of state, countless stories of friendly cooperation, hand in hand and heart to heart, have gathered into a vivid picture of China and Africa working together to create the future. 'Friends in need should never be forgotten' In the western suburbs of the Tanzanian port city of Dar es Salaam, the cemetery of Chinese experts who assisted Tanzania is solemn and quiet. 'Loyal bones are buried in the green mountains of a foreign country, and the past is still alive today', every word on the monument is engraved with a touching history of China-Africa exchanges. In the 1970s, tens of thousands of Chinese experts and technicians traveled across the ocean to Africa, worked side by side with the people of Tanzania and Zambia, and built the Tanzania-Zambia Railway, known as the road of friendship and freedom, with sweat, blood and even life. In March 2013, President Xi Jinping visited Tanzania for the first time after being elected President of the People's Republic of China. He braved the drizzle to visit the cemetery of Chinese experts who assisted Tanzania to pay tribute to the martyrs who were buried there. President Xi praised them as 'heroes who have built a monument of China-Tanzania and China-Africa friendship'. 'China and Africa are one family. Chinese people of my age have grown up in the warm atmosphere of China-Africa friendship. They have a strong interest in Africa, are familiar with the names of some older leaders of African countries, and are familiar with China-Africa friendship stories such as the Tanzania-Zambia Railway. 'In a joint interview with BRICS media on the eve of his visit, President Xi Jinping spoke affectionately about China-Africa relations. It was during this trip to Africa that President Xi Jinping first proposed the policy concept of "real, pro-China and good faith" towards Africa and the correct concept of justice and interests, declaring that China and Africa will always be reliable friends and sincere partners. The monument of friendship will never fade, and China and Africa are a community of shared destiny. In May this year, President Obiang of Equatorial Guinea, who was on a state visit to China, had a video link with teachers and students of a primary school in Jinping Miao, Yao and Dai Autonomous County, Yunnan Province, in Beijing. In April 2015, during his state visit to China, President Obiang announced the donation of the "China-Equatorial Guinea Friendship Primary School" for Jinping County. In the past 9 years, more than 2,000 children have graduated from here. In Zimbabwe, the water well project assisted by the Chinese government has enabled local residents to use clean and safe water. Local residents said that the water wells assisted by China are "life-saving gifts" and they will take good care of them to make them "friendship wells" that can stand the test of time. Over the past 11 years, China and African countries have achieved great results in the joint construction of the "Belt and Road". For example, in terms of health, China has assisted in the construction of more than 130 hospitals and clinics in Africa, sent Chinese medical teams to 45 African countries, and established a counterpart cooperation mechanism with 46 African hospitals to help African countries improve their medical and health levels. President Xi Jinping made a profound summary: "China-Africa relations did not develop in one day, nor were they given by anyone, but were achieved step by step through the sharing of weal and woe. "China and African countries are friends in need, and we must not forget our friendship in need." China adheres to the concept of sincerity, affinity and good faith, and together with African friends, draws strength from the spirit of China-Africa friendship and cooperation to continuously advance China-Africa relations to a new level. 'Sharing the fruits of development' After seven years of trial planting, the water-saving and drought-resistant rice for Africa developed by the Shanghai Agricultural Biological Gene Center is expected to pass the new variety approval in Kenya this year. This will bring new hope for food self-sufficiency to Kenya, which relies on imports for more than 80% of its rice, and make new contributions to the elimination of hunger and poverty. This is a vivid epitome of China-Africa cooperation. President Xi Jinping once said: "The greatest 'righteousness' of China-Africa relations is to use China's development to promote Africa's development, and ultimately achieve mutual benefit, win-win and common development. "We are willing to work side by side with our African brothers, share the fruits of development, and jointly embark on a happy road to make people's lives better." From the proposal of China and Africa to jointly implement the 'Ten Cooperation Plans' in 2015, to the proposal to focus on the implementation of the 'Eight Actions' in 2018, to the announcement of the 'Nine Projects' for China-Africa practical cooperation in 2021... Under the leadership of President Xi Jinping, the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation has continued to grow and develop, and China-Africa cooperation in multiple fields has achieved fruitful results. Under the mechanism of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, Chinese companies have added and upgraded more than 10,000 kilometers of railways, nearly 100,000 kilometers of roads, nearly 1,000 bridges and nearly 100 ports in Africa, making important contributions to promoting connectivity on the African continent. By the end of last year, China had built 24 agricultural technology demonstration centers in Africa, promoted more than 300 advanced agricultural technologies, and benefited more than 1 million small farmers in Africa. With the implementation of measures such as the "green channel" for African agricultural products to China, a large number of agricultural products such as avocados from Kenya, sesame seeds from Tanzania, peanuts from Senegal, and fresh pears from South Africa have entered the Chinese market, becoming a new growth point for China-Africa trade. China and Africa have jointly implemented hundreds of clean energy power generation and power grid projects, lighting up thousands of lights on the African continent and illuminating Africa's path to sustainable development. China has proved with practical actions that no matter how far China develops, it will always treat its African friends with sincerity and provide support for Africa's development with sincerity. 'Join hands to promote the cause of modernization' 'Modernization' is a common proposition for China and Africa's development and the most magnificent movement between China and Africa today. The modernization that has grown out of the land of China has depicted another picture of modernization and created a new form of human civilization. China's practice has shared a profound truth with Africa in its exploration: there is neither a fixed modernization model nor a universal modernization standard in the world. 'What kind of development path is most suitable for Africa? The African people have the most say. Promoting integration is the modernization path chosen independently by African countries and people. China has always firmly supported it and is willing to be a companion on the path of Africa's modernization. 'Last August, at the China-Africa Leaders' Dialogue held in Johannesburg, South Africa, President Xi Jinping vividly explained. At the dialogue, looking to the future, President Xi Jinping proposed three practical measures: China is willing to launch the "Supporting African Industrialization Initiative", is willing to implement the "China Assistance Plan for African Agricultural Modernization", and is willing to implement the "China-Africa Talent Training Cooperation Plan". Today, China and Africa are working together to create a good environment for realizing their respective development visions - China has built 17 Luban workshops in Africa, which not only promoted the development and innovation of vocational education in Africa, but also injected new impetus into the development of local manufacturing and science and technology industries. At the end of July this year, China and Africa jointly formulated and issued the "China-Africa Digital Cooperation and Development Action Plan". The two sides will promote and popularize digital technology, accelerate digital transformation in various fields, jointly build 10 digital transformation demonstration projects in the next three years, and jointly train 1,000 digital talents. Since the beginning of this year, the China-aided Congo (Brazzaville) Agricultural Technology Demonstration Center has been full of good news: cowpeas and screw peppers have had a bumper harvest; the new corn variety has been successfully trial-planted, with an output of nearly 700 kilograms per mu, more than three times the output of local varieties... Paul Ngobo, Minister of Agriculture of the Congo (Brazzaville), said that increasing production, improving production efficiency, and developing cassava processing industry have greatly increased farmers' income and improved living conditions. "Before the arrival of Chinese agricultural experts, we could not imagine these achievements." China is moving towards the second centenary goal, and Africa is also accelerating towards the beautiful vision depicted in the AU's "2063 Agenda". China-Africa cooperation keeps pace with the times and improves quality and upgrades, presenting a broader prospect and a brighter future. President Xi Jinping pointed out: "In the face of a century of change, if China-Africa relations are stable and China-Africa cooperation is carried out well, global development will have more new momentum and the world will have more stability." Adhering to the China-Africa friendly and cooperative spirit of "sincere friendship, equal treatment, mutual benefit and win-win, common development, justice, justice, adapting to the times, openness and inclusiveness", China and Africa share weal and woe and fight side by side. This is the source of strength for the continuation of China-Africa friendly relations and the common choice of 2.8 billion Chinese and African people. Executive Producer: Yan Shuannan, Wang Shanshan Producer: Geng Zhimin Producer: Xinglai, Ning Lili Writer: Zhang Yanan Visual: Jiang Yuhang Proofreader: Yang Caiyun 1725247491522 Editor: Wang Dan CCTV title: 台湾行政院长拟对中国公民非法入境加强打击
summary: 法新社报道，台湾行政院长9月16日表示，台湾政府将检查多起中国公民乘船非法进入台湾的案件，并采取'必要措施'保障国家安全。 台湾海岸警卫队和来自新北的消防队员周六在后坑河口离海岸约一百米的地方发现了一名乘坐橡皮艇的男子。由于严重脱水，他被送往医院。 据法新社消息，台湾行政院长卓榮泰对记者说："我们过去已经调查过某些事情，这次事件可能让我们意识到我们需要加快速度。 他补充道，'我可以向你们保证，确保...
text: 法新社报道，台湾行政院长9月16日表示，台湾政府将检查多起中国公民乘船非法进入台湾的案件，并采取'必要措施'保障国家安全。 台湾海岸警卫队和来自新北的消防队员周六在后坑河口离海岸约一百米的地方发现了一名乘坐橡皮艇的男子。由于严重脱水，他被送往医院。 据法新社消息，台湾行政院长卓榮泰对记者说："我们过去已经调查过某些事情，这次事件可能让我们意识到我们需要加快速度。 他补充道，'我可以向你们保证，确保国家安全是政府坚定不移的责任。我们必须迅速检查这些事件并采取必要措施"。 据台湾海岸警卫队称，这名男子自称 '在中国欠了债'，想'在台湾开始新生活'，因未经许可进入台湾岛而被捕。 该报道说，今年6 月，台湾海岸警卫队逮捕了一名60多岁的中国男子，他的船在淡水河上与其他船只相撞，淡水河连接着首都台北和台湾岛屿的北岸。 据中央社报道，这名60多岁的男子告诉台湾当局他想'叛逃'，并被指控非法进入台湾，尽管检察官裁定他的行为'不涉及军事或国家安全'。 据台湾海洋事务部长官碧玲称，这名男子是中国海军的一名上尉，也是过去一年左右，抵达台湾的18 名涉嫌叛逃者之一，这些叛逃者都声称钦佩'台湾的民主生活方式'。 据当地媒体报道，2022 年，一名中国男子在一年前乘坐橡皮艇成功穿越台湾海峡后在中部城市台中被捕，并被驱逐出境。 中国认为实行自治管理的台湾岛是其领土的一部分，并表示准备在必要时以武力收回。
translated_summary:
Agence France-Presse reported that Taiwan's Executive President said on September 16 that the Taiwan government will inspect many cases of Chinese citizens illegally entering Taiwan by boat and take 'necessary measures' Protect national security.
 Taiwan's Coast Guard and firefighters from New Taipei spotted a man in a rubber boat about a hundred meters from the coast at the mouth of Houkeng River on Saturday. He was taken to hospital due to severe dehydration.
 According to Agence France-Presse, Taiwan's Executive President Zhuo Rongtai told reporters: "We have investigated certain things in the past, and this incident may make us realize that we need to speed up".
 He added, 'I can assure you that ensuring national security is the government's unwavering responsibility. We must quickly examine these incidents and take the necessary steps.
 According to Taiwan's Coast Guard, the man, who claimed to be 'in debt in China' and wanted to 'start a new life in Taiwan', was arrested for entering the island without permission.
 The report said that in June this year, Taiwan's Coast Guard arrested a Chinese man in his 60s whose boat collided with other boats on the Tamsui River, which connects the capital Taipei to the north shore of the Taiwan island.
 The man, who is in his 60s, told Taiwanese authorities he wanted to 'defeat' and was charged with illegally entering Taiwan, although prosecutors ruled his actions 'did not involve military or national security', Central News Agency reported.
 According to Taiwan's Minister of Maritime Affairs Biling, the man is a captain in the Chinese Navy and one of 18 suspected defectors who have arrived in Taiwan in the past year or so. These defectors all claim to admire 'Taiwan's democratic way of life'.
 In 2022, a Chinese man was arrested in the central city of Taiwan and deported after successfully crossing the Taiwan Strait in a rubber boat a year ago, local media reported.
 China considers the self-governing island of Taiwan part of its territory and has expressed its readiness to take it back by force if necessary.

title: '行进中国'调研行｜向'新'而行，'疆'更美好_新疆_口岸_通关
summary: 在'行'中，看见'进'的中国。今年5月，人民网启动'行进中国'大型融媒体系列调研行，340名年轻记者，耗时2个月，走访31个省区市的111座城市，前往500余个基层一线点位深入采访，'即采即发''边采边发'，推出融媒体作品600余件，各平台总阅读量超11亿。 8月13日起，人民网分'创新中国''品牌中国''投资中国''活力中国'4个主题，陆续推出'行进中国'调研行系列深度报道，聚焦各地贯彻新发展理...
text: 在'行'中，看见'进'的中国。今年5月，人民网启动'行进中国'大型融媒体系列调研行，340名年轻记者，耗时2个月，走访31个省区市的111座城市，前往500余个基层一线点位深入采访，'即采即发''边采边发'，推出融媒体作品600余件，各平台总阅读量超11亿。 8月13日起，人民网分'创新中国''品牌中国''投资中国''活力中国'4个主题，陆续推出'行进中国'调研行系列深度报道，聚焦各地贯彻新发展理念、构建新发展格局、推动高质量发展的鲜活案例，展现各地以全面深化改革推进中国式现代化建设的生动实践。 西部边境小城——新疆霍尔果斯，今年以来，平均每天有20余列中欧班列通行，公路排队通关的车辆川流不息，是我国最为繁忙的口岸之一。 公路口岸试行7×24小时货运通关以来，整车出口历史新纪录频频刷新。做了十几年平行进口车生意的大华，抵挡不住'诱惑'，在这里做起了国产汽车的出口生意，'我们每天都要出口几十辆汽车，而且势头还在增长。' 诸如大华一样到新疆'掘金'的商人，在源源不断涌入。从进口到出口的转变，折射出古丝绸之路重要节点的华丽转身。新的平台、新的探索、新的机遇……向'新'而行的新疆正成为内陆与向西开放的新高地。 十多年前，荷兰艾尔布勒斯国际运输公司就将中国总部从上海迁至乌鲁木齐。事实也证明，企业的选择是正确的，显著的区位优势、快速便利的通关环境，让企业驶入发展'快车道'。 艾尔布勒斯运输（新疆）有限公司的货运卡车缓缓驶出乌鲁木齐国际陆港区。人民网记者 韩婷摄 '我们目前拥有600多辆卡车，每天有10至15辆发往中亚和欧洲。'该公司运营总监亨德里克·西布兰德·艾尔布勒斯说，'新疆连接东西方的地理位置，为跨国公路货运提供了巨大的便利，未来三年我们还要继续增加运力。'
translated_summary: In the "travel", see the "progress" of China. In May this year, People's Daily Online launched the "Travel in China" large-scale integrated media series research tour. 340 young reporters spent two months visiting 111 cities in 31 provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities, and went to more than 500 grassroots front-line locations for in-depth interviews. They "collected and published immediately" and "collected and published while publishing", and launched more than 600 integrated media works, with a total reading volume of more than 1.1 billion on various platforms. Starting from August 13, People's Daily Online has launched a series of in-depth reports on the "Travel in China" research tour with four themes: "Innovative China", "Brand China", "Investment in China" and "Vibrant China", focusing on the vivid cases of various places implementing the new development concept, building a new development pattern and promoting high-quality development, and showing the vivid practice of various places in promoting Chinese-style modernization construction by comprehensively deepening reforms. In the western border town of Horgos, Xinjiang, since the beginning of this year, an average of more than 20 China-Europe trains have passed through every day, and the vehicles queuing for customs clearance on the highway are constantly flowing. It is one of the busiest ports in my country. Since the highway port tried 7×24-hour freight customs clearance, new records in the history of vehicle exports have been frequently set. Dahua, which has been engaged in parallel imported car business for more than ten years, could not resist the "temptation" and started the export business of domestic cars here. "We export dozens of cars every day, and the momentum is still growing." Merchants like Dahua who come to Xinjiang to "dig for gold" are pouring in continuously. The transformation from import to export reflects the gorgeous transformation of an important node of the ancient Silk Road. New platform, new exploration, new opportunities... Xinjiang, which is moving towards "newness", is becoming a new highland for inland and westward opening. More than ten years ago, the Dutch Albrecht International Transport Company moved its Chinese headquarters from Shanghai to Urumqi. Facts have also proved that the company's choice is correct. The significant location advantages and fast and convenient customs clearance environment have allowed the company to enter the "fast lane" of development. The freight truck of Albrecht Transport (Xinjiang) Co., Ltd. slowly drove out of the Urumqi International Land Port Area. Photo by Han Ting, People's Daily Online 'We currently have more than 600 trucks, and 10 to 15 are sent to Central Asia and Europe every day. ' Hendrik Siebland Albrecht, the company's operations director, said, 'Xinjiang's geographical location connecting the East and the West provides great convenience for cross-border road freight, and we will continue to increase our capacity in the next three years. '

title: 北京中轴线桥梁展举办
summary: 中新网北京新闻9月23日电 '凭桥周览'北京中轴线桥梁展览首次在北京市西城区泰安里文化艺术中心展出，中国紫檀博物馆精心制作的天安门城楼模型也正式亮相。 本次活动由北京市文物局指导，北京京企中轴线保护公益基金会(简称'北京中轴线基金会')主办，北京建筑大学与浦江中国承办，西城区委宣传部协办。 '凭桥周览'北京中轴线桥梁展览在京举办。主办方供图 今年7月27日'北京中轴线——中国理想都城秩序的杰作'被...
text: 中新网北京新闻9月23日电 '凭桥周览'北京中轴线桥梁展览首次在北京市西城区泰安里文化艺术中心展出，中国紫檀博物馆精心制作的天安门城楼模型也正式亮相。 本次活动由北京市文物局指导，北京京企中轴线保护公益基金会(简称'北京中轴线基金会')主办，北京建筑大学与浦江中国承办，西城区委宣传部协办。 '凭桥周览'北京中轴线桥梁展览在京举办。主办方供图 今年7月27日'北京中轴线——中国理想都城秩序的杰作'被正式列入《世界遗产名录》。北京京企中轴线保护公益基金会副理事长、秘书长梅松在致辞中表示，北京中轴线申遗成功后，将持续加强对北京中轴线整体性、系统性保护和传承利用，用好北京中轴线申遗成果，更加深入挖掘中轴线文化遗产的内涵和价值，讲好中轴线故事，提供更多有高质量文化产品，更好满足人民群众的美好生活需求。 '凭桥周览'以北京中轴线上的桥梁为中心，精选了万宁桥、金水桥、正阳桥、天桥等代表性桥梁，通过'桥定大都''桥端国礼''桥观地北''桥望南天'四个版块，全方位体现北京中轴线上桥梁的壮美和价值，阐述了古都北京桥梁对文化的深远影响，展现了北京多彩的文化内涵。 '凭桥周览'北京中轴线桥梁展览在京举办。主办方供图 为庆祝北京中轴线申遗成功，中国紫檀博物馆将天安门城楼模型捐赠给北京中轴线基金会，北京中轴线基金会副理事长兼秘书长梅松为陈丽华颁发了收藏证书和捐赠证书。捐赠仪式上，陈丽华表示，紫檀制天安门城楼模型，特选用金星小叶紫檀，在百名工匠共同协作下，以非物质文化遗产'紫檀雕刻'技艺制作，经数百日夜的努力，以1：30的比例完美呈现。 自2024年以来，北京京企中轴线保护公益基金会陆续推出了'印记·北京中轴线——大众篆刻作品展''北京中轴线线上马拉松'等系列群众活动，并联合打造了北京中轴线地铁8号线、2号线专列，通过各种活动形式，加强了对北京中轴线文化遗产价值的宣传与推广，让北京中轴线更好的走入大众生活。(完) 【 编辑:杜燕 】
translated_summary:
China News Service Beijing News, September 23 (Xinhua) -- The 'Bingqiao Weekly' Beijing Central Axis Bridge Exhibition was exhibited for the first time at the Tai'anli Culture and Art Center in Xicheng District, Beijing. The Tiananmen Gate Tower model carefully crafted by the China Rosewood Museum was also officially unveiled.
 This event is guided by the Beijing Municipal Cultural Relics Bureau, hosted by the Beijing Beijing Enterprise Central Axis Protection Public Welfare Foundation ( referred to as the 'Beijing Central Axis Foundation'), hosted by Beijing University of Architecture and Architecture and Pujiang China, and co-organized by the Propaganda Department of the Xicheng District Party Committee.
 The 'Bingqiao Weekly' Beijing Central Axis Bridge Exhibition was held in Beijing. Picture provided by the organizer
 On July 27 this year 'Beijing Central Axis —— Masterpiece of China's Ideal Capital Order' was officially included in the 《 World Heritage List 》. Mei Song, vice chairman and secretary-general of the Beijing Beijing Enterprise Central Axis Protection Public Welfare Foundation, said in his speech that after the Beijing Central Axis is successfully applied for World Heritage, it will continue to strengthen the overall and systematic protection and inheritance of the Beijing Central Axis, and make good use of the Beijing Central Axis. The results of applying for World Heritage will dig deeper into the connotation and value of the Central Axis cultural heritage and tell the story of the Central Axis Provide more high-quality cultural products to better meet the people's needs for a better life.
 "Bingqiao Weekly" is centered on the bridges on the central axis of Beijing. It selects representative bridges such as Wanning Bridge, Jinshui Bridge, Zhengyang Bridge, and Overpasses. Through the "Bridge Ding Dadu", "Bridge Duan Guoli", and "Bridge Viewing the Land" The four sections "North" and "Bridge Looking to the South" comprehensively reflect the magnificence and value of bridges on the central axis of Beijing, and illustrate the profound impact of ancient capital Beijing bridges on culture It shows the colorful cultural connotation of Beijing.
 The 'Bingqiao Weekly' Beijing Central Axis Bridge Exhibition was held in Beijing. Picture provided by the organizer
 To celebrate the successful application of Beijing Central Axis for World Heritage, the China Rosewood Museum donated the Tiananmen Gate Tower model to the Beijing Central Axis Foundation. Mei Song, Vice Chairman and Secretary-General of the Beijing Central Axis Foundation, issued a collection certificate and donation certificate to Chen Lihua. At the donation ceremony, Chen Lihua said that the model of the Tiananmen Gate Tower made of rosewood, specially selected from Venus small-leaf rosewood, was made with the intangible cultural heritage 'red sandalwood carving' technique with the cooperation of hundreds of craftsmen. After hundreds of days and nights of hard work, it was made in 1:30 The ratio is perfectly presented.
 Since 2024, the Beijing Beijing Enterprise Central Axis Protection Charity Foundation has successively launched a series of mass activities such as the 'Imprint·Beijing Central Axis —— Public Seal Engraving Works Exhibition' and the 'Beijing Central Axis Online Marathon', and jointly created the Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 8 and Line 2 special trains have strengthened the publicity and promotion of the cultural heritage value of Beijing’s central axis through various activity forms Let Beijing’s central axis better enter public life. ( Finished )
 【 editor: Du Yan 】

title: 唱响'投资中国'和'中国投资'好声音 _光明网
summary: 图为第二十四届中国国际投资贸易洽谈会中心展馆。新华社记者 魏培全摄 9月8日至11日，第二十四届中国国际投资贸易洽谈会（以下简称'投洽会'）在厦门举办。本届投洽会以'投资链接世界'为主题，吸引了来自119个国家和地区的客商参与，打造'投资中国'响亮品牌，释放'中国投资'积极信号，努力构建促进双向投资的国际公共平台，为全球产业链供应链稳定注入信心和动力。 外资引力提质升级 近年来，受疫情冲击、地缘政...
text: 图为第二十四届中国国际投资贸易洽谈会中心展馆。新华社记者 魏培全摄 9月8日至11日，第二十四届中国国际投资贸易洽谈会（以下简称'投洽会'）在厦门举办。本届投洽会以'投资链接世界'为主题，吸引了来自119个国家和地区的客商参与，打造'投资中国'响亮品牌，释放'中国投资'积极信号，努力构建促进双向投资的国际公共平台，为全球产业链供应链稳定注入信心和动力。 外资引力提质升级 近年来，受疫情冲击、地缘政治博弈等因素交织影响，全球跨境直接投资规模连续下行。本届投洽会期间发布的《中国双向投资报告2024》显示，2023年全球外国直接投资（FDI）实际下降10%。 面对复杂严峻形势，我国大力推动巩固延伸优势产业、培育壮大新兴产业、前瞻布局未来产业，在增强外资引力的同时进一步优化引资结构。2023年我国吸收外资有所下降，但仍保持了万亿元规模，处于历史较高水平。与此同时，利用外资质量进一步优化。2023年中国高技术产业引资4233.4亿元，占实际使用外资金额比重为37.3%，较2022年提升1.2百分点，创历史新高。 此种发展活力也在本届投洽会上得到充分体现。作为展示我国优势产业的重要平台，本届投洽会设置4.7万平方米的产业创新发展馆，聚焦金砖合作、供应链创新、新质生产力、绿色低碳等领域，展示区域投资合作成果、产业创新发展新技术新产品、战略性新兴产业和未来产业发展趋势。比如，在数字经济展区汇聚了腾讯云、同方股份、奇安信科技、问天量子等数十家行业龙头、独角兽、专精特新企业在数字关键领域的技术产品。 北京云迹科技股份有限公司将新型服务机器人带到了展会现场。'这台商用服务机器人会使用工具、推理理解任务、群体协作等，目前已在酒店、医院、工厂等场所投入使用。'公司战略合作副总裁杨子说，期待通过投洽会平台，与更多国际商业伙伴交流与合作，将中国的先进技术和优质产品带到世界各地。 '近年来，外资流入的特点正从资本密集型转向知识密集型。'德勤中国副首席执行官刘明华表示，外资流入科学研究、技术服务行业等高新技术企业逐年上升，2023年已达37.4%，创历史新高。随着中国经济进入新发展阶段，新质生产力将进一步推动高质量发展。 中国新能源产业备受关注。本届投洽会设置的新能源及绿色创新展区吸引了众多外国投资商的目光。广东佳邑新能源科技有限公司现场展示了自主研发的低压高密度固态储氢瓶。公司研发工程师张飞宇说，'当前我国的氢能产业已经形成了技术成熟度高以及'制储输用'全产业链较为完备的国际市场竞争优势。随着全球能源绿色低碳转型加速推进，外商对我国新能源产业兴趣越发浓厚。目前已有一些境外客商向我们表达了投资意向'。 对外投资不断深化 本届投洽会在唱响'投资中国'好声音的同时，也集中展示了'中国投资'为海外市场带来的新机遇。 在全球发展合作展区，多家中国对外投资重点企业参展设展，集中展示'中国投资'和'中国建设'发展成就及优秀案例。'近年来，我们在实施'走出去'战略和推进共建'一带一路'高质量发展中取得了诸多成果。'中国通用技术国际控股有限公司董事长、党委书记康虎彪说。中国通用公司近年来承接了多项新能源开发、国际产能合作等海外投资项目，有助于增强目标国家可持续发展能力。 泰国投资促进委员会广州办事处主任刘美玲介绍，当前中国已成为泰国最主要的外国直接投资来源国之一，投资领域涉及各行各业，包括汽车制造、智能电子、数字经济等高附加值行业，对泰国经济发展起到重要推动作用。 '欢迎更多中国企业前来投资兴业。'阿联酋联邦最高委员会成员、哈伊马角酋长谢赫萨欧德在本届投洽会开幕式上的发言，表达了许多参与本届投洽会外宾的心声。本届投洽会上，匈牙利出口促进局、缅甸投资与对外经济部、斯洛伐克投资外贸发展局等多个国家和地区设立展馆，宣传本地产业和引资优惠政策，希望进一步把握'中国投资'机遇。 匈牙利出口促进局局长加博尔·耶奈伊表示，近年来中国对匈牙利的投资规模不断扩大、投资领域日益多元化，促进了匈牙利经济的蓬勃发展。'我们还有巨大的投资合作潜力，希望能够找到更多投资伙伴，我们也将提供更加公平、透明、高效的投资环境。' 一家来自匈牙利的建筑公司负责人说，'我们当前正在同多家中国企业开展投资合作，并在这个过程中学习到很多经验。我们希望通过本届投洽会，接触更多潜在的中国合作伙伴，挖掘更多合作可能'。 聚焦供应链创新发展 供应链一端连着产业，一端连着市场，汇聚物流、商流、信息流、资金流，事关经济安全。本届投洽会在促进双向投资的同时，组织各国工商界人士聚焦探讨当前供应链面临的安全风险，为维护全球供应链安全稳定寻找积极出路。 日本丸红株式会社执行董事、中国总代表筱田聪夫说，近年来全球经济变化和技术更新加速，使得传统业务模式已经不足以应对。中国在医疗领域新技术应用方面具有优势。目前，公司正在将中国开发的医疗影像、人工智能诊断辅助软件产品在日本注册为医疗器械，并向日本市场推广。 中国人民大学商学院教授宋华提出，供应链新质生产力的核心在于以数字科技推动供应链创新，不仅体现在更高的效率、更低的成本和更快的响应速度上，更重要的是能够促进供应链各个环节的价值共创，推动整个产业生态系统的升级与转型，同时兼顾环境保护和社会责任。 当前数字技术，特别是人工智能被视为提升全球供应链透明度和稳定性的关键路径之一。商务部国际贸易经济合作研究院副院长张威认为，应聚焦供应链数字化转型，提升供应链创新与应用水平。 《中国供应链发展报告（2023—2024）》提出，物联网和新兴的智能化技术如人工智能、机器学习、大数据分析等技术手段的应用，是供应链智能升级的核心，中国企业正加速数字化转型进程，以实现供应链的智能化升级。 在本届投洽会首次设置的供应链创新展区，厦门象屿股份有限公司相关负责人正向客商介绍供应链畅通的重要性。他说，当前全球供应链的稳定面临一系列挑战，象屿公司深耕金属矿产、农产品、能源化工、新能源等核心产业链，向上下游延伸拓展服务边界，凭借丰富多元的大宗商品组合、成熟稳定的全球渠道网络，提供一揽子综合服务解决方案。 厦门国贸控股集团有限公司董事长许晓曦介绍，该公司开发的一款供应链平台覆盖纸业、金属、农产、能源、石化、化工等多个业务领域，全年累计订单超过10万笔，成交金额超过400亿元。'集团期望借助投洽会平台与更多中外企业合作，为全球供应链的稳定发展描绘蓝图。'（潘卓然 杨啸林） [ 责编：金昱希 ] 阅读剩余全文（ ）
translated_summary:
The picture shows the central exhibition hall of the 24th China International Investment and Trade Fair. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Wei Peiquan
 From September 8th to 11th, the 24th China International Investment and Trade Fair (hereinafter referred to as the 'Investment Fair') was held in Xiamen. With the theme of 'Investment Links the World', this CIFIT attracted merchants from 119 countries and regions to participate, build a resounding brand of 'Invest in China', release a positive signal of 'China Investment', and strive to build an international public platform that promotes two-way investment, injecting confidence and motivation into the stability of the global industrial chain and supply chain.
 The gravitation of foreign investment improves quality and upgrades
 In recent years, affected by the impact of the epidemic, geopolitical games and other factors, the scale of global cross-border direct investment has continued to decline. The 《 China two-way investment report 2024》 released during this CIFIT shows that global foreign direct investment (FDI) will actually decline by 10% in 2023.
 Facing the complex and severe situation, our country vigorously promotes the consolidation and extension of advantageous industries, cultivates and strengthens emerging industries, and looks forward to the layout of future industries. While enhancing the gravity of foreign investment, it further optimizes the investment attraction structure. In 2023, my country's absorption of foreign investment declined, but it still maintained a trillion yuan scale and was at a historically high level. At the same time, the quality of foreign investment is further optimized. In 2023, China's high-tech industry attracted 423.34 billion yuan, accounting for 37.3% of the actual foreign funds used, an increase of 1.2 percentage points from 2022, a record high.
 This development vitality has also been fully reflected in this CIIE. As an important platform to showcase my country's advantageous industries, this CIFIT will set up a 47,000-square-meter industrial innovation and development hall, focusing on BRICS cooperation, supply chain innovation, new quality productivity, green and low-carbon and other fields, to showcase the results of regional investment cooperation and industrial innovation. Develop new technologies and products, strategic emerging industries and future industrial development trends. For example, in the digital economy exhibition area, dozens of industry leaders, unicorns, and specialized new companies such as Tencent Cloud, Tongfang Co., Ltd., Qi'anxin Technology, and Wentian Quantum have gathered technology products in key digital fields.
 Beijing Yunji Technology Co., Ltd. brought new service robots to the exhibition site. ' This commercial service robot uses tools, reasoning to understand tasks, group collaboration, etc., and is currently in use in hotels, hospitals, factories and other places. ' Yang Zi, vice president of strategic cooperation of the company, said that he looks forward to communicating and cooperating with more international business partners through the CIFIT platform to bring China's advanced technology and high-quality products to all parts of the world.
 'In recent years, the characteristics of foreign capital inflows have shifted from capital-intensive to knowledge-intensive.' Liu Minghua, deputy CEO of Deloitte China, said that the inflow of foreign capital into high-tech enterprises such as scientific research and technical service industries is increasing year by year, reaching 37.4% in 2023, a record high. As China's economy enters a new stage of development, new quality productivity will further promote high-quality development.
 China's new energy industry has attracted much attention. The new energy and green innovation exhibition area set up by this CIFIT has attracted the attention of many foreign investors. Guangdong Jiayi New Energy Technology Co., Ltd. demonstrated independently developed low-pressure, high-density solid-state hydrogen storage bottles on site. Zhang Feiyu, a R&D engineer of the company, said, 'Currently my country's hydrogen energy industry has formed a competitive advantage in the international market with high technological maturity and a relatively complete industrial chain of 'production, storage, transportation and use'. As the global energy green and low-carbon transformation accelerates, foreign businessmen are increasingly interested in my country's new energy industry. At present, some overseas merchants have expressed their investment intentions to us'.
 Foreign investment continues to deepen
 While singing the good voice of 'Investing in China', this year's Investment Fair also focused on demonstrating the new opportunities that 'China Investment' brings to overseas markets.
 In the global development cooperation exhibition area, a number of key Chinese foreign investment companies participated in the exhibition, focusing on displaying the development achievements and outstanding cases of 'China Investment' and 'China Construction'. ' In recent years, we have achieved many results in implementing the 'going global' strategy and promoting the high-quality development of jointly building the 'Belt and Road'. ' Kang Hubiao, chairman and party secretary of China General Technology International Holdings Co., Ltd., said. In recent years, China General Corporation has undertaken a number of overseas investment projects such as new energy development and international production capacity cooperation, which has helped enhance the sustainable development capabilities of target countries.
 Liu Meiling, director of the Guangzhou Office of the Thailand Investment Promotion Council, said that China has now become one of Thailand's most important sources of foreign direct investment. The investment fields involve all walks of life, including automobile manufacturing, smart electronics, digital economy and other high value-added industries, which are important to Thailand. plays an important role in promoting economic development.
 'Welcome more Chinese companies to invest and start businesses.' Sheikh Saoud, a member of the Supreme Council of the UAE Federation and Chief of Ras Al Khaimah, delivered a speech at the opening ceremony of this CIFIT, expressing the voices of many foreign guests participating in this CIFIT. At this CIFIT, many countries and regions, including the Hungarian Export Promotion Agency, the Ministry of Investment and Foreign Economy of Myanmar, and the Slovak Investment and Foreign Trade Development Agency, set up exhibition halls to promote local industries and preferential policies for attracting investment, hoping to further seize the opportunity of 'Chinese investment'.
 Gabor Yenai, director of the Hungarian Export Promotion Agency, said that in recent years, China's investment in Hungary has continued to expand and its investment fields have become increasingly diversified, which has promoted the vigorous development of the Hungarian economy.' We also have huge potential for investment cooperation and hope to find more investment partners. We will also provide a more fair, transparent and efficient investment environment. '
 The head of a construction company from Hungary said, 'We are currently carrying out investment cooperation with a number of Chinese companies and have learned a lot of experience in the process. We hope that through this CIFIT, we can contact more potential Chinese partners and explore more cooperation possibilities'.
 Focus on supply chain innovation and development
 One end of the supply chain is connected to the industry, and the other end is connected to the market, gathering logistics, business flow, information flow, and capital flow, which are related to economic security. While promoting two-way investment, this investment fair organized business people from various countries to focus on discussing the security risks currently facing the supply chain and find a positive way out to maintain the security and stability of the global supply chain.
 Satsuo Shinoda, executive director of Japan Marubeni Co., Ltd. and general representative of China, said that global economic changes and technological updates have accelerated in recent years, making traditional business models no longer enough to cope. China has advantages in the application of new technologies in the medical field. Currently, the company is registering medical imaging and artificial intelligence diagnostic assistance software products developed in China as medical devices in Japan and promoting them to the Japanese market.
 Song Hua, a professor at Renmin University of China Business School, proposed that the core of new quality productivity in the supply chain lies in using digital technology to promote supply chain innovation, which is not only reflected in higher efficiency, lower costs and faster response speed, but more importantly, it can Promote value co-creation in all links of the supply chain and promote the upgrading and transformation of the entire industrial ecosystem Taking into account both environmental protection and social responsibility.
 Currently, digital technology, especially artificial intelligence, is regarded as one of the key paths to improve the transparency and stability of global supply chains. Zhang Wei, vice president of the Institute of International Trade and Economic Cooperation of the Ministry of Commerce, believes that we should focus on the digital transformation of supply chains and improve the level of supply chain innovation and application.
 《China Supply Chain Development Report (2023—2024)》 proposes that the application of the Internet of Things and emerging intelligent technologies such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, big data analysis and other technical means is the core of supply chain intelligent upgrading, and Chinese enterprises are accelerating digital transformation process to achieve intelligent upgrading of the supply chain.
 In the supply chain innovation exhibition area set up for the first time at this CIFIT, the relevant person in charge of Xiamen Xiangyu Co., Ltd. is introducing the importance of smooth supply chain to merchants. He said that the current stability of the global supply chain faces a series of challenges. Xiangyu Company is deeply involved in core industrial chains such as metal minerals, agricultural products, energy chemicals, and new energy, extending its service boundaries upstream and downstream, and relying on its rich and diversified commodity portfolio, mature and stable global channel network, providing a comprehensive package of service solutions.
 Xu Xiaoxi, chairman of Xiamen International Trade Holding Group Co., Ltd., said that a supply chain platform developed by the company covers paper, metals, agriculture, energy, petrochemicals, chemicals and other business fields. The cumulative orders throughout the year exceeded 100,000, and the transaction amount exceeded 40 billion yuan. ' The Group hopes to use the CIFIT platform to cooperate with more Chinese and foreign companies to draw a blueprint for the stable development of the global supply chain. '( Pan Zhuoran and Yang Xiaolin)
 [ Editor: Jin Yuxi ]
