title: 第九次全国青年作家创作会议在京闭幕
summary: 新华社北京9月3日电 9月3日下午，第九次全国青年作家创作会议在京闭幕。中共中央政治局委员、中宣部部长李书磊出席并讲话。 与会代表认为，本次青创会是在习近平总书记主持召开文艺工作座谈会并发表重要讲话10周年之际开展的一项重要工作，是对践行总书记重要讲话精神、推动文学事业繁荣发展的新动员，是对深入学习贯彻习近平文化思想、贯彻落实党的二十届三中全会精神的再部署，对于激励青年作家担负新的文化使命、努力攀...
text: 新华社北京9月3日电 9月3日下午，第九次全国青年作家创作会议在京闭幕。中共中央政治局委员、中宣部部长李书磊出席并讲话。 与会代表认为，本次青创会是在习近平总书记主持召开文艺工作座谈会并发表重要讲话10周年之际开展的一项重要工作，是对践行总书记重要讲话精神、推动文学事业繁荣发展的新动员，是对深入学习贯彻习近平文化思想、贯彻落实党的二十届三中全会精神的再部署，对于激励青年作家担负新的文化使命、努力攀登文学高峰具有重要推动作用。 与会代表表示，要积极投身文化强国建设，志存高远、担负责任，不负时代召唤和人民期待，为以中国式现代化推进中华民族伟大复兴贡献文学的力量、青春的力量。要聚焦推动新时代文学高质量发展，深入生活、扎根人民，多向经典学习，勇于探索创新，潜心打磨精品，努力推出更多满足人民精神文化需求和增强人民精神力量相统一的优秀作品。 全国人大常委会副委员长、中国作协主席铁凝出席闭幕式。 《 人民日报 》（ 2024年09月04日 04 版） (责编：卫嘉、白宇)
translated_summary: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 3rd. On the afternoon of September 3rd, the Ninth National Youth Writers Creation Conference closed in Beijing. Li Shulei, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Minister of the Publicity Department of the CPC Central Committee, attended and spoke. The delegates believed that this Youth Creation Conference was an important work carried out on the 10th anniversary of General Secretary Xi Jinping's presiding over the symposium on literary and artistic work and delivering an important speech. It is a new mobilization to implement the spirit of the General Secretary's important speech and promote the prosperity and development of the literary cause. It is a redeployment to deeply study and implement Xi Jinping's cultural thoughts and implement the spirit of the Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee. It has an important role in encouraging young writers to take on new cultural missions and strive to climb the peak of literature. The delegates said that they should actively participate in the construction of a cultural power, set high aspirations, take responsibilities, live up to the call of the times and the expectations of the people, and contribute the power of literature and youth to promote the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation with Chinese-style modernization. We must focus on promoting the high-quality development of literature in the new era, go deep into life, take root in the people, learn more from classics, be brave to explore and innovate, concentrate on polishing fine products, and strive to launch more outstanding works that meet the people's spiritual and cultural needs and enhance the people's spiritual strength. Tie Ning, Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and Chairman of the China Writers Association, attended the closing ceremony. People's Daily (Page 4, September 4, 2024) (Editors: Wei Jia, Bai Yu)

title: '中国将接管西伯利亚和远东'谣言在俄流传，我大使回应_中俄关系_合作_发展
summary: 观察者网消息，据中国驻俄罗斯大使网站消息，9月11日，张汉晖大使就中俄高层交往、经贸合作、人文交流等问题接受俄罗斯新闻周刊《新闻世界》书面采访。采访内容同时在《新闻世界》当天报纸和网站发布。采访全文如下： 1、距庆祝俄中两国建交75周年还有几个月。1949年10月1日，毛泽东主席在北京天安门广场宣布中华人民共和国成立。第二天，苏联成为世界上第一个承认中华人民共和国的国家。俄罗斯总统普京在5月访华期...
text: 观察者网消息，据中国驻俄罗斯大使网站消息，9月11日，张汉晖大使就中俄高层交往、经贸合作、人文交流等问题接受俄罗斯新闻周刊《新闻世界》书面采访。采访内容同时在《新闻世界》当天报纸和网站发布。采访全文如下： 1、距庆祝俄中两国建交75周年还有几个月。1949年10月1日，毛泽东主席在北京天安门广场宣布中华人民共和国成立。第二天，苏联成为世界上第一个承认中华人民共和国的国家。俄罗斯总统普京在5月访华期间称即将到来的建交75周年是'我们两国的重要周年纪念日'。大使先生，您如何评价两国关系的水平？您认为当前两国关系取得最重要的成就是什么？ 建交75年来，中俄关系历经风雨、历久弥坚，中俄两国携手走出了一条大国、邻国相互尊重、平等相待、和睦相处、互利共赢的崭新道路，两国关系已经成为新型国际关系和相邻大国关系的典范。在习近平主席和普京总统的亲自擘画和战略引领下，中俄新时代全面战略协作伙伴关系处于历史最好时期，两国政治互信和战略协作不断加强，全方位合作持续推进，民间传统友谊日益深化。中俄组合不仅为双方各自发展振兴提供了强大助力，也为维护地区和世界和平稳定、推动平等有序的世界多极化和普惠包容的经济全球化作出了重要贡献。 今天的中俄关系来之不易，我们必须用心呵护、倍加珍惜。中俄两国以'不结盟、不对抗、不针对第三方'为基础，始终做到'五个坚持'，即坚持以相互尊重为根本，始终在涉及核心利益问题上相互坚定支持；坚持以合作共赢为动力，构建中俄互惠互利新格局；坚持以世代友好为基础，让中俄友谊的火炬代代相传；坚持以战略协作为支撑，引领全球治理正确方向；坚持以公平正义为宗旨，致力于推动热点问题政治解决。新时代中俄关系勇立世界潮头，把握时代脉搏，以维护两国人民利益为己任，以世界和平发展为目标，正揭开崭新一页，创造新的辉煌。 2、5月中旬，普京总统在北京会见习近平主席。双方签署了《俄罗斯联邦和中华人民共和国在两国建交75周年之际关于深化新时代全面战略协作伙伴关系的联合声明》。但俄民众还不太了解这一声明的全部内容。大使先生，您能否从外交角度对联合声明进行简要的介绍？此外，《新闻世界》的读者对两国军事技术合作领域的协议特别感兴趣，您能否也介绍一下相关情况？ 今年5月普京总统对华进行国事访问，这是他成功连任后首次对外出访。此访期间，两国元首全面总结中俄建交75年来两国关系发展的成功经验，就双边关系以及共同关心的重大国际和地区问题深入交换意见，共同签署并发表《中华人民共和国和俄罗斯联邦在两国建交75周年之际关于深化新时代全面战略协作伙伴关系的联合声明》，再次凸显元首外交对新时代中俄关系的战略引领作用。
translated_summary: According to the website of the Chinese Ambassador to Russia, on September 11, Ambassador Zhang Hanhui accepted a written interview with the Russian news weekly "News World" on issues such as high-level exchanges between China and Russia, economic and trade cooperation, and cultural exchanges. The interview content was published in the newspaper and website of "News World" on the same day. The full text of the interview is as follows: 1. It is still a few months away from celebrating the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Russia and China. On October 1, 1949, Chairman Mao Zedong announced the founding of the People's Republic of China in Tiananmen Square in Beijing. The next day, the Soviet Union became the first country in the world to recognize the People's Republic of China. During his visit to China in May, Russian President Putin called the upcoming 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations "an important anniversary for our two countries." Mr. Ambassador, how do you evaluate the level of relations between the two countries? What do you think is the most important achievement in the current relations between the two countries? Over the past 75 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations, China-Russia relations have gone through ups and downs and have become stronger over time. China and Russia have worked together to embark on a new path of mutual respect, equality, harmony, mutual benefit and win-win between major countries and neighboring countries. The relationship between the two countries has become a model of new international relations and relations between neighboring major countries. Under the personal planning and strategic guidance of President Xi Jinping and President Putin, the comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation in the new era between China and Russia is at its best in history. The two countries' political mutual trust and strategic cooperation are constantly strengthened, all-round cooperation is continuously promoted, and the traditional friendship between the people is deepening. The China-Russia combination not only provides a strong boost to the development and revitalization of both sides, but also makes important contributions to maintaining regional and world peace and stability, promoting equal and orderly world multipolarization and inclusive economic globalization. Today's China-Russia relations are hard-won, and we must cherish them with our hearts. Based on "non-alignment, non-confrontation, and non-targeting third parties", China and Russia always adhere to the "five insistences", namely, adhere to mutual respect as the foundation, always firmly support each other on issues involving core interests; adhere to win-win cooperation as the driving force to build a new pattern of mutual benefit between China and Russia; adhere to the foundation of generations of friendship, so that the torch of China-Russia friendship can be passed on from generation to generation; adhere to strategic cooperation as the support to lead the right direction of global governance; adhere to fairness and justice as the purpose, and strive to promote the political settlement of hot issues. In the new era, China-Russia relations are bravely standing at the forefront of the world, grasping the pulse of the times, taking the protection of the interests of the two peoples as their own responsibility, and taking world peace and development as their goal. They are opening a new page and creating new glory. 2. In mid-May, President Putin met with President Xi Jinping in Beijing. The two sides signed the "Joint Statement of the Russian Federation and the People's Republic of China on Deepening the Comprehensive Strategic Partnership of Coordination in the New Era on the Occasion of the 75th Anniversary of the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between the Two Countries". However, the Russian people are still not familiar with the full content of this statement. Mr. Ambassador, can you briefly introduce the joint statement from a diplomatic perspective? In addition, readers of "News World" are particularly interested in the agreement in the field of military and technical cooperation between the two countries. Can you also introduce the relevant situation? In May this year, President Putin paid a state visit to China. This was his first foreign visit after his successful re-election. During this visit, the two heads of state comprehensively summarized the successful experience of the development of bilateral relations in the 75 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Russia, exchanged in-depth views on bilateral relations and major international and regional issues of common concern, and jointly signed and issued the "Joint Statement of the People's Republic of China and the Russian Federation on Deepening the Comprehensive Strategic Partnership of Coordination in the New Era on the Occasion of the 75th Anniversary of the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between the Two Countries", which once again highlighted the strategic leading role of the head of state diplomacy in China-Russia relations in the new era.

title: 六部委联合表彰'全国对口支援西藏先进个人'_新闻频道_中国青年网
summary: 六部委联合表彰'全国对口支援西藏先进个人' 发稿时间：2024-09-22 06:38:00 作者：杜沂蒙 来源： 中国青年报 本报北京9月21日电（中青报·中青网记者 杜沂蒙）在中华人民共和国成立75周年、对口支援西藏30周年之际，为表彰先进，树立典型，经党中央同意，中央组织部、中央统战部、国家发展改革委、教育部、人力资源社会保障部、国家卫生健康委决定，授予李连华等74名同志、追授周会明等5名同...
text: 六部委联合表彰'全国对口支援西藏先进个人' 发稿时间：2024-09-22 06:38:00 作者：杜沂蒙 来源： 中国青年报 本报北京9月21日电（中青报·中青网记者 杜沂蒙）在中华人民共和国成立75周年、对口支援西藏30周年之际，为表彰先进，树立典型，经党中央同意，中央组织部、中央统战部、国家发展改革委、教育部、人力资源社会保障部、国家卫生健康委决定，授予李连华等74名同志、追授周会明等5名同志'全国对口支援西藏先进个人'称号。 共青团中央少年部副部长、一级巡视员顾淑华荣获此项殊荣。顾淑华2019年进藏参加中央单位第九批援藏工作，挂职任团西藏自治区委副书记、一级巡视员，2022年期满后主动申请继续参加第十批援藏工作。5年来，她认真履职尽责，勇于担当作为，自觉对标习近平总书记对西藏干部'政治标准要更高、党性要求要更严、组织纪律性要更强'的重要要求，积极践行'老西藏精神'和'孔繁森精神'，以新时代团干部清澈纯粹、勤奋务实的作风，用心用情投入援藏工作，扎实推进西藏中长期青年发展规划实施、共青团促进大学生就业、组织青年岗位建功、全面从严管团治团等工作，有效提升了共青团服务党政大局的贡献度。顾淑华曾于2022年获评'第九批援藏先进个人'，2020年至2023年连续4年考核优秀，记'三等功'一次。 对口支援西藏是党中央作出的重大战略决策。团中央书记处始终高度重视援藏工作，全面贯彻落实习近平总书记关于西藏工作的重要指示和新时代党的治藏方略，把助力西藏发展作为服务党和国家中心工作的重要举措，把援藏工作作为促进优秀干部锻炼成长的重要平台，近年来不断加大援藏力度，持续选派干部人才进藏工作。 下一步，团中央将继续坚持以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，深入学习贯彻党的二十大和二十届三中全会精神，完整准确全面贯彻新发展理念，坚持铸牢中华民族共同体意识主线和新时代党的治藏方略，以高度责任感、使命感做好新时代对口援藏工作，助力建设团结富裕文明和谐美丽的社会主义现代化新西藏。 来源：中国青年报 责任编辑：高秀木
translated_summary:
Six ministries and commissions jointly commend 'National Counterpart Support for Advanced Individuals in Tibet'
 Publication time: 2024-09-22 06:38:00 Author: Du Yimeng Source: China Youth Daily
 Beijing, September 21 (China Youth Daily·China Youth Network reporter Du Yimeng) On the occasion of the 75th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China and the 30th anniversary of counterpart support to Tibet, in order to commend the advanced and establish models, with the consent of the Party Central Committee, the Organization Department of the Central Committee, The United Front Work Department, the National Development and Reform Commission, the Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, and the National Health Commission decided 74 comrades including Li Lianhua were awarded the title of "Advanced Individual in National Counterpart Support for Tibet" and 5 comrades including Zhou Huiming were posthumously awarded the title of "Advanced Individual in National Counterpart Support for Tibet".
 Gu Shuhua, deputy director of the Youth Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League and first-level inspector, won this honor. In 2019, Gu Shuhua entered Tibet to participate in the ninth batch of Tibet aid work of the central unit, and served as deputy secretary of the Tibet Autonomous Region Committee of the regiment and first-level inspector. After the expiration of 2022, she took the initiative to apply to continue to participate in the tenth batch of Tibet aid work. Over the past five years, she has conscientiously performed her duties, had the courage to take responsibility, consciously benchmarked General Secretary Xi Jinping's important requirements for Tibetan cadres to have higher political standards, stricter party spirit requirements, and stronger organizational discipline, and actively practiced the "old Tibetan spirit" and "Kong Fansen Spirit", with the clear, pure, diligent and pragmatic style of New Era League cadres, and devoted herself to the work of aiding Tibet with heart and emotion Solidly promoting the implementation of Tibet's medium- and long-term youth development plan, the Communist Youth League promoting the employment of college students, organizing youth positions to make achievements, and comprehensively and strictly managing the Youth League, etc., have effectively enhanced the Communist Youth League's contribution to serving the overall situation of the party and government. Gu Shuhua was rated as "the ninth batch of advanced individuals in aiding Tibet" in 2022. From 2020 to 2023, he was assessed as excellent for four consecutive years and recorded "third-class merit" once.
 Counterpart support for Tibet is a major strategic decision made by the Party Central Committee. The Secretariat of the Youth League Central Committee has always attached great importance to the work of aiding Tibet, fully implemented General Secretary Xi Jinping’s important instructions on Tibet work and the party’s strategy for governing Tibet in the new era, regarded assisting Tibet’s development as an important measure to serve the central work of the party and the country, and regarded the work of aiding Tibet as an important measure to serve the central work of the party and the country. As an important platform to promote the training and growth of outstanding cadres, we have continuously increased our aid to Tibet in recent years Continue to select cadres and talents to work in Tibet.
 In the next step, the Youth League Central Committee will continue to adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, deeply study and implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and the Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, fully, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept, and adhere to the principle of building a solid sense of the Chinese national community. The main line and the party’s strategy for governing Tibet in the new era, and do a good job in counterpart assistance to Tibet in the new era with a high sense of responsibility and mission Help build a new modern socialist Tibet that unites, enriches, civilizations, harmony and beauty.
 Source: China Youth Daily
 Editor: Gao Xiumu

title: 新聞透視》台海少一點挑釁 換多一點和平
summary: 美國在台協會前理事主席卜睿哲近日撰文分析美台安全夥伴關係，可說是從美國的國家利益角度，對台灣提出了一些看法和建議，其中最重要的是強調，若台灣在台海主動挑釁引戰，美國未必會保衛台灣，此言論值得台灣深思。 卜睿哲在布魯金斯學會網站的文章，對台美夥伴關係提出7點看法，他的說法較委婉，翻成更直白，他要傳達的包括，台灣投入自我防衛的資源和準備不足，不能全指望美國，並透過讚揚蔡英文的兩岸政策，間接表達對賴清德...
text: 美國在台協會前理事主席卜睿哲近日撰文分析美台安全夥伴關係，可說是從美國的國家利益角度，對台灣提出了一些看法和建議，其中最重要的是強調，若台灣在台海主動挑釁引戰，美國未必會保衛台灣，此言論值得台灣深思。 卜睿哲在布魯金斯學會網站的文章，對台美夥伴關係提出7點看法，他的說法較委婉，翻成更直白，他要傳達的包括，台灣投入自我防衛的資源和準備不足，不能全指望美國，並透過讚揚蔡英文的兩岸政策，間接表達對賴清德的隱憂。他還建議台灣應更明確表達不會法理台獨，並為美國協防台灣設但書，強調若台灣主動挑釁，美國不一定會幫忙。 美國很在意台灣挑釁激怒（provoke）北京，那麼就也必須了解北京認為的「挑釁」是什麼。若從今年6月的《懲獨22條》看，不只在政治領域，包括經濟、歷史、文化等層面的去中國化，都是北京所在意的「任何形式的台獨」。 兩岸的根本分歧在於政治，捍衛中華民國是台灣任何政黨都須守護的大原則，而其他在經濟、社會、文化、歷史等領域，則可讓其自然地發展與碰撞。經濟上，在全球供應鏈重組下，正慢慢衍生出一套新的秩序，兩岸經貿就繼續跟著國際政經法則走；社會上，兩岸民間往來頻密，在官方互動受阻下，反而更應該鼓勵兩岸民間各領域多交流，用「由下而上」的力量，慢慢扭轉兩岸氛圍。 歷史文化上，則是兩岸真實存在的連結，當年大陸文革時，台灣還發起「中華文化復興運動」，但如今國安局卻把中華文化也視為要防範的大陸統戰工具，讓人詫異。新加坡國父李光耀曾指出，台灣的去中國化做法，「只會讓台灣人在統一的過程中感到更痛苦。」 台灣當前反中的政治正確濃厚，只會讓對立的言論更抬頭，無助兩岸緩和。對於民族血緣、歷史文化層面的「中國情」，台灣社會應該要有更大的包容力，這是對每個人生命歷程的尊重，也是台灣該展現的民主精神，還能降低「挑釁感」，讓大陸覺得「和平統一」仍然有望。 海陸兩會官員最近常說要「說好話、存好心、做好事」，當大陸多接收到一點好事好話的善意，兩岸和平發展的路才走得穩。
translated_summary: Recently, Richard Bush, former chairman of the American Institute in Taiwan, wrote an article analyzing the US-Taiwan security partnership. It can be said that from the perspective of the US national interests, he put forward some views and suggestions to Taiwan. The most important of these is to emphasize that if Taiwan takes the initiative to provoke a war in the Taiwan Strait, the US may not necessarily defend Taiwan. This statement is worth Taiwan's deep consideration. In his article on the Brookings Institution website, Richard Bush put forward seven views on the Taiwan-US partnership. His statement is more euphemistic, and it is more straightforward to translate. What he wants to convey includes that Taiwan's resources and preparations for self-defense are insufficient, and it cannot rely entirely on the United States. He also indirectly expressed his hidden concerns about Lai Ching-te by praising Tsai Ing-wen's cross-strait policy. He also suggested that Taiwan should make it clearer that it will not legally pursue Taiwan independence, and set a proviso for the United States to help defend Taiwan, emphasizing that if Taiwan takes the initiative to provoke, the United States may not help. The United States is very concerned about Taiwan provoking Beijing, so it must also understand what Beijing considers "provoking". Judging from the "22 Articles on Punishing Independence" in June this year, de-Sinicization in not only the political field, but also the economic, historical, and cultural aspects is what Beijing cares about "any form of Taiwan independence". The fundamental differences between the two sides of the strait are political. Defending the Republic of China is the major principle that any political party in Taiwan must uphold, while other areas such as economy, society, culture, and history can be allowed to develop and collide naturally. Economically, a new order is slowly emerging under the reorganization of the global supply chain, and cross-strait trade will continue to follow international political and economic laws; socially, cross-strait private exchanges are frequent. With official interactions blocked, we should encourage more exchanges between the private sectors on both sides of the strait, and use the power of "bottom-up" to slowly change the atmosphere between the two sides. In terms of history and culture, there is a real connection between the two sides. During the Cultural Revolution in mainland China, Taiwan also launched the "Chinese Cultural Renaissance Movement", but now the National Security Bureau regards Chinese culture as a tool of the mainland's united front that needs to be guarded against, which is surprising. Singapore's founding father Lee Kuan Yew once pointed out that Taiwan's de-Sinicization approach "will only make Taiwanese people feel more painful in the process of reunification." Taiwan's current strong anti-China political correctness will only make opposing rhetoric more prominent and will not help ease cross-strait tensions. Taiwanese society should be more tolerant of "Chinese sentiment" in terms of ethnic blood, history and culture. This is a respect for everyone's life journey and the democratic spirit that Taiwan should show. It can also reduce the "sense of provocation" and make the mainland feel that "peaceful reunification" is still hopeful. Officials from the two sessions of the mainland and the mainland have recently often said that they should "speak good words, have good intentions, and do good deeds." When the mainland receives more goodwill in the form of good things and good words, the road to peaceful development between the two sides of the strait will be stable.

title: 习近平文化思想对外翻译传播高端学术研讨会在浙江大学召开
summary: 人民网讯 9月21日，'习近平文化思想对外翻译传播高端学术研讨会'在浙江大学召开。研讨会由中央党史和文献研究院第六研究部与浙江大学联合主办。 研讨会主题为'习近平文化思想对外翻译传播研究：成就、经验和前瞻'，旨在回顾党的十八大以来，习近平文化思想对外翻译传播的历程与成就，在总结成功经验的基础上，从政治文献的翻译理念、策略、技术应用、人才培养以及翻译成果传播等多个方面，深入探讨如何更好地翻译和传播政...
text: 人民网讯 9月21日，'习近平文化思想对外翻译传播高端学术研讨会'在浙江大学召开。研讨会由中央党史和文献研究院第六研究部与浙江大学联合主办。 研讨会主题为'习近平文化思想对外翻译传播研究：成就、经验和前瞻'，旨在回顾党的十八大以来，习近平文化思想对外翻译传播的历程与成就，在总结成功经验的基础上，从政治文献的翻译理念、策略、技术应用、人才培养以及翻译成果传播等多个方面，深入探讨如何更好地翻译和传播政治文献所蕴含的中华文明精神标识和文化精髓，使政治文献翻译更好服务于新时代党和国家事业发展。 研讨会围绕'习近平文化思想理论内涵和科学体系研究''习近平文化思想对外翻译和传播研究''中央文献翻译与中国对外话语体系构建研究''中华文化外译项目成就和经验研究''中华文明精神标识与国际传播方式研究''政治文献翻译的文化价值与世界文明交流互鉴研究'等议题展开研讨。 (责编：苏缨翔、杨牧)
translated_summary: People's Daily Online: On September 21, the "High-end Academic Seminar on the Translation and Dissemination of Xi Jinping's Cultural Thoughts" was held at Zhejiang University. The seminar was co-sponsored by the Sixth Research Department of the Central Party History and Literature Research Institute and Zhejiang University. The theme of the seminar is "Research on the Translation and Dissemination of Xi Jinping's Cultural Thoughts: Achievements, Experiences and Prospects". It aims to review the process and achievements of the translation and dissemination of Xi Jinping's cultural thoughts since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. On the basis of summarizing successful experiences, from the perspectives of translation concepts, strategies, technical applications, talent training and dissemination of translation results of political documents, we will deeply explore how to better translate and disseminate the spiritual symbols and cultural essence of Chinese civilization contained in political documents, so that the translation of political documents can better serve the development of the party and the country in the new era. The seminar focused on topics such as "Research on the theoretical connotation and scientific system of Xi Jinping's cultural thoughts", "Research on the translation and dissemination of Xi Jinping's cultural thoughts", "Research on the translation of central documents and the construction of China's foreign discourse system", "Research on the achievements and experiences of Chinese cultural translation projects", "Research on the spiritual symbols of Chinese civilization and international communication methods", and "Research on the cultural value of political document translation and the exchange and mutual learning of world civilizations". (Editors: Su Yingxiang, Yang Mu)

title: 习近平会见卢旺达总统卡加梅
summary: 9月5日晚，国家主席习近平在北京人民大会堂会见来华出席中非合作论坛北京峰会的卢旺达总统卡加梅。两国元首宣布，将中卢关系提升为全面战略伙伴关系。 习近平指出，中国共产党和卢旺达爱国阵线都秉持立党为公、执政为民理念，在党的建设和领导国家发展方面成就卓越，赢得广大人民拥护。中方支持卢旺达走独立自主的发展道路，愿同卢方深化治党治国经验交流，增进政治互信，扩大理念共识，在实现各自现代化道路上并肩前行。 习近...
text: 9月5日晚，国家主席习近平在北京人民大会堂会见来华出席中非合作论坛北京峰会的卢旺达总统卡加梅。两国元首宣布，将中卢关系提升为全面战略伙伴关系。 习近平指出，中国共产党和卢旺达爱国阵线都秉持立党为公、执政为民理念，在党的建设和领导国家发展方面成就卓越，赢得广大人民拥护。中方支持卢旺达走独立自主的发展道路，愿同卢方深化治党治国经验交流，增进政治互信，扩大理念共识，在实现各自现代化道路上并肩前行。 习近平强调，此次中非合作论坛北京峰会为中卢友好关系提质升级带来历史机遇。中方愿同卢方落实此次峰会成果，加强基础设施、农业、卫星应用等领域合作，共同办好卢旺达大学孔子学院、鲁班工坊，推动两国高质量共建'一带一路'合作取得更多成果。中方赞赏卢方为维护非洲地区和平和安全所发挥的积极作用，愿同卢方深化维和等领域合作。 卡加梅表示，我对习近平主席2018年对卢旺达进行的历史性访问记忆犹新。卢中两国人民理念相似相近，都主张多边主义，都尊重主权独立。卢方坚定奉行一个中国政策，支持中国实现国家统一，这一立场建立在两国友谊和相互理解的基础上。感谢习近平主席为促进非洲和平安全、增强非洲团结合作、深化非中友好合作所发挥的重要引领作用。卢方把中国作为值得长期信赖的朋友和伙伴，愿同中方加强治国理政经验交流，推进各领域务实合作，共同落实好习近平主席提出的三大全球倡议。 双方发表《中华人民共和国和卢旺达共和国关于共同推动落实三大全球倡议的联合声明》。 峰会期间，中卢双方签署了推动落实全球发展倡议、蜂蜜输华、数字和信息通信、新闻媒体等领域多项双边合作文件。 王毅参加会见。

title: 中非合作论坛丨共叙友情 共商合作 共话未来——非洲多国人士瞩望中非合作论坛北京峰会 _光明网
summary: 新华社北京/阿比让9月3日电 题：共叙友情 共商合作 共话未来——非洲多国人士瞩望中非合作论坛北京峰会 新华社记者宋盈 张健 2024年中非合作论坛峰会将于4日至6日在北京举行。这是继2018年中非合作论坛北京峰会后中非领导人再次相聚北京，双方将围绕'携手推进现代化，共筑高水平中非命运共同体'的主题，共叙友情，共商合作，共话未来。 中非是真实亲诚的友好兄弟和发展中国家团结合作的典范，中非命运共同体...
text: 新华社北京/阿比让9月3日电 题：共叙友情 共商合作 共话未来——非洲多国人士瞩望中非合作论坛北京峰会 新华社记者宋盈 张健 2024年中非合作论坛峰会将于4日至6日在北京举行。这是继2018年中非合作论坛北京峰会后中非领导人再次相聚北京，双方将围绕'携手推进现代化，共筑高水平中非命运共同体'的主题，共叙友情，共商合作，共话未来。 中非是真实亲诚的友好兄弟和发展中国家团结合作的典范，中非命运共同体建设持续走在构建人类命运共同体的前列。中非合作论坛已成为中非合作的'金字招牌'和引领国际对非合作、深化'全球南方'合作的有效机制。 峰会将启，非洲多国人士充满期待，寄望中非共绘未来发展蓝图，携手奔赴现代化新征程，推动开启构建高水平中非命运共同体新时代。 这是9月2日傍晚拍摄的北京国家会议中心。新华社记者 李鑫摄 凝聚'全球南方'力量 中非兄弟情谊源远流长、历久弥坚。中非合作论坛2000年成立以来，中非友好务实合作实现跨越式发展。2013年，中国国家主席习近平提出的真实亲诚对非政策理念和正确义利观，引领中非命运共同体建设驶入'快车道'。在元首外交引领下，中非进入共筑高水平中非命运共同体的新阶段。 谈到即将召开的中非合作论坛北京峰会，非洲多国人士希望通过此次峰会共同壮大'全球南方'力量，推进中非命运共同体建设再上新台阶，共同发出中非推动全球治理体系改革的强音。 刚果（布）官方媒体《新共和国报》社长阿纳特·威尔弗里德·姆博萨表示，中国给予非洲的支持与帮助从来不附加任何政治条件，希望本次峰会进一步推动加强非中政治合作，在尊重非洲国家独立自主的基础上推进非中命运共同体建设。作为世界上发展中国家最集中的大陆，非洲需要与中国这个最大的发展中国家紧密团结，加强在国际事务上的合作，共同推动全球治理体系改革。 塞拉利昂《阿沃克报》主编奥斯汀·托马斯说，期待峰会为共筑高水平非中命运共同体注入强大能量。喀麦隆雅温得大学国际关系教授埃尔维斯·恩戈勒·恩戈勒说，非中都致力于进一步加强全面战略合作伙伴关系，建设更加牢固的非中命运共同体。他期待此次峰会继续倡导创新、协调、绿色、开放、共享的新发展理念，推动非中高质量合作。 南非前资深外交官、浙江师范大学非洲研究院名誉教授赫特·格罗布勒认为，非中关系有巨大的发展潜力，将继续成为'全球南方'合作的成功典范。'我们相信，通过这次峰会，非中将增进传统友谊，深化团结合作，开辟加快共同发展的新局面，谱写构建非中命运共同体新篇章。' 推进中非务实合作 谋发展、求合作是中国和非洲国家的共同追求。中非双方将'一带一路'倡议、全球发展倡议同非盟《2063年议程》及非洲多国发展战略有机对接。从'十大合作计划'到'八大行动'再到'九项工程'，中非合作不断提质升级。中国连续15年保持非洲最大贸易伙伴国地位。 5月9日，参展商在肯尼亚首都内罗毕举办的中非经贸博览会走进非洲巡展上与来宾交谈。新华社记者 李亚辉 摄 埃及苏伊士运河经济区总局主席瓦利德·贾迈勒丁在随埃及代表团出席此次峰会前对记者说，北京峰会将成为推动非中经贸伙伴沟通交流的重要平台。'我们可以跟非洲合作伙伴讨论如何更好地为他们服务，也可以讨论中国投资者如何通过埃及更好地为非洲服务。' 肯尼亚航空公司首席商务与客户官朱利叶斯·萨伊鲁对中国市场充满信心，对峰会同样充满期待。他说：'希望非中领导人共商未来发展合作大计，多走动，让肯航在中国执飞得更勤、更远。' 苏丹能源和石油部长穆希丁·纳伊姆·穆罕默德·赛义德说，期待非中双方在不断扩大基础设施、农业等传统领域投资和贸易规模的同时，将合作逐渐延伸至清洁能源、绿色经济等新兴领域，为非中共同发展提供强劲动力，为非中传统友谊开辟美好愿景。 近年来，中非人文交流向更广领域拓展，双方文化、媒体、智库交流活动精彩纷呈，民间交往热络频繁。 在浙江师范大学非洲研究院从事研究工作的喀麦隆籍博士罗德里格·泰内·塔林说，非中合作给了他前往中国、实现梦想的机会。他立志成为喀中文化交流大使，期待非中合作关系不断发展，为非洲青年创造更美好的未来。 加纳中国友好协会秘书长本杰明·阿尼亚格尔说，非中人文交流逐年升温，人民友谊不断加深，助推非中在政治、经贸等领域友好合作。'我期待非中能借此次峰会进一步扩大人文交流，推动科技合作，增加双方留学生互派力度，使非中友谊结出更多果实。' 携手奔赴现代化新征程 非洲被称为'世界上最年轻的大陆'。推动现代化进程是中国同非洲的共同梦想。如何将巨大的人口规模转化为人力资源优势，助力现代化发展，是中国和非洲发展振兴的关键。 去年8月，习近平主席在南非出席中非领导人对话会时宣布了中方支持非洲工业化、农业现代化和人才培养的三大举措，涵盖非洲现代化建设迫切需要的领域。中方还发布《中非人才培养合作计划》，宣布将同非洲继续加强技术转移、教育培训等能力建设合作。 肯尼亚总统鲁托在启程前往北京出席峰会前表示，肯方相信本次峰会将为肯中合作注入新动能，助力肯尼亚及更多非洲国家迈向现代化。他说，肯中双方正通过共同探索现代化的生动实践，携手构建人类命运共同体，造福两国人民。 刚果（布）发行量最大的报纸《布拉柴维尔快讯报》主编居伊-热尔韦·基蒂纳说，数十年来，中国的经济发展成果惠及非洲，希望此次峰会能够继续帮助非洲探索农业产业化发展道路，推动非中科技领域交流，为促进非洲国家经济发展和实现现代化贡献更多力量。 在津巴布韦经济学家保罗·穆索扎看来，加快现代化进程是非中人民的共同期待。非洲当前仍面临初级产品出口占比较高、交通与能源基础设施不完善、农业生产力水平较低等问题，中国是帮助非洲应对这些挑战的最佳伙伴。 加纳智库非中政策咨询中心执行主任保罗·弗林蓬说，非中合作求真务实，给非中人民带来实实在在的好处，中国永远是非洲迈向现代化道路上的最可靠伙伴。 [ 责编：袁晴 ] 阅读剩余全文（ ）
translated_summary:
Xinhua News Agency Beijing/Abidjan, September 3. Topic: Friendship, consultation and cooperation in China and China Talk about the future together —— People from many African countries are looking forward to the Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation
 Xinhua News Agency reporter Song Ying and Zhang Jian
 The 2024 Forum on China-Africa Cooperation Summit will be held in Beijing from the 4th to the 6th. This is the second time that Chinese and African leaders have gathered in Beijing after the 2018 Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation. The two sides will focus on the theme of "jointly promoting modernization and building a high-level China-Africa community with a shared future", discuss friendship, discuss cooperation, and talk about the future.
 China and Africa are examples of true, cordial, friendly brothers and solidarity and cooperation among developing countries. The construction of a community with a shared future for China and Africa continues to be at the forefront of building a community with a shared future for mankind. The Forum on China-Africa Cooperation has become the 'golden sign' of China-Africa cooperation and an effective mechanism to lead international cooperation with Africa and deepen cooperation in the 'Global South'.
 The summit will begin. People from many African countries are full of expectations and hope that the Communist Party of China and Africa will draw a blueprint for future development, join hands on a new journey of modernization, and promote the beginning of a new era of building a high-level community with a shared future for China and Africa.
 This was taken at the Beijing National Convention Center on the evening of September 2. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Xin
 Gathering the power of the 'Global South'
 The brotherhood between China and Africa has a long history and lasts forever. Since the establishment of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation in 2000, China-Africa friendly and pragmatic cooperation has achieved leapfrog development. In 2013, Chinese President Xi Jinping proposed the policy concept of "true, cordiality and sincerity towards Africa" and the correct view of justice and interests, leading the construction of a community with a shared future for China and Africa to enter the 'fast lane'. Under the guidance of the diplomatic leadership of the head of state, China and Africa have entered a new stage of jointly building a high-level community with a shared future for China and Africa.
 Talking about the upcoming Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation, many African people hope that through this summit, they can jointly strengthen the power of the 'Global South', promote the construction of a community with a shared future for China and Africa to a new level, and jointly make a strong statement that China and Africa will promote the reform of the global governance system.
 Anat Wilfried Mbosa, president of Congo's official media 《 New Republic 》, said that China's support and help to Africa have never attached any political conditions and hopes that this summit will further promote the strengthening of Africa-China political cooperation and promote the construction of a community with a shared future for Africa and China on the basis of respecting the independence of African countries. As the continent with the largest concentration of developing countries in the world, Africa needs to work closely with China, the largest developing country, to strengthen cooperation in international affairs and jointly promote the reform of the global governance system.
 Sierra Leone 《 Avok newspaper 》 editor-in-chief Austin Thomas said he looked forward to the summit injecting strong energy into building a high-level African-Chinese community with a shared future. Elvis Ngole Ngole, professor of international relations at the University of Yaounde in Cameroon, said that Africa and China are committed to further strengthening the comprehensive strategic cooperative partnership and building a stronger community with a shared future for Africa and China. He looks forward to this summit continuing to advocate new development concepts of innovation, coordination, green, openness and sharing, and promoting high-quality cooperation between Africa and China.
 Hurt Grobler, a former senior diplomat in South Africa and emeritus professor at the Institute of African Studies at Zhejiang Normal University, believes that Africa-China relations have huge development potential and will continue to be a successful model of cooperation in the 'Global South'. ' We believe that through this summit, Africa and China will enhance traditional friendship, deepen unity and cooperation, open up a new situation to accelerate common development, and write a new chapter in building a community with a shared future for Africa and China. '
 Promote practical cooperation between China and Africa
 Seeking development and cooperation is the common pursuit of China and African countries. China and Africa will organically connect the 'Belt and Road' initiative and global development initiative with the African Union 《 2063 Agenda 》 and the African multinational development strategy. From the 'Ten Major Cooperation Plans' to the 'Eight Major Actions' to the 'Nine Projects', China-Africa cooperation continues to improve and upgrade. China has maintained its status as Africa's largest trading partner for 15 consecutive years.
 On May 9, exhibitors talked with guests at the China-Africa Economic and Trade Expo "Into Africa Tour" held in Nairobi, the capital of Kenya. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Yahui
 Walid Jamal al-Din, Chairman of the General Administration of the Suez Canal Economic Zone in Egypt, told reporters before attending the summit with the Egyptian delegation that the Beijing Summit will become an important platform to promote communication between Africa and China's economic and trade partners. ' We can discuss with our African partners how to better serve them, and we can also discuss how Chinese investors can better serve Africa through Egypt. '
 Julius Saylu, Chief Commercial and Customer Officer of Kenya Airways, is confident in the Chinese market and is also looking forward to the summit. He said: 'I hope that African and Chinese leaders will discuss plans for future development cooperation and move around more so that Kenya Airways can fly more frequently and further in China.'
 Sudan’s Minister of Energy and Petroleum Muhidin Naim Mohammed Said said that he expects Africa and China to gradually extend cooperation to clean energy, green economy and other areas while continuously expanding the scale of investment and trade in traditional fields such as infrastructure and agriculture. Emerging fields provide strong impetus for Africa-China common development and open up a beautiful vision for Africa-China traditional friendship.
 In recent years, China-Africa people-to-people and cultural exchanges have expanded to a wider range of fields. The exchanges between the two sides' culture, media, and think tanks have been exciting, and people-to-people exchanges have been frequent.
 Rodrigo Tene Tallinn, a Cameroonian doctor who is engaged in research at the Institute of African Studies at Zhejiang Normal University, said that Africa-China cooperation gave him the opportunity to go to China and realize his dream. He aspires to become the Cameroon-China cultural exchange ambassador and looks forward to the continuous development of Africa-China cooperative relations and creating a better future for African youth.
 Benjamin Anyagal, secretary-general of the Ghana-China Friendship Association, said that people-to-people and cultural exchanges between Africa and China are heating up year by year, and people's friendship is deepening, promoting friendly cooperation between Africa and China in politics, economy and trade and other fields.' I hope that Africa and China can use this summit to further expand people-to-people and cultural exchanges, promote scientific and technological cooperation, increase the exchange of international students from both sides, and make Africa-China friendship bear more fruits.'
 Join hands on a new journey of modernization
 Africa is known as the 'youngest continent in the world'. Promoting the modernization process is the common dream of China and Africa. How to transform the huge population size into human resource advantages and promote modern development is the key to the development and revitalization of China and Africa.
 In August last year, when President Xi Jinping attended the China-Africa Leaders’ Dialogue in South Africa, he announced three major measures for China to support Africa’s industrialization, agricultural modernization and talent training, covering areas urgently needed for Africa’s modernization drive. China also released 《 China-Africa Talent Training Cooperation Plan 》, announcing that it will continue to strengthen capacity-building cooperation with Africa in technology transfer, education and training.
 Kenyan President Ruto said before setting off for the summit in Beijing that Kenya believes that this summit will inject new momentum into Kenya-China cooperation and help Kenya and more African countries move towards modernization. He said that Kenya and China are working together to build a community with a shared future for mankind by jointly exploring the vivid practice of modernization and benefiting the two peoples.
 Guy-Gervais Kitina, editor-in-chief of Congo's largest newspaper 《 Brazzaville Express 》, said that China's economic development results have benefited Africa for decades, and he hopes that this summit can continue to help Africa Explore the development path of agricultural industrialization, promote exchanges between Africa and China in the field of science and technology, and contribute more to promoting the economic development and modernization of African countries.
 According to Zimbabwean economist Paul Musoza, accelerating the modernization process is the common expectation of the African and Chinese people. Africa still faces problems such as a relatively high proportion of primary product exports, imperfect transportation and energy infrastructure, and low agricultural productivity levels. China is the best partner to help Africa cope with these challenges.
 Paul Frimpon, executive director of the Africa-China Policy Advisory Center, a Ghanaian think tank, said that Africa-China cooperation is truth-seeking and pragmatic, bringing tangible benefits to the African and Chinese people. China will always be Africa's most reliable partner on the road to modernization.
 [ Editor: Yuan Qing ]
 Read the rest of the full text ()

title: 中菲就仙宾礁问题进行磋商 仍坚持各自立场
summary: （北京／马尼拉综合讯）中国和菲律宾在南中国海水域争端持续延烧之际，两国就仙宾礁（菲国称萨比纳礁）等问题进行磋商。双方依旧坚持各自的立场，但愿意沟通缓解地区紧张局势。 中国外交部在官网公布，中国外交部副部长陈晓东星期三（9月11日）同菲律宾外交部副部长拉扎罗在北京举行中菲南中国海问题双边磋商机制（BCM）团长会晤。 根据中方新闻稿，双方就涉及南中国海问题特别是仙宾礁问题坦诚、深入地交换了意见。中国重...
text: （北京／马尼拉综合讯）中国和菲律宾在南中国海水域争端持续延烧之际，两国就仙宾礁（菲国称萨比纳礁）等问题进行磋商。双方依旧坚持各自的立场，但愿意沟通缓解地区紧张局势。 中国外交部在官网公布，中国外交部副部长陈晓东星期三（9月11日）同菲律宾外交部副部长拉扎罗在北京举行中菲南中国海问题双边磋商机制（BCM）团长会晤。 根据中方新闻稿，双方就涉及南中国海问题特别是仙宾礁问题坦诚、深入地交换了意见。中国重申在仙宾礁问题上的原则立场，并敦促菲律宾立即撤离有关船只。 拉扎罗星期四（9月12日）在社交平台X发布一张与陈晓东握手的照片，并配文称两人针对处理包括萨比纳礁在内的西菲律宾海（即南中国海）局势坦率交换意见。 拉扎罗说：'我重申了菲律宾的一贯立场，并探讨了缓解地区紧张局势的方法。我们同意继续就合作领域展开讨论，特别是热线机制、海岸警卫队合作和海洋科技合作。' 菲律宾外交部称，今年7月在马尼拉举行的上一次双边磋商机制会议，双方就管控阿云津礁（中国称仁爱礁）局势达成共识。 继仁爱礁之后，仙宾礁成为中菲在南中国海的冲突地，两国船只近期频繁在仙宾礁附近海域发生碰撞等冲突事件。中国官方还在8月公布一项报告，指责菲律宾海警船'非法滞留仙宾礁，已对周围自然环境产生一定的不利影响'。
translated_summary:
(Beijing/Manila Comprehensive News) As the dispute between China and the Philippines continues to rage in the waters of the South China Sea, the two countries discuss the Xianbin Reef (called Sabina Reef in the Philippines) and other issues. Negotiate. Both sides still adhere to their respective positions but are willing to communicate to ease regional tensions.
 The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on its official website that Chinese Vice Foreign Minister Chen Xiaodong and Philippine Vice Foreign Minister Lazaro held a meeting with the heads of the China-Philippines Bilateral Consultation Mechanism (BCM) on the South China Sea issue in Beijing on Wednesday (September 11).
 According to the Chinese press release, the two sides had a candid and in-depth exchange of views on issues involving the South China Sea, especially the Xianbin Reef issue. China reiterated its principled position on the Xianbin Reef issue and urged the Philippines to immediately withdraw relevant ships.
 Lazaro posted a photo of shaking hands with Chen Xiaodong on social platform.
 Lazaro said: 'I reiterated the Philippines' consistent position and explored ways to reduce regional tensions. We agreed to continue discussions on areas of cooperation, particularly the hotline mechanism, Coast Guard cooperation and marine science and technology cooperation. '
 The Philippine Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that at the last bilateral consultation mechanism meeting held in Manila in July this year, the two sides reached a consensus on controlling the situation on Ayunjin Reef (called Renai Reef in China).
 Following Renai Reef, Xianbin Reef has become a conflict zone between China and the Philippines in the South China Sea. Recently, ships from the two countries have frequently collided in the waters near Xianbin Reef and other conflicts. Chinese officials also released a report in August, accusing the Philippine Coast Guard ship of "illegally stranded on Xianbin Reef, which has had a certain adverse impact on the surrounding natural environment".

title: 中国发布丨国家医保局：20省份和新疆生产建设兵团辅助生殖纳入医保
summary: 中国网9月10日讯（记者 彭瑶） 党的二十届三中全会明确，完善生育支持政策体系和激励机制，推动建设生育友好型社会。 在国务院新闻办新闻发布会10日举行的'推动高质量发展'主题新闻发布会上，国家医疗保障局局长章轲表示， 将继续指导各地扎实做好生育保险和基本医保的有关工作，持续健全完善生育保险制度，提升制度的保障功能，推动扩大生育保险的覆盖范围，稳步提高参保人员的生育医疗费用保障水平。同时加强部门协同...
text: 中国网9月10日讯（记者 彭瑶） 党的二十届三中全会明确，完善生育支持政策体系和激励机制，推动建设生育友好型社会。 在国务院新闻办新闻发布会10日举行的'推动高质量发展'主题新闻发布会上，国家医疗保障局局长章轲表示， 将继续指导各地扎实做好生育保险和基本医保的有关工作，持续健全完善生育保险制度，提升制度的保障功能，推动扩大生育保险的覆盖范围，稳步提高参保人员的生育医疗费用保障水平。同时加强部门协同，推动建立生育支持的政策体系，共同促进人口长期均衡发展。 图为发布会现场。中国网 董宁 摄 推动探索生育津贴 直接发放给女职工本人 国家医保局持续发挥生育保险的保障功能， 减轻参保女职工生育医疗费用负担，均衡用人单位的用工成本，促进女性公平就业。 生育保险是单独一个险种，现与职工基本医保合并实施。 生育保险覆盖用人单位及其职工，保障参保女职工生育医疗费用和国家法定产假期间生育津贴待遇。 近年来，生育保险的保障功能持续发挥，2023年，全国参加生育保险2.49亿人，生育保险基金支出1177亿元，生育的参保女职工人均生育津贴2.6万元。 章轲说， 生育津贴即产假工资，由医保（生育保险）发放。目前支付生育津贴有两种方式，一种是直接给到生育的女职工，另一种方式是给到女职工所在的单位，再由单位发放给职工本人。近期， 国家医保局与 全国妇联进行了沟通，征求他们的意见，下一步将推动探索生育津贴（产假工资）更多地直接发放给女职工本人。'当然，也注意到有一些地区有地方法规，明确要求支付给企业的，再由企业支付给职工个人，我们也会推动相关的地方稳慎进行研究。 ' 多地将 辅助生殖医疗服务项目纳入医保报销 为适应国家人口战略形势和要求， 国家医保局 多措并举完善和落实积极的生育支持措施，主要体现在巩固扩大生育保险的覆盖面。 国家医保局 支持有条件的地方先行探索，允许灵活就业人员在参加职工医保的同时缴费参加生育保险，目前已指导江西、浙江、天津、贵州等省份在全省域范围内开展探索，效果良好。 与此同时，统一规范辅助生殖类医疗服务价格项目，推动将辅助生殖技术项目纳入医保支付范围。指导各省综合考虑医保基金承受能力和辅助生殖技术规范性等因素，逐步将适宜的辅助生殖技术项目按程序纳入医保基金支付范围，助力化解生育意愿家庭不能生、不敢生的困扰。目前，北京、广西、内蒙、甘肃等20个省区市和新疆生产建设兵团已经把辅助生殖医疗服务项目纳入了医保报销，预计到今年年底，将有更多省份将其纳入医保报销。 增设 '分娩镇痛' '亲情陪产'等 项目 考虑到分娩可能是女性一生中经历的最大疼痛， 国家医保局 增设了'分娩镇痛''导乐分娩''亲情陪产'等与优化生育服务相关的项目，满足产妇多元化需求，改善分娩体验。同时持续做好生育保险的经办服务，要求各地落实'申办材料最少、办事流程最简、办理时限最短、服务质量最优'的要求，精简流程，明确要求享受生育保险的待遇不再需要提供准生证、生育服务证、结婚证等其他非必要的附加材料，方便参保人的待遇享受。 '产妇刚生完小孩，还有一个特别大的担忧，就是有的孩子可能一生下来马上就要进保温箱或者进行手术，产妇还没有下病床，怎么能让这个孩子刚生下来就能够得到有效地救治、得到有效的保障？ ' 章轲说，' 我们现在特别强调'出生一件事 ' ，就是婴儿出生之后妈妈或者爸爸在床边用手机就能给宝宝参保，当时就能报销，这样婴儿的医疗费用、就医有了更好地保障。 ' 编审：魏婧
translated_summary: China.com, September 10 (Reporter Peng Yao) The Third Plenary Session of the 20th CPC Central Committee clearly stated that it is necessary to improve the policy system and incentive mechanism for supporting childbirth and promote the construction of a child-friendly society. At the press conference on the theme of "Promoting High-quality Development" held by the State Council Information Office on the 10th, Zhang Ke, Director of the National Healthcare Security Administration, said that it will continue to guide local governments to do a solid job in maternity insurance and basic medical insurance, continue to improve the maternity insurance system, enhance the protection function of the system, promote the expansion of the coverage of maternity insurance, and steadily improve the level of maternity medical expenses protection for insured persons. At the same time, strengthen departmental coordination, promote the establishment of a policy system for supporting childbirth, and jointly promote the long-term balanced development of the population. The picture shows the press conference site. China.com Dong Ning Photo Promote the exploration of maternity allowances directly paid to female employees The National Healthcare Security Administration continues to play the protection function of maternity insurance, reduce the burden of maternity medical expenses for insured female employees, balance the employment costs of employers, and promote fair employment for women. Maternity insurance is a separate insurance type, which is now implemented in conjunction with the basic medical insurance for employees. Maternity insurance covers employers and their employees, and guarantees the maternity medical expenses of insured female employees and maternity allowances during the statutory maternity leave. In recent years, the protection function of maternity insurance has continued to play a role. In 2023, 249 million people participated in maternity insurance nationwide, and the maternity insurance fund expenditure was 117.7 billion yuan. The average maternity allowance for female employees who gave birth was 26,000 yuan. Zhang Ke said that maternity allowance is maternity leave wages, which are paid by medical insurance (maternity insurance). At present, there are two ways to pay maternity allowances. One is to give it directly to female employees who give birth, and the other is to give it to the unit where the female employee works, and then the unit pays it to the employee himself. Recently, the National Medical Insurance Bureau communicated with the All-China Women's Federation to solicit their opinions. The next step will be to promote the exploration of maternity allowances (maternity leave wages) to be paid more directly to female employees themselves. 'Of course, it has also been noticed that some regions have local regulations that clearly require payment to enterprises, and then the enterprises pay to individual employees. We will also promote relevant localities to conduct prudent research. 'Many places have included assisted reproductive medical service projects in medical insurance reimbursement. In order to adapt to the situation and requirements of the national population strategy, the National Medical Insurance Bureau has taken multiple measures to improve and implement positive fertility support measures, mainly reflected in consolidating and expanding the coverage of maternity insurance. The National Medical Insurance Administration supports local areas with conditions to explore first, allowing flexible employment personnel to pay for maternity insurance while participating in employee medical insurance. At present, it has guided provinces such as Jiangxi, Zhejiang, Tianjin, and Guizhou to carry out explorations throughout the province, with good results. At the same time, it will standardize the price items of assisted reproductive medical services and promote the inclusion of assisted reproductive technology projects in the scope of medical insurance payment. It will guide provinces to comprehensively consider factors such as the affordability of medical insurance funds and the standardization of assisted reproductive technology, and gradually include appropriate assisted reproductive technology projects in the scope of medical insurance fund payment according to procedures, helping to resolve the troubles of families who want to have children but cannot or dare not have children. At present, 20 provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities including Beijing, Guangxi, Inner Mongolia, and Gansu, as well as the Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, have included assisted reproductive medical service projects in medical insurance reimbursement. It is expected that by the end of this year, more provinces will include them in medical insurance reimbursement. Adding projects such as "labor analgesia" and "family accompanying childbirth" Considering that childbirth may be the greatest pain a woman experiences in her life, the National Medical Insurance Administration has added projects related to optimizing fertility services such as "labor analgesia", "doula delivery", and "family accompanying childbirth" to meet the diversified needs of mothers and improve the childbirth experience. At the same time, we will continue to provide good services for the handling of maternity insurance, requiring all localities to implement the requirements of "minimum application materials, simplest procedures, shortest processing time, and best service quality", streamline the process, and clearly require that those who enjoy maternity insurance benefits no longer need to provide birth permits, birth service certificates, marriage certificates and other non-essential additional materials, so as to facilitate the insured persons to enjoy the benefits. "There is another big worry for mothers who have just given birth, that is, some children may need to be put into an incubator or undergo surgery immediately after birth, and the mother has not yet left the bed. How can the child be effectively treated and effectively protected as soon as it is born? " Zhang Ke said, "We now particularly emphasize 'one thing at birth', that is, after the baby is born, the mother or father can use a mobile phone at the bedside to insure the baby, and the reimbursement can be made at the time, so that the baby's medical expenses and medical treatment are better protected. " Editor: Wei Jing

title: 金融時報：台美合作強化無人機供應鏈 排除仰賴中國
summary: 英國「金融時報」（The Financial Times）今天報導，台灣和美國正規畫開啟雙方無人機業者的合作，這是打造不仰賴中國的供應鏈相關努力一環。 金融時報指出，26家美國無人系統和反無人機系統的製造商主管將於22日抵達台北，預計跟台灣的無人機業界人士、負責武器採購與研發的軍方官員，以及其他研究人員和工程專家，召開為期3天的會議。 訪團成員還包括美國商務部、國防部防務創新單位的官員，以及國防部...
text: 英國「金融時報」（The Financial Times）今天報導，台灣和美國正規畫開啟雙方無人機業者的合作，這是打造不仰賴中國的供應鏈相關努力一環。 金融時報指出，26家美國無人系統和反無人機系統的製造商主管將於22日抵達台北，預計跟台灣的無人機業界人士、負責武器採購與研發的軍方官員，以及其他研究人員和工程專家，召開為期3天的會議。 訪團成員還包括美國商務部、國防部防務創新單位的官員，以及國防部微電子研究與工程部門主管謝諾伊（Dev Shenoy）。 中國無人機產業規模全球居冠，而台美共商打造無人機供應鏈的雙邊交流，凸顯更多產業「去風險」（de-risking）而展開的種種努力，這是源於美中角力以及華府對於若干中國產品的安全疑慮，尤其是軍民兩用產品。 即使許多西方國家設法降低他們對台灣晶片製造商的仰賴，但這些西方國家還是強調，台灣的科技讓自身依舊是全球供應鏈要角。 美方這次組團來訪的重點之一，就是讓美國業者尋覓非中國零組件的供應商或製造夥伴。 訪台美企包括生產彈簧刀（Switchblade）自殺無人機的空境公司（Aero Vironment），台灣正採購超過700套的彈簧刀系統。 其他訪團成員還有反無人機系統供應商Dedrone，以及聲稱要大舉進軍台灣市場的武器承包商諾斯洛普格拉曼（Northrop Grumman）。 台灣擁有數十家商用無人機企業，不過相較於中國的無人機業者，台灣相關企業的規模不大，而且向來以生產比較小型的飛行機具為主。 受到2022年俄羅斯揮軍入侵烏克蘭的影響，台灣政府致力於「無人機國家隊」計畫，以推動無人機產業。
translated_summary: The Financial Times reported today that Taiwan and the United States are planning to start cooperation between drone manufacturers on both sides, as part of efforts to build a supply chain that does not rely on China. The Financial Times pointed out that executives from 26 U.S. drone and anti-drone system manufacturers will arrive in Taipei on the 22nd and are expected to hold a three-day meeting with Taiwanese drone industry professionals, military officials responsible for weapons procurement and development, and other researchers and engineering experts. The delegation also includes officials from the U.S. Department of Commerce, the Defense Innovation Unit of the Department of Defense, and Dev Shenoy, director of the Department of Defense's Microelectronics Research and Engineering Division. China's drone industry is the largest in the world, and the bilateral exchanges between Taiwan and the United States on building a drone supply chain highlight the various efforts to "de-risk" the industry, which stems from the US-China tussle and Washington's security concerns about some Chinese products, especially dual-use products. Even though many Western countries have tried to reduce their reliance on Taiwanese chip manufacturers, they still emphasize that Taiwan's technology makes it still a key player in the global supply chain. One of the focuses of the US delegation's visit this time is to let American companies find suppliers or manufacturing partners for non-Chinese components. The US companies visiting Taiwan include Aero Vironment, which produces the Switchblade suicide drone. Taiwan is purchasing more than 700 Switchblade systems. Other members of the delegation include Dedrone, a supplier of anti-drone systems, and Northrop Grumman, a weapons contractor that claims to be making a big push into the Taiwanese market. Taiwan has dozens of commercial drone companies, but compared to Chinese drone companies, Taiwan's related companies are small in scale and have always focused on producing smaller flying machines. Influenced by Russia's 2022 military invasion of Ukraine, the Taiwanese government is committed to the "National Drone Team" plan to promote the drone industry.

title: 几十年的不解之缘——习近平总书记和陕西的故事
summary: 【学习进行时】10日下午至11日上午，习近平总书记先后来到陕西省宝鸡市和甘肃省天水市考察调研。在宝鸡市，习近平考察了宝鸡青铜器博物院、渭河生态公园，了解当地加强文物保护利用和开展渭河生态保护治理等情况。新华社《学习进行时》推出文章，一起了解总书记和陕西的故事。 陕西，是华夏文明的重要发祥地之一，是具有光荣革命传统的红色热土，也是共建'一带一路'重要节点。 党的十八大以来，习近平总书记多次赴陕西考察...
text: 【学习进行时】10日下午至11日上午，习近平总书记先后来到陕西省宝鸡市和甘肃省天水市考察调研。在宝鸡市，习近平考察了宝鸡青铜器博物院、渭河生态公园，了解当地加强文物保护利用和开展渭河生态保护治理等情况。新华社《学习进行时》推出文章，一起了解总书记和陕西的故事。 陕西，是华夏文明的重要发祥地之一，是具有光荣革命传统的红色热土，也是共建'一带一路'重要节点。 党的十八大以来，习近平总书记多次赴陕西考察调研，希望陕西在推进中国式现代化建设中要有勇立潮头、争当时代弄潮儿的志向和气魄，奋力追赶、敢于超越，在西部地区发挥示范作用，'奋力谱写中国式现代化建设的陕西篇章'。 2015年2月13日，习近平在陕西省延安市延川县文安驿镇梁家河村看望村民，并就老区脱贫致富进行实地调研。新华社记者 兰红光 摄 我把心留在了这里 2015年2月13日，农历乙未年春节前夕，习近平总书记来到陕西考察调研，第一站来到延安市延川县梁家河村。总书记给乡亲们带来了年货。饺子粉、大米、食用油、肉制品，还有春联、年画，家家有份。这些都是习近平自己出钱采办的。 1969年，不满16岁的习近平来到梁家河插队，在这里度过了7年的知青岁月。习近平住窑洞、睡土炕，忍耐跳蚤叮咬，与村民同吃同住，打坝挑粪、修公路、建沼气，在这里加入中国共产党，担任大队党支部书记……直到1975年秋天才离开这里。 黄土地的生活虽然异常艰苦，但也成为习近平锻炼成长、施展才干的第一个舞台。 在村口一块写着'知青淤地坝'的石碑前，十几位乡亲激动地同习近平总书记握手寒暄，欢迎他回家。 虽然每个人脸上都印刻着岁月的沧桑，但老朋友相见十分亲热。 到山上看果林时，总书记指着一道山梁说，那时冬天我就是在这个山上打柴。那时候放羊，把羊圈在一个山峁上，自己就开始看书、冥想了。说着，他转过身去，极目远眺。片刻，自言自语道：离开这里都40年了。 到村民刘金莲家，一跨进院门，总书记就指着靠外边的那孔窑洞说，我刚到梁家河时，就住这间。到旁边张卫庞家，总书记指着院子里的碾子说，这个还在，那时我经常来这里磨面。 来到居住过多年的知青窑洞，总书记指着窗户下面说，那时候这里摆着一张绿色的书桌，那边还有个架子，我们装行李用的皮箱就放在上面。 院子外面，保留着一口沼气池。1974年，时任大队党支书的习近平带领梁家河村民建成了这口沼气池，这也是陕西省的第一口沼气池。旁边窑洞的外墙上，是一幅手绘的宣传画。上面写着'自力更生、艰苦奋斗'八个大字。总书记感慨道，这幅画也40年了。 确实，7年的农村生活、7年的甘苦与共，这段与黄土高原纯朴乡亲摸爬滚打在一起、同吃同住同劳动的岁月，终生难忘。 村委会的小院被围得水泄不通。老人、青年、孩子，争着同总书记握手。 习近平总书记发表了深情的感言。他说，今天能够回来看一看，心情很激动，看到大家感到很亲切。1969年1月，我迈出人生的第一步，就到了梁家河。在这里一呆就是7年。当年，我人走了，但我把心留在了这里。 总书记说，我在这里当了大队党支部书记。从那时起就下定决心，今后有条件有机会，要做一些为百姓办好事的工作。我相信这里的明天会更好。我更愿意看到的是，我们的下一代健康成长，成为为人民做有益事情的好人才。 2021年7月1日，在陕西延安杨家岭福州希望小学，师生收看庆祝中国共产党成立100周年大会。新华社记者 张博文 摄 一份特殊牵挂 在陕西延安杨家岭旁坐落着杨家岭福州希望小学。两次通信，两次到访，习近平总书记对这所小学有着一份特殊牵挂。 1995年，时任福州市委书记习近平发起一项'千家企业建千校'的爱心活动。福州一家企业全体员工捐款52万元，对延安杨家岭小学进行了重建。当年3月，习近平给学校校长写来一封信。信中说：'有机会通过捐建希望小学与你们建立联系，很高兴。帮助老区、贫困地区发展教育事业，解决学生入学困难问题，是实现共同富裕的一个重要方式，也是新时期扶贫工作的一项富有意义的内容。' 2008年，汶川特大地震发生不久，时任国家副主席习近平到陕西汉中指导抗震救灾、慰问灾区群众。希望小学的孩子们在电视上看到后，给习近平写了一封信。信中说：'要把节省下来的钱捐给灾区小朋友，希望他们早日有个像我们这样的新校园。' 10天后，正值六一儿童节前夕，习近平提笔给孩子们回信，勉励他们发扬延安精神，勤奋学习，健康成长，努力成为社会主义事业接班人。 2009年11月，习近平到陕西考察工作期间，专门到学校看望师生。 2015年2月，习近平总书记又来到这里。总书记仔细观看学生们的学习和课余活动成果展示，了解师资情况，对学校办学给予肯定。 总书记对大家说，教育很重要。革命老区、贫困地区要脱贫致富，从根儿上还是要把教育抓好，不能让孩子输在起跑线上。国家的资金会向教育倾斜、向基础教育倾斜、向革命老区基础教育倾斜。 如今的杨家岭福州希望小学，盖起了多层教学楼，书法室、美术室、音乐室、舞蹈室一应俱全。学校的教师队伍素质也在不断提升，孩子们还可以通过远程同步互动课堂，与福州市的老师同学们'同上一节课'。 这是2019年7月26日拍摄的陕西省西安市长安区秦岭违建别墅拆除后建设的秦岭和谐森林公园（无人机照片）。新华社记者 刘潇 摄 在陕西当干部，首先要了解这个教训 秦岭，中华祖脉。曾有一些人盯上秦岭的好山好水，企图将'国家公园'变为'私家花园'，一栋栋违规、违法修建的别墅蚕食着秦岭山脚的绿色，严重破坏当地生态环境。 2014年5月，习近平总书记就秦岭北麓西安段圈地建别墅问题作出重要批示。然而，个别地方领导干部没有从政治上真正高度重视、切实真抓实改，形式主义走过场、官僚主义不作为，导致违建问题没有得到彻底整治。 对此，习近平总书记扭住不放、一抓到底，多次作出重要批示指示。 2018年7月，习近平总书记对秦岭违建别墅第6次作出批示：'首先从政治纪律查起，彻底查处整而未治、阳奉阴违、禁而不绝的问题。'随后，党中央派出专项整治工作组入驻陕西，督促整改。2018年7月后，位于秦岭北麓西安境内的1100多栋违建别墅被依法拆除，多名领导干部因违纪违法被立案调查。 2020年4月，习近平总书记深入秦岭腹地，实地了解秦岭生态保护工作情况，谆谆告诫：'秦岭违建是一个大教训。从今往后，在陕西当干部，首先要了解这个教训，切勿重蹈覆辙，切实做守护秦岭生态的卫士。' 看过全面复绿的别墅区图片，远眺生机盎然的秦岭，总书记就推动生态文明建设叮嘱领导干部：'要以功成不必在我的胸怀，真正对历史负责、对民族负责，不能在历史上留下骂名。' 策划：储学军 统筹：车玉明 李志晖 执行：万 方 王子晖 翁伟庆 唐心怡 主笔：金佳绪 潘子荻 参与记者：张芮绮 刘 淼 新华网制作 新华社第一工作室出品
translated_summary: 【Learning in Progress】 From the afternoon of the 10th to the morning of the 11th, General Secretary Xi Jinping visited Baoji City, Shaanxi Province and Tianshui City, Gansu Province for inspection and research. In Baoji City, Xi Jinping visited the Baoji Bronze Museum and Weihe Ecological Park to learn about the local situation of strengthening the protection and utilization of cultural relics and carrying out the ecological protection and management of the Weihe River. Xinhua News Agency's "Learning in Progress" launched an article to learn about the story of the General Secretary and Shaanxi. Shaanxi is one of the important birthplaces of Chinese civilization, a red hot land with a glorious revolutionary tradition, and an important node for the joint construction of the "Belt and Road". Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping has visited Shaanxi for inspection and research many times. He hopes that Shaanxi will have the ambition and courage to stand at the forefront and become the trend-setter of the times in promoting China's modernization, strive to catch up and dare to surpass, play a demonstration role in the western region, and "strive to write the Shaanxi chapter of China's modernization." On February 13, 2015, Xi Jinping visited villagers in Liangjiahe Village, Wenanyi Town, Yanchuan County, Yan'an City, Shaanxi Province, and conducted on-site research on poverty alleviation and prosperity in old revolutionary areas. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Lan Hongguang I left my heart here On February 13, 2015, on the eve of the Spring Festival of the Year of the Sheep in the lunar calendar, General Secretary Xi Jinping came to Shaanxi for inspection and research. His first stop was Liangjiahe Village, Yanchuan County, Yan'an City. The general secretary brought New Year's goods to the villagers. Dumpling flour, rice, cooking oil, meat products, as well as Spring Festival couplets and New Year paintings, every family had a share. These were all purchased by Xi Jinping himself. In 1969, Xi Jinping, who was less than 16 years old, came to Liangjiahe to work in the countryside, where he spent 7 years as an educated youth. Xi Jinping lived in a cave, slept on a brick bed, endured flea bites, ate and lived with the villagers, built dams, carried manure, repaired roads, and built biogas. He joined the Communist Party of China here and served as the party branch secretary of the brigade... He did not leave here until the autumn of 1975. Although life on the loess land was extremely difficult, it also became the first stage for Xi Jinping to exercise, grow, and display his talents. In front of a stone tablet with the words "educated youth silt dam" at the entrance of the village, more than a dozen villagers excitedly shook hands with General Secretary Xi Jinping and greeted him home. Although the vicissitudes of life were imprinted on everyone's face, the old friends were very cordial when they met. When they went to the mountain to see the orchard, the General Secretary pointed to a ridge and said, "I used to collect firewood on this mountain in winter." At that time, he herded sheep and put the sheep in a circle on a hill. He began to read and meditate. As he said this, he turned around and looked into the distance. After a moment, he said to himself: It has been 40 years since I left here. When he arrived at the home of villager Liu Jinlian, as soon as he stepped into the courtyard, the General Secretary pointed to the cave house on the outside and said, "I lived in this one when I first arrived in Liangjiahe." When he arrived at Zhang Weipang's house next door, the General Secretary pointed to the millstone in the yard and said, "This is still there. I often came here to grind flour." When he came to the cave house where the educated youth had lived for many years, the General Secretary pointed to the bottom of the window and said, "At that time, there was a green desk here, and there was a shelf over there, where our suitcases were placed. Outside the yard, a biogas tank is preserved. In 1974, Xi Jinping, then the Party Secretary of the Brigade, led the villagers of Liangjiahe to build this biogas digester, which was also the first biogas digester in Shaanxi Province. On the outer wall of the cave next to it is a hand-painted propaganda poster. It reads "Self-reliance and hard work". The General Secretary sighed and said that this painting is also 40 years old. Indeed, seven years of rural life, seven years of sharing joys and sorrows, this period of time of struggling with the simple folks of the Loess Plateau, eating, living and working together, will be unforgettable for a lifetime. The courtyard of the village committee was surrounded by people. The elderly, young people, and children were vying to shake hands with the General Secretary. General Secretary Xi Jinping delivered a heartfelt speech. He said that he was very excited to be able to come back and take a look today, and he felt very cordial to see everyone. In January 1969, I took the first step in my life and came to Liangjiahe. I stayed here for 7 years. At that time, I left, but I left my heart here. The General Secretary said that I was the Party Secretary of the Brigade here. From then on, I made up my mind that if I have the conditions and opportunities in the future, I will do some good things for the people. I believe that tomorrow here will be better. What I would rather see is that our next generation grows up healthily and becomes good talents who do good things for the people. On July 1, 2021, teachers and students watched the celebration of the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China at the Yangjialing Fuzhou Hope Primary School in Yan'an, Shaanxi. Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Zhang Bowen A special concern Yangjialing Fuzhou Hope Primary School is located next to Yangjialing in Yan'an, Shaanxi. Two communications and two visits, General Secretary Xi Jinping has a special concern for this primary school. In 1995, Xi Jinping, then Secretary of the Fuzhou Municipal Party Committee, initiated a charity activity of "Thousands of Enterprises Building Thousands of Schools". All employees of a Fuzhou enterprise donated 520,000 yuan to rebuild Yan'an Yangjialing Primary School. In March of that year, Xi Jinping wrote a letter to the school principal. The letter said: "I am very happy to have the opportunity to establish contact with you through donating to build a Hope Primary School. Helping old revolutionary bases and poor areas to develop education and solve the problem of students' enrollment difficulties is an important way to achieve common prosperity and a meaningful part of poverty alleviation work in the new era. ' In 2008, shortly after the Wenchuan earthquake, Xi Jinping, then Vice President of the State, went to Hanzhong, Shaanxi to guide earthquake relief and comfort the people in the disaster area. After seeing it on TV, the children of Hope Primary School wrote a letter to Xi Jinping. The letter said: 'We should donate the money we save to the children in the disaster area, and hope that they will have a new campus like ours as soon as possible. ' Ten days later, on the eve of Children's Day, Xi Jinping wrote back to the children, encouraging them to carry forward the Yan'an spirit, study hard, grow up healthily, and strive to become the successors of the socialist cause. In November 2009, during his inspection in Shaanxi, Xi Jinping visited the school to visit teachers and students. In February 2015, General Secretary Xi Jinping came here again. The General Secretary carefully watched the students' learning and extracurricular activities, learned about the teaching staff, and affirmed the school's operation. The General Secretary told everyone that education is very important. In order to get rid of poverty and become rich in old revolutionary base areas and impoverished areas, education should be done well from the root, and children should not be left behind at the starting line. The state's funds will be tilted towards education, basic education, and basic education in old revolutionary base areas. Today, Yangjialing Fuzhou Hope Primary School has built a multi-story teaching building, with calligraphy rooms, art rooms, music rooms, and dance rooms. The quality of the school's teaching staff is also constantly improving, and children can also "take the same class" with teachers and classmates in Fuzhou through remote synchronous interactive classrooms. This is the Qinling Harmony Forest Park built after the demolition of illegal villas in Qinling in Chang'an District, Xi'an City, Shaanxi Province, taken on July 26, 2019 (drone photo). Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Xiao took the photo. To be a cadre in Shaanxi, the first thing to do is to understand this lesson. Qinling, the ancestral vein of China. Some people once set their sights on the beautiful mountains and waters of Qinling, attempting to turn the "national park" into a "private garden". Villas built illegally and illegally eroded the green at the foot of Qinling, seriously damaging the local ecological environment. In May 2014, General Secretary Xi Jinping issued an important instruction on the issue of enclosure and villa construction in the Xi'an section of the northern foot of the Qinling Mountains. However, some local leading cadres did not really attach great importance to it politically and made real efforts to make real changes. They went through the motions of formalism and did not act bureaucratically, resulting in the problem of illegal construction not being thoroughly rectified. In response to this, General Secretary Xi Jinping held on to it and made important instructions many times. In July 2018, General Secretary Xi Jinping issued the sixth instruction on the illegal villas in Qinling Mountains: "First of all, we should investigate political discipline and thoroughly investigate and deal with the problems of rectification without treatment, lip service and violation, and prohibition without end." Subsequently, the Party Central Committee sent a special rectification working group to Shaanxi to urge rectification. After July 2018, more than 1,100 illegal villas in Xi'an, the northern foot of the Qinling Mountains, were demolished according to law, and many leading cadres were investigated for violations of discipline and law. In April 2020, General Secretary Xi Jinping went deep into the hinterland of the Qinling Mountains to learn about the ecological protection work of the Qinling Mountains on the spot, and earnestly warned: "The illegal construction in Qinling Mountains is a big lesson. From now on, officials in Shaanxi must first understand this lesson, avoid repeating the same mistakes, and truly be the guardians of the Qinling ecology. ' After seeing the pictures of the fully greened villa area and looking out at the vibrant Qinling Mountains, the General Secretary told the leading cadres to promote the construction of ecological civilization: 'We must have the mindset that success does not depend on me, be truly responsible for history and the nation, and not leave a bad name in history. ' Planned by: Chu Xuejun Coordinated by: Che Yuming Li Zhihui Executed by: Wan Fang Wang Zihui Weng Weiqing Tang Xinyi Chief Writer: Jin Jiaxu Pan Zidi Participating Reporter: Zhang Ruiqi Liu Miao Produced by Xinhuanet Produced by Xinhua News Agency's First Studio

title: 习近平宣布未来三年向非洲提供3600亿人民币资金支持
summary: 中国国家主席习近平宣布，未来三年将向非洲提供3600亿元（人民币，下同，661亿新元）额度的资金支持，并鼓励非洲在华发行'熊猫债'。 据中国外交部官网消息，习近平星期四（9月5日）早上在中非合作论坛北京峰会开幕式上发表主旨讲话。 习近平说，未来三年中国愿同非洲开展中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动，包括文明互鉴伙伴行动、贸易繁荣伙伴行动、产业链合作伙伴行动、互联互通伙伴行动、发展合作伙伴行动、卫生健康...
text: 中国国家主席习近平宣布，未来三年将向非洲提供3600亿元（人民币，下同，661亿新元）额度的资金支持，并鼓励非洲在华发行'熊猫债'。 据中国外交部官网消息，习近平星期四（9月5日）早上在中非合作论坛北京峰会开幕式上发表主旨讲话。 习近平说，未来三年中国愿同非洲开展中非携手推进现代化十大伙伴行动，包括文明互鉴伙伴行动、贸易繁荣伙伴行动、产业链合作伙伴行动、互联互通伙伴行动、发展合作伙伴行动、卫生健康伙伴行动、兴农惠民伙伴行动、人文交流伙伴行动、绿色发展伙伴行动、安全共筑伙伴行动。 他说，为了推动'十大伙伴行动'实施，未来三年中国政府愿提供3600亿元额度的资金支持，包括提供2100亿元信贷资金额度和800亿元各类援助、推动中国企业对非投资不少于700亿元。 习近平说，中国还将鼓励和支持非洲在华发行'熊猫债'，为中非各领域务实合作提供强有力支持。 习近平宣布，中国将向非洲提供10亿元紧急粮食援助，建设10万亩农业标准化示范区，派遣500名农业专家，建设中非农业科技创新联盟；鼓励中非企业'双向奔赴'投资创业，把产业附加值留在非洲，为非洲创造不少于100万个就业岗位。 他还说，中国将向非方提供10亿元无偿军事援助，为非方培训6000名军队人才和1000名警务执法人员，邀请500名青年军官访华。开展中非军队联演联训、联合巡航，实施'助力非洲摆脱雷患行动'，维护人员和项目安全。 中国是非洲最大的贸易伙伴，今年头七个月，中国对非洲进出口1.19万亿元人民币创新高。 据法新社报道，中国向非洲国家提供了数十亿美元的贷款，帮助它们建设基础设施，但有时也会让当地政府背上巨额债务而引发争议。
translated_summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping announced that China will provide 360 billion yuan (RMB, the same below, 66.1 billion Singapore dollars) of financial support to Africa in the next three years, and encourage Africa to issue "Panda Bonds" in China. According to the official website of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Xi Jinping delivered a keynote speech at the opening ceremony of the Beijing Summit of the Forum on China-Africa Cooperation on Thursday morning (September 5). Xi Jinping said that in the next three years, China is willing to carry out the ten major partnership actions between China and Africa to jointly promote modernization, including the Partnership Action for Mutual Learning of Civilizations, the Partnership Action for Trade Prosperity, the Partnership Action for Industrial Chain Cooperation, the Partnership Action for Connectivity, the Partnership Action for Development Cooperation, the Partnership Action for Health and Health, the Partnership Action for Prospering Agriculture and Benefiting the People, the Partnership Action for Cultural Exchange, the Partnership Action for Green Development, and the Partnership Action for Building Security. He said that in order to promote the implementation of the "Ten Major Partnership Actions", the Chinese government is willing to provide 360 billion yuan of financial support in the next three years, including 210 billion yuan of credit funds and 80 billion yuan of various assistance, and promote Chinese companies to invest no less than 70 billion yuan in Africa. Xi Jinping said that China will also encourage and support Africa to issue "Panda Bonds" in China, providing strong support for practical cooperation between China and Africa in various fields. Xi Jinping announced that China will provide 1 billion yuan of emergency food aid to Africa, build 100,000 mu of agricultural standardization demonstration areas, send 500 agricultural experts, and build a China-Africa agricultural science and technology innovation alliance; encourage Chinese and African enterprises to "run in both directions" to invest and start businesses, keep the added value of industries in Africa, and create no less than 1 million jobs for Africa. He also said that China will provide 1 billion yuan of free military aid to Africa, train 6,000 military talents and 1,000 police law enforcement personnel for Africa, and invite 500 young officers to visit China. Carry out joint exercises and joint training and patrols between the Chinese and African militaries, implement the "Help Africa get rid of mine disasters" operation, and maintain the safety of personnel and projects. China is Africa's largest trading partner. In the first seven months of this year, China's imports and exports to Africa reached a record high of 1.19 trillion yuan. According to AFP, China has provided African countries with billions of dollars in loans to help them build infrastructure, but sometimes it has caused controversy by burdening local governments with huge debts.

title: 立德树人｜以教育之强夯实国家富强之基
summary: 教育兴则国家兴，教育强则国家强。党的十八大以来，习近平总书记多次强调发展教育的重要意义，为教育强国的建设指明方向，强调要'以教育之力厚植人民幸福之本，以教育之强夯实国家富强之基'。在习近平总书记、党中央坚强领导下，我国建成了世界上规模最大的教育体系，教育现代化发展总体水平跨入世界中上国家行列。据中国教育科学研究院最新测算，2023年我国教育强国指数上升到全球第21位，是进步最快的国家。 让我们一起...
text: 教育兴则国家兴，教育强则国家强。党的十八大以来，习近平总书记多次强调发展教育的重要意义，为教育强国的建设指明方向，强调要'以教育之力厚植人民幸福之本，以教育之强夯实国家富强之基'。在习近平总书记、党中央坚强领导下，我国建成了世界上规模最大的教育体系，教育现代化发展总体水平跨入世界中上国家行列。据中国教育科学研究院最新测算，2023年我国教育强国指数上升到全球第21位，是进步最快的国家。 让我们一起来学习习近平总书记的重要论述，体悟新时代教育强国建设伟大成就！ 【责任编辑：郭泽涵】
translated_summary: When education prospers, the country prospers; when education is strong, the country is strong. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, General Secretary Xi Jinping has repeatedly emphasized the importance of developing education, pointed out the direction for building a strong country in education, and stressed the need to "use the power of education to lay a solid foundation for the happiness of the people, and use the strength of education to consolidate the foundation for the prosperity of the country." Under the strong leadership of General Secretary Xi Jinping and the Party Central Committee, my country has built the world's largest education system, and the overall level of educational modernization has entered the ranks of upper-middle countries in the world. According to the latest calculations of the Chinese Academy of Educational Sciences, my country's education power index will rise to 21st in the world in 2023, making it the fastest-improving country. Let us study General Secretary Xi Jinping's important expositions together and appreciate the great achievements in building a strong country in education in the new era! [Editor: Guo Zehan]

title: 俄罗斯总统普京会见王毅
summary: 新华社圣彼得堡9月12日电（记者安晓萌）12日，俄罗斯总统普京在圣彼得堡会见中共中央政治局委员、中央外办主任王毅。 普京请王毅转达对习近平主席的诚挚问候和良好祝愿，表示热切期盼中方出席下月举行的金砖国家领导人喀山峰会。俄方愿以今年俄中建交75周年为契机，落实好元首达成的重要共识，加强发展战略对接，推动俄中关系迈上新台阶。感谢中方对俄方担任金砖轮值主席国的支持，本次金砖国家安代会取得积极成果，成功举...
text: 新华社圣彼得堡9月12日电（记者安晓萌）12日，俄罗斯总统普京在圣彼得堡会见中共中央政治局委员、中央外办主任王毅。 普京请王毅转达对习近平主席的诚挚问候和良好祝愿，表示热切期盼中方出席下月举行的金砖国家领导人喀山峰会。俄方愿以今年俄中建交75周年为契机，落实好元首达成的重要共识，加强发展战略对接，推动俄中关系迈上新台阶。感谢中方对俄方担任金砖轮值主席国的支持，本次金砖国家安代会取得积极成果，成功举办同'全球南方'国家对话会，充分彰显了金砖影响和金砖力量。俄方愿同中方加强协调，团结更多'全球南方'国家，携手推进世界多极化进程，构建基于公正和国际法的国际秩序。 王毅转达了习近平主席对普京总统的亲切问候，表示在两国元首战略引领下，中俄新时代全面战略协作伙伴关系健康稳定发展。双方加强战略协作，反对单边霸凌，抵制阵营对抗，符合时代进步潮流和广大南方国家共同愿望。中方愿同俄方保持战略沟通，团结更多志同道合国家，促进世界多极化进程。 王毅表示，喀山峰会是金砖扩员后首次领导人会晤，中方愿同金砖伙伴团结协作，推进平等有序的世界多极化、普惠包容的经济全球化，为构建人类命运共同体作出金砖贡献。 双方还就乌克兰问题交换了看法。
translated_summary:
Xinhua News Agency, St. Petersburg, September 12 (Reporter An Xiaomeng) On the 12th, Russian President Vladimir Putin met with Wang Yi, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the CPC Central Committee, in St. Petersburg.
 Putin asked Wang Yi to convey his sincere greetings and best wishes to President Xi Jinping, and expressed his eager expectation that China would attend the BRICS Leaders' Kazan Summit to be held next month. Russia is willing to take this year's 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Russia and China as an opportunity to implement the important consensus reached by the heads of state, strengthen the docking of development strategies, and push Russia-China relations to a new level. Thanks to China's support for Russia's assumption of the rotating chairmanship of the BRICS, this BRICS Security Council has achieved positive results and successfully held a dialogue with the countries of the 'Global South', fully demonstrating the influence and power of the BRICS. Russia is willing to strengthen coordination with China, unite more countries in the 'Global South', work together to promote the world's multi-polarization process, and build an international order based on justice and international law.
 Wang Yi conveyed President Xi Jinping’s cordial greetings to President Putin, saying that under the strategic guidance of the two heads of state, the China-Russia comprehensive strategic partnership of coordination in the new era has developed healthily and stably. The two sides have strengthened strategic coordination, opposed unilateral bullying, and resisted camp confrontation, which is in line with the progressive trend of the times and the common aspirations of the majority of southern countries. China is willing to maintain strategic communication with Russia, unite more like-minded countries, and promote the process of world multipolarity.
 Wang Yi said that the Kazan Summit is the first leaders' meeting after the BRICS expansion. China is willing to work with BRICS partners to promote multi-polar, inclusive and inclusive economic globalization in an equal and orderly world and make BRICS contributions to building a community with a shared future for mankind. contribute.
 The two sides also exchanged views on the Ukraine issue.
