title: 奋进强国路 阔步新征程｜总量连上台阶 结构优化升级——新中国成立75周年经济发展成就综述
summary: 新华社北京9月8日电 题：总量连上台阶 结构优化升级——新中国成立75周年经济发展成就综述 开栏的话： 2024年是新中国成立75周年。75年来，在中国共产党的坚强领导下，全国各族人民同心同德、艰苦奋斗，取得了令世界刮目相看的伟大成就，正阔步走在中华民族伟大复兴的新征程上。9月8日起，新华社推出'奋进强国路 阔步新征程'系列报道，全景式展现新中国成立75年来取得的伟大成就，特别是党的十八大以来党和...
text: 新华社北京9月8日电 题：总量连上台阶 结构优化升级——新中国成立75周年经济发展成就综述 开栏的话： 2024年是新中国成立75周年。75年来，在中国共产党的坚强领导下，全国各族人民同心同德、艰苦奋斗，取得了令世界刮目相看的伟大成就，正阔步走在中华民族伟大复兴的新征程上。9月8日起，新华社推出'奋进强国路 阔步新征程'系列报道，全景式展现新中国成立75年来取得的伟大成就，特别是党的十八大以来党和国家各项事业取得的历史性成就、发生的历史性变革。 新华社记者陈炜伟、申铖、邹多为 2024年，新中国迎来75周年华诞。 风雨兼程，春华秋实。75年来，在中国共产党的坚强领导下，中国从温饱不足迈向全面小康，从积贫积弱迈向繁荣富强，创造了人类发展史上的伟大奇迹。 砥砺前行，扬帆奋进。党的十八大以来，以习近平同志为核心的党中央高瞻远瞩、统揽全局、把握大势，推动中国经济巨轮乘风破浪、行稳致远。 经济规模连上台阶 综合国力实现历史性跃升 初秋时节，伶仃洋波涛万里，海天一色。深中通道宛若一条巨龙，盘旋在蔚蓝海面之上。这个举世瞩目的超级工程，在今年6月30日正式通车，成为全球首个集'桥、岛、隧、水下互通'为一体的跨海集群工程。 6月27日，沐浴在晨曦中的深中通道（无人机照片）。新华社记者毛思倩 摄 重大工程是经济实力和综合国力的集中体现，是读懂中国经济的一把钥匙。 新中国成立75年来，中国经济创造了波澜壮阔、惊天动地的历史。特别是党的十八大以来，以习近平同志为核心的党中央以新发展理念为引领，着力激发高质量发展的动力、活力、潜力，有效应对前进道路上的各种风险挑战，有力促进了经济持续健康发展。 75年来，我国经济规模连上台阶。 1952年，我国国内生产总值仅为679亿元。改革开放以来，经济快速发展，经济总量1986年突破1万亿元，2000年突破10万亿元大关，2010年超过日本成为世界第二大经济体。 党的十八大以来，我国经济实力持续增强。2020年，经济总量突破100万亿元大关，2023年超过126万亿元。按不变价计算，2023年经济总量比1952年增长223倍，年均增长7.9%。 75年来，我国发展根基愈发坚实。 粮食总产量由1949年的11318万吨提高到2023年的69541万吨，把饭碗牢牢端在自己手里，农业基础地位不断强化；2023年，我国制造业增加值达33万亿元，规模连续14年位居全球首位，工业生产能力不断提升；新产业新业态层出不穷，服务业逐步成长为国民经济第一大产业。 75年来，我国经济影响力持续提升。 2023年中国经济总量占世界的比重升至17%左右。2013年至2023年，中国经济对世界经济增长平均贡献率超过30%，是世界经济增长的最大动力源。 货物贸易第一大国、服务贸易第二大国、商品消费第二大国、外汇储备第一大国……今日的中国经济，呈现万千气象。 习近平总书记指出，中国共产党100多年团结带领中国人民追求民族复兴的历史，也是一部不断探索现代化道路的历史。经过数代人不懈努力，我们走出了中国式现代化道路。 欧洲《现代外交》网站文章评价说，75年来，中国从一个贫穷的国家变成了世界第二大经济体，拥有世界上最大的制造业体系。中共十八大以来，全国人民的努力取得成果，中国发生了历史性变化，成功迈进现代化建设的新阶段。 经济结构持续优化 高质量发展扎实推进 今年7月，中国一汽自主研发的第900万辆解放牌卡车在位于吉林省长春市的智能工厂下线。70多年前，中国一汽从零起步，三年建成投产，结束了新中国不能制造汽车的历史。 解放牌卡车用七代车的更迭，印证了中国汽车工业从无到有、从弱到强的发展成就。一汽的自主创新、华丽蜕变，也是中国经济转型升级的缩影。 新中国成立75年来，我国经济从结构单一到百业兴旺，经济发展的全面性、协调性和可持续性不断增强。 特别是党的十八大以来，以习近平同志为核心的党中央锚定高质量发展目标，加快推动经济结构战略性调整，转变发展方式、优化经济结构取得实质性进展。 这是经济结构不断优化的75年—— 产业结构深刻变化，实现由农业为主向三次产业协同发展的转变；需求结构持续改善，实现由需求疲弱向'三驾马车'协同发力的转变；从城乡分割到统筹推进，区域结构优化重塑。 党的十八大以来，推动经济结构优化蹄疾步稳。传统产业转型加快，新兴产业蓬勃发展，服务业规模持续壮大。2023年最终消费支出对经济增长的贡献率达到82.5%，消费'主引擎'作用进一步增强。区域协调发展战略和区域重大战略深入实施，新的增长极增长带不断形成。2023年末常住人口城镇化率比2012年末提高13.06个百分点，城乡发展差距进一步缩小。 这是发展动力不断增强的75年—— 从'东方红一号'卫星成功发射到'天宫'遨游太空，再到C919大飞机实现商飞，中国创新实力持续跃升。 2023年，我国全社会研究与试验发展经费支出规模稳居世界第二，比2012年增长2.2倍；全球创新指数排名从2012年的第34位跃升至2023年的第12位，是前30位中唯一的中等收入经济体……党的十八大以来，创新为高质量发展注入源源动力。 这是发展空间不断拓展的75年—— 从大规模'引进来'到大踏步'走出去'，再到构建开放型经济新体制，我国经济发展不断拓展新空间。 党的十八大以来，我国货物贸易规模连创新高。2023年，实际利用外商直接投资1633亿美元，比1983年增长176倍，规模连续多年保持世界领先。共建'一带一路'朋友圈巩固扩大，分批次设立22个自贸试验区，全面开放新格局加快形成。 面对纷繁复杂的国际国内形势，今天的中国，正围绕推进中国式现代化进一步全面深化改革，因地制宜发展新质生产力，为推动高质量发展不断注入新动能。 民生福祉不断增进 人民生活水平持续提升 名字听着'土'，村子却很'潮'。走进云南省红河州开远市黑泥地社区，只见家家户户被绿树鲜花环绕，阳光照耀之下，房屋错落有致，道路宽阔整洁，彩色民居熠熠生辉。 从昔日'道路拧麻花、污水靠蒸发、垃圾靠风刮'的贫困村，到如今吃上'旅游饭'、过上好日子，今年上半年已实现旅游收入70多万元……黑泥地的蝶变是乡村振兴的真实写照。 新中国成立75年来，我国始终把增进民生福祉作为经济发展的出发点和落脚点。 特别是党的十八大以来，面对人民日益增长的美好生活需要，以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚持以人民为中心的发展思想，不断补齐民生保障短板，人民群众的获得感成色更足、幸福感更可持续、安全感更有保障。 绝对贫困问题得到历史性解决—— 新中国成立初期，国家积贫积弱，人民普遍贫困。经过多年不懈奋斗，贫困人口显著减少。党的十八大以来，我国全面打响脱贫攻坚战。到2020年底现行标准下9899万农村贫困人口全部脱贫，832个贫困县全部摘帽，区域性整体贫困得到解决，完成消除绝对贫困的艰巨任务。 人民生活发生翻天覆地变化—— 49.7元，这是1949年全国居民人均可支配收入；到1978年改革开放初期，也仅有171元。2023年,全国居民人均可支配收入达到3.92万元,扣除物价因素比1949年实际增长76倍，年均增长6%。 党的十八大以来，就业优先战略深入实施，2013年至2023年累计实现城镇新增就业超1.4亿人。居民收入稳步增加，生活品质不断提升，居民每百户家用汽车拥有量从2013年的16.9辆增加到2023年的49.7辆。我国以前所未有的力度推进生态文明建设，重污染天数明显减少，水环境质量显著改善，土壤环境风险得到有效管控，万里山河增添了山青、水绿、天蓝、土净的亮丽底色。 社会保障网越织越密—— 新中国成立初期，我国社会保障尚属空白。改革开放以来，我国社会保障制度逐步建立，覆盖面持续扩大。 党的十八大以来，社会保障体系建设驶入快车道，我国建成世界上规模最大的社会保障体系。2023年底，基本养老、基本医疗、工伤、失业保险参保人数分别达到10.7亿人、13.3亿人、3亿人、2.4亿人。住房保障力度加大，养老服务加快发展，儿童福利和未成年人保护体系不断完善。 75年披荆斩棘，75年沧桑巨变。回望过去，中国经济创造奇迹、实现跃升；展望未来，在以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下，中国经济高质量发展步履坚定，必将开拓出更加光明的发展前景。 (责编：岳弘彬、牛镛)
translated_summary: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, September 8th. Title: The total volume has been continuously upgraded, and the structure has been optimized and upgraded - a review of the economic development achievements of the 75th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China. Opening remarks: 2024 is the 75th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China. Over the past 75 years, under the strong leadership of the Communist Party of China, the people of all ethnic groups in the country have worked together with one heart and one mind and made great achievements that have impressed the world, and are striding forward on the new journey of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Starting from September 8th, Xinhua News Agency launched a series of reports on the road to a strong country and a new journey, which will present a panoramic view of the great achievements made in the 75 years since the founding of the People's Republic of China, especially the historic achievements and historic changes in various undertakings of the Party and the country since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China. Xinhua News Agency reporters Chen Weiwei, Shen Cheng and Zou Duowei In 2024, the People's Republic of China will celebrate its 75th anniversary. The journey has been full of ups and downs, and the fruits of spring and autumn have been harvested. Over the past 75 years, under the strong leadership of the Communist Party of China, China has moved from insufficient food and clothing to a well-off society in all respects, and from poverty and weakness to prosperity and strength, creating a great miracle in the history of human development. Forge ahead and set sail. Since the 18th CPC National Congress, the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as its core has been far-sighted, has taken overall control, and has grasped the general trend, pushing the giant ship of China's economy to ride the wind and waves and sail steadily for a long time. The economic scale has been continuously upgraded, and the comprehensive national strength has achieved a historic leap. In early autumn, the waves of Lingdingyang are thousands of miles long, and the sea and sky are one color. The Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel is like a giant dragon, hovering above the blue sea. This world-renowned super project was officially opened to traffic on June 30 this year, becoming the world's first cross-sea cluster project integrating "bridges, islands, tunnels, and underwater interchanges". On June 27, the Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel was bathed in the morning light (drone photo). Photo by Xinhua News Agency reporter Mao Siqian Major projects are a concentrated reflection of economic strength and comprehensive national strength, and are a key to understanding the Chinese economy. In the 75 years since the founding of the People's Republic of China, the Chinese economy has created a magnificent and earth-shaking history. Especially since the 18th CPC National Congress, the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has taken the new development concept as the guide, worked hard to stimulate the motivation, vitality and potential of high-quality development, effectively responded to various risks and challenges on the road ahead, and effectively promoted the sustained and healthy development of the economy. Over the past 75 years, my country's economic scale has continued to rise. In 1952, my country's GDP was only 67.9 billion yuan. Since the reform and opening up, the economy has developed rapidly. The total economic output exceeded 1 trillion yuan in 1986, exceeded 10 trillion yuan in 2000, and surpassed Japan in 2010 to become the world's second largest economy. Since the 18th CPC National Congress, my country's economic strength has continued to increase. In 2020, the total economic output exceeded 100 trillion yuan, and exceeded 126 trillion yuan in 2023. Calculated at constant prices, the total economic output in 2023 will increase 223 times compared with 1952, with an average annual growth rate of 7.9%. Over the past 75 years, the foundation of my country's development has become more solid. The total grain output has increased from 113.18 million tons in 1949 to 695.41 million tons in 2023, keeping the rice bowl firmly in our own hands, and the basic position of agriculture has been continuously strengthened; in 2023, the added value of my country's manufacturing industry reached 33 trillion yuan, ranking first in the world for 14 consecutive years, and the industrial production capacity has been continuously improved; new industries and new formats have emerged in an endless stream, and the service industry has gradually grown into the largest industry in the national economy. Over the past 75 years, my country's economic influence has continued to increase. In 2023, China's share of the world's total economic output rose to about 17%. From 2013 to 2023, China's economy contributed more than 30% to the world's economic growth on average, making it the largest driving force for world economic growth. The largest country in goods trade, the second largest country in services trade, the second largest country in commodity consumption, and the largest country in foreign exchange reserves... Today's Chinese economy presents a myriad of atmospheres. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that the history of the Communist Party of China uniting and leading the Chinese people in the pursuit of national rejuvenation for more than 100 years is also a history of constantly exploring the path of modernization. After generations of unremitting efforts, we have embarked on the path of Chinese-style modernization. An article on the European website Modern Diplomacy commented that over the past 75 years, China has transformed from a poor country into the world's second largest economy with the world's largest manufacturing system. Since the 18th CPC National Congress, the efforts of the people across the country have yielded results, China has undergone historic changes, and has successfully entered a new stage of modernization. The economic structure continues to be optimized and high-quality development is steadily promoted. In July this year, the 9 millionth Jiefang truck independently developed by China FAW rolled off the production line at the smart factory in Changchun City, Jilin Province. More than 70 years ago, China FAW started from scratch and completed and put into production in three years, ending the history of New China's inability to manufacture cars. The replacement of Jiefang trucks with seven generations of vehicles confirms the development achievements of China's automobile industry from scratch and from weak to strong. FAW's independent innovation and gorgeous transformation are also a microcosm of China's economic transformation and upgrading. Over the past 75 years since the founding of New China, my country's economy has gone from a single structure to a prosperous economy, and the comprehensiveness, coordination and sustainability of economic development have been continuously enhanced. In particular, since the 18th CPC National Congress, the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has anchored the goal of high-quality development, accelerated the strategic adjustment of the economic structure, and made substantial progress in transforming the development model and optimizing the economic structure. This is the 75 years of continuous optimization of the economic structure - the industrial structure has undergone profound changes, realizing the transformation from agriculture-based to coordinated development of the three industries; the demand structure has continued to improve, realizing the transformation from weak demand to the coordinated development of the "three major drivers"; from urban-rural separation to coordinated promotion, the regional structure has been optimized and reshaped. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the optimization of the economic structure has been steadily promoted. The transformation of traditional industries has accelerated, emerging industries have flourished, and the scale of the service industry has continued to grow. In 2023, the contribution rate of final consumption expenditure to economic growth reached 82.5%, and the role of consumption as the "main engine" was further enhanced. The regional coordinated development strategy and major regional strategies were implemented in depth, and new growth poles and growth belts were constantly formed. At the end of 2023, the urbanization rate of permanent residents was 13.06 percentage points higher than that at the end of 2012, and the gap between urban and rural development was further narrowed. This is the 75 years of continuous strengthening of development momentum - from the successful launch of the "Dongfanghong-1" satellite to the "Tiangong" space travel, and then to the commercial flight of the C919 large aircraft, China's innovation strength has continued to leap forward. In 2023, the scale of my country's total social research and experimental development expenditure will remain the second in the world, 2.2 times higher than in 2012; the ranking of the Global Innovation Index will jump from 34th in 2012 to 12th in 2023, and it is the only middle-income economy in the top 30... Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, innovation has injected continuous impetus into high-quality development. This is 75 years of continuous expansion of development space - from large-scale "bringing in" to big strides in "going out", and then to the construction of a new open economic system, my country's economic development has continuously expanded new space. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the scale of my country's trade in goods has set new records. In 2023, the actual utilization of foreign direct investment will be US$163.3 billion, an increase of 176 times over 1983, and the scale has remained the world's leading for many consecutive years. The circle of friends for the joint construction of the "Belt and Road" has been consolidated and expanded, 22 free trade pilot zones have been established in batches, and a new pattern of comprehensive opening up has been accelerated. Faced with the complicated international and domestic situation, today's China is further deepening reforms around promoting Chinese-style modernization, developing new quality productivity in accordance with local conditions, and constantly injecting new momentum into promoting high-quality development. People's livelihood and well-being continue to improve, and people's living standards continue to improve. The name sounds "earthy", but the village is very "trendy". Walking into the Heinidi community in Kaiyuan City, Honghe Prefecture, Yunnan Province, every household is surrounded by green trees and flowers. Under the sunshine, the houses are scattered, the roads are wide and clean, and the colorful houses are shining. From the poor village where "the roads were twisted, the sewage was evaporated, and the garbage was blown away by the wind" in the past, to eating "tourism meals" and living a good life, the tourism income in the first half of this year has exceeded 700,000 yuan... The transformation of Heinidi is a true portrayal of rural revitalization. Over the past 75 years since the founding of New China, my country has always taken the improvement of people's livelihood as the starting point and foothold of economic development. Especially since the 18th CPC National Congress, in the face of the people's growing needs for a better life, the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core has adhered to the people-centered development philosophy and continuously made up for the shortcomings in people's livelihood security, so that the people have a stronger sense of gain, a more sustainable sense of happiness, and a more secure sense of security. The problem of absolute poverty has been solved historically - In the early days of the founding of New China, the country was poor and weak, and the people were generally poor. After years of unremitting efforts, the number of poor people has been significantly reduced. Since the 18th CPC National Congress, my country has launched a comprehensive battle against poverty. By the end of 2020, all 98.99 million rural poor people will be lifted out of poverty under the current standards, and all 832 poor counties will be lifted out of poverty. Regional overall poverty will be solved, and the arduous task of eliminating absolute poverty will be completed. People's lives have undergone earth-shaking changes - 49.7 yuan, this is the per capita disposable income of residents nationwide in 1949; by 1978, at the beginning of reform and opening up, it was only 171 yuan. In 2023, the per capita disposable income of residents nationwide will reach 39,200 yuan, which is 76 times higher than that in 1949 after deducting price factors, with an average annual growth of 6%. Since the 18th CPC National Congress, the employment priority strategy has been deeply implemented, and more than 140 million new urban jobs have been created from 2013 to 2023. Residents' income has steadily increased, and their quality of life has been continuously improved. The number of cars per 100 households has increased from 16.9 in 2013 to 49.7 in 2023. my country has promoted the construction of ecological civilization with unprecedented strength. The number of days with heavy pollution has been significantly reduced, the water environment quality has been significantly improved, and the soil environmental risks have been effectively controlled. The mountains and rivers have added a beautiful background of green mountains, green waters, blue skies and clean soil. The social security network is getting denser and denser. In the early days of the founding of New China, my country's social security was still blank. Since the reform and opening up, my country's social security system has been gradually established and its coverage has continued to expand. Since the 18th CPC National Congress, the construction of the social security system has entered the fast lane, and my country has built the world's largest social security system. By the end of 2023, the number of people covered by basic pension, basic medical care, work-related injury and unemployment insurance will reach 1.07 billion, 1.33 billion, 300 million and 240 million respectively. Housing security has been strengthened, elderly care services have been developed faster, and child welfare and protection systems for minors have been continuously improved. Over the past 75 years, China has overcome many difficulties and undergone tremendous changes. Looking back, China's economy has created miracles and achieved leaps forward; looking forward to the future, under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, China's high-quality economic development will move forward firmly and will surely open up a brighter development prospect. (Editors: Yue Hongbin, Niu Yong)

title: 视频丨习近平在全国教育大会上发表重要讲话，代表党中央向全国广大教师和教育工作者致以节日祝贺和诚挚问候
summary: 全国教育大会9日至10日在北京召开。中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席习近平出席大会并发表重要讲话。9月10日是我国第四十个教师节，习近平代表党中央，向全国广大教师和教育工作者致以节日祝贺和诚挚问候。他强调，尊师重教是中华民族的优良传统。要提高教师政治地位、社会地位、职业地位，加强教师待遇保障，提高中小学教师教龄津贴标准，落实完善乡村教师生活补助政策，推进高校薪酬制度改革。维护教师职业尊严和合...
text: 全国教育大会9日至10日在北京召开。中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席习近平出席大会并发表重要讲话。9月10日是我国第四十个教师节，习近平代表党中央，向全国广大教师和教育工作者致以节日祝贺和诚挚问候。他强调，尊师重教是中华民族的优良传统。要提高教师政治地位、社会地位、职业地位，加强教师待遇保障，提高中小学教师教龄津贴标准，落实完善乡村教师生活补助政策，推进高校薪酬制度改革。维护教师职业尊严和合法权益，减轻教师非教育教学任务负担，做好教师荣休工作。进一步加大优秀教师选树表彰和宣传力度，让教师享有崇高社会声望、成为最受社会尊重的职业之一。
translated_summary: The National Education Conference was held in Beijing from the 9th to the 10th. Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, attended the conference and delivered an important speech. September 10 is the 40th Teachers' Day in my country. On behalf of the Party Central Committee, Xi Jinping extended holiday congratulations and sincere greetings to teachers and educators across the country. He emphasized that respecting teachers and teaching is an excellent tradition of the Chinese nation. It is necessary to improve the political, social and professional status of teachers, strengthen the protection of teachers' treatment, improve the teaching age allowance standards for primary and secondary school teachers, implement and improve the living subsidy policy for rural teachers, and promote the reform of the college salary system. Safeguard the professional dignity and legitimate rights and interests of teachers, reduce the burden of non-educational teaching tasks on teachers, and do a good job in teacher retirement work. Further increase the recognition and publicity of outstanding teachers, so that teachers can enjoy high social prestige and become one of the most respected professions in society.

title: 朝鲜外务省工作代表团对越南进行访问
summary: 越通社河内——9月9日下午，越南政府副总理兼外交部部长裴青山在外交部驻地会见了朝鲜外务省副相朴祥吉（Pak Sang Kil）。 会见上， 裴青山高度评价朴祥吉在两国将于2025年纪念建交75周年之际对越进行访问；提议越南外交部和朝鲜外务省继续密切配合，促进两国高层和各级代表团互访和接触，增进友谊、互相了解与信任；促进两国合作协议落实落细；继续在地区和国际场合上相互配合，共同为维护地区与世界和平、...
text: 越通社河内——9月9日下午，越南政府副总理兼外交部部长裴青山在外交部驻地会见了朝鲜外务省副相朴祥吉（Pak Sang Kil）。 会见上， 裴青山高度评价朴祥吉在两国将于2025年纪念建交75周年之际对越进行访问；提议越南外交部和朝鲜外务省继续密切配合，促进两国高层和各级代表团互访和接触，增进友谊、互相了解与信任；促进两国合作协议落实落细；继续在地区和国际场合上相互配合，共同为维护地区与世界和平、稳定、合作与发展做出贡献。 朴祥吉高度评价越南多年来在特别是经济社会发展、后疫情时代复苏与增长等领域上取得重大成果，同时推动与世界各国之间外交关系向深度和广度拓展，为提升越南在国际舞台上的地位做出贡献等。 * 9月10日上午，越南外交部副部长范青平与朴祥吉举行了会谈。 会谈上，双方一致同意配合为开展2025年越朝建交75周年系列纪念活动做出准备，其中聚焦促进代表团互访，研究给两国带来共同利益且符合国际规定的领域合作可行性。双方同时也就地区和国际形势以及双方共同关心的问题进行讨论。 范青平强调，越南的一贯立场是一向重视两国传统友好关系，希望与朝鲜一道推动两国各个领域合作关系向前发展，符合两国人民的愿望，为地区和世界的和平、稳定、合作与发展做出贡献等。 朴祥吉强调，朝鲜劳动党总书记、国务委员长金正恩2019年3月对越进行正式访问之后，两国关系进入了新发展阶段；强调朝鲜党、国家和政府的一贯立场是希望继续维护并推动两国关系强劲发展并取得实效。 访越期间，朴祥吉前往胡志明主席陵瞻仰胡志明主席遗容并走访越南部分地方等。（完）
translated_summary:
VNA Hanoi —— On the afternoon of September 9, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Foreign Affairs of the Vietnamese government Bae Cheong-san met with North Korea's Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs Pak Sang Kil at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs station.
 At the meeting, Pei Qingshan spoke highly of Park Xiangji's visit to Vietnam on the occasion that the two countries will commemorate the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations in 2025; he proposed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Vietnam and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of North Korea continue to cooperate closely to promote exchanges of visits and contacts between high-level and all-level delegations of the two countries, enhance friendship, mutual understanding and trust; promote the implementation of the cooperation agreement between the two countries; continue to cooperate with each other on regional and international occasions Jointly contribute to maintaining regional and world peace, stability, cooperation and development.
 Park Xiangji spoke highly of Vietnam's significant achievements over the years, especially in the fields of economic and social development, recovery and growth in the post-epidemic era, while promoting the expansion of diplomatic relations with other countries around the world in depth and breadth, and contributing to Vietnam's status on the international stage. contribute etc.
 * On the morning of September 10, Vietnamese Deputy Foreign Minister Pham Thanh Binh held talks with Park Xiangji.  At the talks, the two sides agreed to cooperate in preparing for a series of commemorative activities for the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between Vietnam and North Korea in 2025, which focused on promoting mutual visits between delegations and studying the feasibility of cooperation in areas that bring common interests to the two countries and comply with international regulations. The two sides also discussed the regional and international situation and issues of common concern to both sides.
 Pham Thanh Binh emphasized that Vietnam’s consistent position has always attached great importance to the traditional friendly relations between the two countries, and hopes to work with North Korea to promote the development of cooperative relations between the two countries in various fields, in line with the aspirations of the two peoples, and to contribute to regional and world peace, stability, cooperation and development. Make a contribution, etc.
 Park Xiangji emphasized that after Kim Jong-un, General Secretary of the Workers’ Party of Korea and Chairman of the State Council, paid an official visit to Vietnam in March 2019, relations between the two countries have entered a new stage of development; he emphasized that the consistent position of the North Korean party, country and government is to continue to maintain and promote relations between the two countries. Strong development and effective results.
 During his visit to Vietnam, Park Xiangji went to President Ho Chi Minh’s Mausoleum to pay homage to President Ho Chi Minh’s remains and visited some places in Vietnam. ( Finished)

title: 澳荷國會通過2758號決議不涉台 綠盼立院響應
summary: 繼澳洲參議院之後，荷蘭國會昨天以147票對3票通過「拒絕中國扭曲聯合國大會第2758號決議」動議，民進黨立法院黨團今天表示，將於立法院新會期開議後提出相同的決議文，希望朝野一起挺台灣、支持自己的國家。 對中政策跨國議會聯盟（IPAC）今年7月在台北通過決議，聯大2758號決議沒有提及台灣、沒有處理台灣的政治地位，也沒有主張中國對台主權。澳洲及荷蘭國會相繼以IPAC決議為範本，通過聯大2758號決議...
text: 繼澳洲參議院之後，荷蘭國會昨天以147票對3票通過「拒絕中國扭曲聯合國大會第2758號決議」動議，民進黨立法院黨團今天表示，將於立法院新會期開議後提出相同的決議文，希望朝野一起挺台灣、支持自己的國家。 對中政策跨國議會聯盟（IPAC）今年7月在台北通過決議，聯大2758號決議沒有提及台灣、沒有處理台灣的政治地位，也沒有主張中國對台主權。澳洲及荷蘭國會相繼以IPAC決議為範本，通過聯大2758號決議並不涉台的動議。 民進黨團上午於立法院舉行輿情回應記者會，黨團幹事長吳思瑤表示，非常開心台灣的民主同盟友人為台灣發聲，荷蘭跨黨派議員攜手，以147比3，高達14個政黨的支持，在荷蘭國會通過新的決議案。 吳思瑤說，這非常清楚再次對全球揭示，聯大2758號決議被當成工具，阻礙台灣在全球舞台上展現合法代表權，呼籲聯合國要重新評估、正確解讀這樣一個長期被中國扭曲的決議案，也確保決議案不會繼續被濫用、讓台灣在國際社會持續被打壓。 吳思瑤指出，除了期待有越來越多的國際民主同盟國家為台灣發聲，在即將開議的立法院新會期，民進黨團也會拋出決議文，希望國際盟友都對台灣伸出援手、為台灣發聲的同時，台灣的國會也要挺台灣，自己的國家自己挺，希望朝野各黨一起挺台灣、支持自己的國家。 國民黨團迄今尚未就此討論，不過，國民黨立委李彥秀日前曾表示，討論聯大2758號決議，應該回到「中華民國主體性」，才符合中華民國憲政體制，以及國家的利益。國民黨始終支持以「中華民國」擴大參與國際組織，提高台灣在國際社會能見度。
translated_summary: Following the Australian Senate, the Dutch Parliament passed a motion yesterday with 147 votes to 3 to "reject China's distortion of UN General Assembly Resolution 2758". The Democratic Progressive Party's Legislative Yuan caucus said today that it will submit the same resolution after the new session of the Legislative Yuan opens, hoping that the ruling and opposition parties will support Taiwan and their own country. The Inter-Parliamentary Alliance on China (IPAC) passed a resolution in Taipei in July this year. UN General Assembly Resolution 2758 did not mention Taiwan, did not deal with Taiwan's political status, and did not advocate China's sovereignty over Taiwan. The Australian and Dutch parliaments followed the IPAC resolution as a model and passed motions that UN General Assembly Resolution 2758 did not involve Taiwan. The DPP caucus held a press conference in the Legislative Yuan this morning to respond to the public sentiment. The caucus secretary general Wu Si-yao said that he was very happy that Taiwan's democratic allies spoke up for Taiwan. The cross-party Dutch MPs joined hands and passed a new resolution in the Dutch Parliament with a vote of 147 to 3, with the support of 14 political parties. Wu Si-yao said that this clearly revealed to the world again that UN General Assembly Resolution 2758 was used as a tool to prevent Taiwan from demonstrating its legitimate representation on the global stage. He called on the United Nations to re-evaluate and correctly interpret such a resolution that has been distorted by China for a long time, and to ensure that the resolution will not continue to be abused and Taiwan will continue to be suppressed in the international community. Wu Siyao pointed out that in addition to expecting more and more international democratic alliance countries to speak for Taiwan, the DPP caucus will also put forward a resolution in the upcoming Legislative Yuan session, hoping that international allies will lend a helping hand to Taiwan and speak for Taiwan, while Taiwan's Congress must also support Taiwan and support its own country. It hopes that all parties in the ruling and opposition parties will support Taiwan and their own country together. The KMT caucus has not discussed this issue so far, but KMT legislator Lee Yen-hsiu recently said that the discussion of UN General Assembly Resolution No. 2758 should return to the "subjectivity of the Republic of China" in order to comply with the constitutional system of the Republic of China and the interests of the country. The Kuomintang has always supported expanding participation in international organizations under the name "Republic of China" to increase Taiwan's visibility in the international community.

title: 中国农民丰收节丨礼赞丰收 天山南北'丰'景如画——写在第七个'中国农民丰收节'到来之际

translated_summary: 预计棉籽产量640万吨，棉籽油产量60万吨，成为国家'油瓶子'重要供应源
Unnamed: 9: 林果、畜牧、渔业结构调整增长稳定，新疆'海鲜'成为全国消费者'新宠'
Unnamed: 10: 一望无垠的整齐条田里，先进的智能化农机装备在大地上描画新疆农业的'几何美学'…… 9月20日，养殖户在博斯腾湖上捕捞螃蟹(无人机摄)。石榴云/新疆日报记者 周鹏摄 沃野五彩斑斓，农民笑脸绽放。今年，我区立足打造全国优质农牧产品重要供给基地定位，锚定建设农业强区目标，以学习运用'千万工程'经验为引领，农业农村现代化迈上新台阶，农业高质高效、乡村宜居宜业、农民收入增长，丰收的新疆大地舒展美丽画卷。 新疆粮油'贡献全国'，丰收成色足 '测产面积112.407亩，重量90560公斤，水分含量13.8%，杂质含量0.27%，折合成13%标准含水量，实际亩产796.10公斤。'9月13日，来自中国农业科学院、河北省农林科学院、石河子大学等7所科研院所的小麦专家组成的专家组，对哈密市巴里坤哈萨克自治县综合试验站联合创建的春小麦高产示范田进行实打验收。专家组宣布，此次测得春小麦百亩方平均单产达796.10公斤，创造了全国优质春小麦百亩方单产最高纪录。 9月13日，专家在巴里坤县奎苏镇'粮春1758'百亩高产示范田进行实打验收测产。梁晓东摄 '确保粮食产得出、供得上、供得优。'自治区党委农办主任、自治区农业农村厅党组书记谢映周介绍，今年以来，新疆以市场为导向、产业为主导、企业为主体、基地为依托，推进现代种业产学研相结合、育繁推一体化发展，从源头解决粮食增产'芯片'问题。以种业为基，新疆深入开展'百亩攻关、千亩创建、万亩示范'，农业农村部门制定小麦、玉米高产栽培技术方案，明确主导品种，集成推广关键技术。新疆专门成立了小麦、玉米、大豆、油料4个粮油类现代农业产业技术体系，遴选一批优秀专家组建专家团深入生产一线开展服务，推进粮油产业科技创新取得实效。 '在各方共同努力下，今年新疆冬小麦百亩、千亩、万亩集中连片的产量也分别以795.8公斤/亩、756.2公斤/亩、720.4公斤/亩，蝉联全国大面积冬小麦单产最高纪录。粮食大面积单产提升'新疆方案'获农业农村部高度肯定。'谢映周说，此外，全疆95%的杂交玉米种子外调黑龙江、山东等省份，为全国农业生产用种安全作出了新疆贡献。 数据显示，今年新疆夏粮总产量693.48万吨，保持历史第三高位。全区粮食、油料种植均超额完成年度生产任务，生产形势整体好于往年，在后期不发生大的自然灾害情况下，粮食生产将再获丰收，新增100万吨以上粮食产能目标有望实现。全区葵花、油菜、大豆等油料作物播种面积200万亩左右，较上年略有增长，预计棉籽产量640万吨，棉籽油产量60万吨，成为国家'油瓶子'重要供应源。 就业增收渠道拓宽，惠农更有效 党的二十届三中全会提出，要健全推进新型城镇化体制机制，巩固和完善农村基本经营制度，完善强农惠农富农支持制度，深化土地制度改革。 今年，新疆各地各部门持续加大强农惠农富农力度，千方百计拓宽农民增收致富渠道，扎实推进农业产业化发展，让农民增收更加稳定。 9月18日，哈密市伊吾县吐葫芦乡伊河苑社区村民卡德尔·吐乎逊在市场上销售苹果。他有4亩果园，预计今年收入3万多元。今年，伊河苑社区600余亩苹果喜获丰收。高志华摄 带着农民干，全疆各地的合作社成为小农户与大市场有效衔接的桥梁纽带。 '我们正在抓紧检修农机，为即将开始的棉花采收做准备。今年我们合作社的粮食、棉花、果蔬产量都比去年高。'9月20日，阿克苏地区阿瓦提县一家合作社负责人扎依尔·艾合麦提说。 这家合作社主要从事小麦、棉花、果蔬等种植、收购、加工，每年带动300多户农户增收，2021年被评为国家农民合作社示范社。 9月21日，吐鲁番市托克逊县博斯坦镇举办喜迎中国农民丰收节'魅力红枣情 幸福托克逊'红枣采摘开园仪式。图为助农直播电商在枣园内现场直播。宋建泽摄 乡村工厂，也是农民就业增收的'主阵地'。 走进玛纳斯县包家店镇冬麦地村滴灌带厂生产车间，生产线机声隆隆，一条条滴灌带、一卷卷农用地膜承载着村民们增收致富的期望。 '滴灌带厂年产滴灌带、水带10万卷，加厚地膜800吨，总产值超2200万元。'冬麦地村党总支书记程付海说，村民在厂里务工，包吃包住，一个月工资7000多元，在生产高峰期，滴灌带厂可吸纳冬麦地村和附近村庄80人就业。 乡村特色产业发展壮大，'土特产'带火乡亲好日子。 拜城县黑英山乡亚吐尔村是全国'一村一品'示范村镇，村里的'油鸡'是特产，被列入国家畜禽遗传资源名录。 '我从一家油鸡养殖公司买回鸡苗，养大后公司再买回去，一进一出，我能挣不少钱。'村民达吾提·阿木提说，一年下来，光靠养油鸡就挣了3万多元。 目前，黑英山乡13个村都开始发展油鸡产业，不仅解决了100多名农村富余劳动力的就业，而且带动了餐饮业的快速发展。 乡村建设深入推进，家园更和美 '我把房子旁边长期没用的羊圈、草棚都拆掉了，改成了果园、菜园、花园。你看，我家的院子是不是美得很。'9月17日，阿克苏市拜什吐格曼乡托万克阿布来西艾日克村村民帕提古丽·阿吾提对前来参观的邻居说。 今年，阿克苏市持续深入推进乡村'美丽庭院'创建工作，阿克苏市妇联引导乡村妇女积极参与。帕提古丽·阿吾提家的美丽庭院正是阿克苏市'美丽庭院'创建工作的一个生动缩影。 近年来，新疆各地各有关部门扎实开展乡村建设行动，建设宜居宜业和美乡村，广袤乡村的面貌日新月异，展现着新疆乡村振兴的新气象。 9月20日，伊犁哈萨克自治州巩留县提克阿热克镇举办'庆丰收·迎国庆·赏非遗'群众文艺展演活动，图为演出现场。杜丽娜摄 提高基础设施完备度，乡村宜居又宜业。 9月15日，博湖县环博斯腾湖公路正式通车。路上车流如织，人们驾车或前往蔬菜采摘园采摘，或到农家乐吃顿饭，这条公路，是沿线农民的增收致富路。 '以前路况不好，我们的农家乐生意比较清淡。'博湖县塔温觉肯乡克日木哈尔村村民买买提·艾比布拉说，环湖公路通车以来短短几天，农家乐里游客大增，自己忙个不停，准备明年扩大规模。 '村子美了，日子好了。'伊犁哈萨克自治州尼勒克县尼勒克镇多尔布津村文化广场，村民们每天唱歌跳舞，热闹非凡。 乡村振兴，不仅要让农民腰包越来越鼓，还要让生活越来越美好。这几年，尼勒克县加强乡村公共文化服务设施建设，乡村广场、乡村文化活动中心成为农牧民休闲时的好去处。 在尼勒克县乌赞镇江阿买里村，村民娜迪拉·艾尼瓦尔空闲时就会带着孩子来新建的文化活动室。她说：'这里冬暖夏凉环境好，孩子有书看，大人可以健身、唱歌跳舞，还可以听讲座、看展览，我们都高兴得很。' 来源：石榴云/新疆日报 （一审：罗江龙 二审：刘乐 三审：石伟）
Unnamed: 11:
Pomegranate Cloud/Xinjiang Daily reporter Wei Yonggui
 In the ninth month of golden autumn, green and gold flow, and the north and south of Tianshan Mountain usher in a good harvest season.
 95% of hybrid corn seeds are transferred to Heilongjiang, Shandong and other provinces, making Xinjiang's contribution to the safety of agricultural production and seed use across the country; '100 acres of customs research, 1,000 acres of creation, and 10,000 acres of demonstration', and Xinjiang's grain production is balanced and increased over a large area; cottonseed production is expected to be 6.4 million tons, cottonseed oil production is 600,000 tons, becoming an important supply source of national 'oil bottles'; the structural adjustment and growth of forest fruits, livestock, and fisheries is stable, and Xinjiang's 'seafood' It has become the 'new favorite' of consumers across the country; in the endless neat fields, advanced intelligent agricultural machinery and equipment depict the 'geometric aesthetics' of Xinjiang agriculture on the earth. . . . . . .
 On September 20, farmers caught crabs on Lake Constance ( drone photo ). Photo by Pomegranate Cloud/Xinjiang Daily reporter Zhou Peng
 The fertile fields are colorful, and farmers' smiling faces bloom. This year, our district is positioned as an important supply base for high-quality agricultural and animal husbandry products across the country, anchored in the goal of building a strong agricultural zone, and led by learning and applying the experience of the 'Ten Million Project', agricultural and rural modernization has reached a new level, and agriculture is of high quality and efficient, rural livable and livable industries, farmers’ income is growing, and the land of Xinjiang with a bumper harvest is stretched and beautiful.
 Xinjiang's grain and oil 'contributes to the whole country', and the harvest is fruitful and colorful
 'The measured yield area is 112.407 acres, the weight is 90,560 kilograms, the moisture content is 13.8%, the impurity content is 0.27%, converted into a 13% standard moisture content, and the actual yield per mu is 796.10 kilograms.' On September 13, an expert group composed of wheat experts from seven scientific research institutes including the Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, the Hebei Academy of Agriculture and Forestry Sciences, and Shihezi University conducted a survey on the spring wheat high-yield demonstration field jointly created by the comprehensive test station of Barkol Kazakh Autonomous County, Hami City. Conduct actual inspection and acceptance. The expert group announced that the average yield of 100 acres of spring wheat measured this time reached 796.10 kilograms, setting a national record for the highest yield of 100 acres of high-quality spring wheat.
 On September 13, experts conducted actual acceptance and production testing on 1,758 acres of high-yield demonstration fields in 1758 acres in Kuisu Town, Barkol County. Photographed by Liang Xiaodong
 'Ensure food production is available, available and well supplied.' Xie Yingzhou, director of the Agricultural Office of the Party Committee of the Autonomous Region and secretary of the Party Leadership Group of the Agriculture and Rural Affairs Department of the Autonomous Region, said that since this year, Xinjiang has been market-oriented, industry-led, enterprise-based, and base-based to promote the integration of modern seed industry, industry, academia, and research, and the promotion of breeding and breeding. Integrated development to solve the problem of increasing grain production 'chip' from the source. Based on the seed industry, Xinjiang has carried out in-depth research on 100 acres, creation of 1,000 acres, and demonstration of 10,000 acres. The agricultural and rural departments have formulated technical plans for high-yield cultivation of wheat and corn, clarified leading varieties, and integrated and promoted key technologies. Xinjiang has specially established four modern agricultural industry technology systems for grain and oil: wheat, corn, soybeans, and oil. It has selected a group of outstanding expert groups to build expert groups to carry out in-depth production and front-line services to promote scientific and technological innovation in the grain and oil industry to achieve practical results.
 'With the joint efforts of all parties, this year's concentrated contiguous production of 100 acres, 1,000 acres and 10,000 acres of winter wheat in Xinjiang has also ranked among the highest in large-area winter wheat yields in the country with 795.8 kg/acre, 756.2 kg/acre and 720.4 kg/acre respectively. The "Xinjiang Plan" to increase large-scale grain yields has been highly recognized by the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs. ' Xie Yingzhou said that in addition, 95% of hybrid corn seeds in Xinjiang are transferred to Heilongjiang, Shandong and other provinces, making Xinjiang's contribution to the safety of agricultural production and planting across the country.
 Data show that Xinjiang’s total summer grain output this year was 6.9348 million tons, maintaining the third highest level in history. The region's grain and oil planting have exceeded annual production tasks, and the overall production situation is better than in previous years. Without major natural disasters in the later period, grain production will have another bumper harvest, and the goal of adding more than 1 million tons of grain production capacity is expected to be achieved. The sown area of sunflower, rapeseed, soybeans and other oil crops in the region is about 2 million acres, a slight increase from the previous year. The cottonseed output is expected to be 6.4 million tons, and the cottonseed oil output is 600,000 tons, becoming an important supply source of national 'oil bottles'.
 The channels for increasing employment income have been broadened to benefit farmers more effectively
 The Third Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China proposed to improve the new urbanization system and mechanism, consolidate and improve the basic rural management system, improve the support system for strengthening agriculture to benefit farmers, and deepen the reform of the land system.
 This year, various departments across Xinjiang have continued to increase efforts to strengthen agriculture, benefit agriculture, and enrich agriculture, doing everything possible to broaden the channels for farmers to increase their income and become rich, solidly promoting the development of agricultural industrialization, and making farmers' income increase more stable.
 On September 18, Khadr Tohusun, a villager in Yiheyuan Community, Tohulu Township, Yiwu County, Hami City, sold apples on the market. He has 4 acres of orchards and is expected to earn more than 30,000 yuan this year. This year, more than 600 acres of apples in Yiheyuan Community have enjoyed a bumper harvest. Photo by Gao Zhihua
 Taking farmers to work, cooperatives across Xinjiang have become effective bridges between small farmers and large markets.
 'We are working hard to repair agricultural machinery and prepare for the upcoming cotton harvest. This year, the grain, cotton, fruit and vegetable production of our cooperative is higher than last year. ' On September 20, Zaire Ahemati, the head of a cooperative in Awati County, Aksu region, said.
 This cooperative is mainly engaged in the planting, acquisition and processing of wheat, cotton, fruits and vegetables, etc., driving more than 300 farmers to increase their income every year. In 2021, it was rated as a national farmer cooperative demonstration cooperative.
 On September 21, Bostan Town, Toxon County, Turpan City held a ceremony to welcome the opening of the "Charming Red Date Love and Happy Toxon" red date picking ceremony of the Chinese Farmers Harvest Festival. The picture shows the live broadcast of agricultural support live e-commerce in Zaoyuan. Photo by Song Jianze
 Rural factories are also the 'main position' for farmers to increase employment and income.
 Walking into the production workshop of the Drip Irrigation Belt Factory in Dongmaidi Village, Baojiadian Town, Manas County, the production line rumbled with machine sounds. Drip Irrigation Belt strips and rolls of agricultural mulch carried the villagers' expectations of increasing income and getting rich.
 'The drip irrigation belt factory has an annual output of 100,000 rolls of drip irrigation belts and water belts, 800 tons of thickened mulch, and a total output value of more than 22 million yuan.' Cheng Fuhai, secretary of the Party branch of Dongmaidi Village, said that villagers work in the factory, including food and housing, with a monthly salary of more than 7,000 yuan. During peak production periods, the drip irrigation belt factory can absorb 80 people from Dongmaidi Village and nearby villages.
 The characteristic industries of rural areas are developing and growing, and the 'local specialties' bring fire to the villagers.
 Yatur Village, Heiyingshan Township, Baicheng County is a national 'one village, one product' demonstration village. The 'oil chicken' in the village is a specialty and is included in the National Livestock and Poultry Genetic Resources List.
 'I bought the chicken seedlings from an oil chicken breeding company, and then the company bought them back when I grew up. As soon as I got in and out, I could make a lot of money.' Villager Dawut Amuti said that in one year, he earned more than 30,000 yuan just by raising oil chickens.
 At present, 13 villages in Heiyingshan Township have begun to develop the oil chicken industry, which not only solves the employment of more than 100 rural surplus labor, but also drives the rapid development of the catering industry.
 Rural construction is advancing in depth, and homes are becoming more harmonious and beautiful
 'I demolished the long-term useless sheepfold and hut next to the house and changed it into an orchard, vegetable garden, and garden. You see, my yard is not very beautiful.' On September 17, Partiguli Awuti, a villager in Azhik Village, Tuwanke Abu Laixi, Baishtugman Township, Aksu City, told his neighbors who came to visit.
 This year, Aksu City continues to further promote the creation of 'beautiful courtyards' in rural areas, and the Aksu City Women's Federation guides rural women to actively participate. The beautiful courtyard of Patiguli Awuti's house is a vivid microcosm of the work of creating the 'Beautiful Courtyard' in Aksu City.
 In recent years, relevant departments across Xinjiang have carried out solid rural construction actions to build livable, livable and beautiful villages. The appearance of the vast countryside is changing with each passing day, showing a new atmosphere of rural revitalization in Xinjiang.
 On September 20, Tik Azek Town, Gongliu County, Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture held a mass literary and artistic exhibition "Celebrating the Harvest, Welcoming the National Day, and Appreciating Intangible Cultural Heritage", with the picture of the performance. Photo by Du Lina
 Improve the completeness of infrastructure and make the countryside livable and suitable for business.
 On September 15, the Bohu County Ring Bosten Lake Highway was officially opened to traffic. There is a lot of traffic on the road, and people drive or go to vegetable picking gardens to pick, or go to farmhouses to have a meal. This highway is the road for farmers along the route to increase their income and become rich.
 'The road conditions used to be bad, but our farmhouse business was relatively light.' Maimaiti Abibula, a villager in Kerimukhar Village, Tawenjueken Township, Bohu County, said that in just a few days since the opening of the road around the lake, the number of tourists in the farmhouse has increased significantly, and he is busy and preparing to expand the scale next year.
 'The village is beautiful and the days are better.' In the cultural square of Dolbuzin Village, Nilek Town, Nilek County, Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture, the villagers sang and danced every day, which was very lively.
 Rural revitalization must not only make farmers' pockets bigger and bigger, but also make life better and better. In recent years, Nilek County has strengthened the construction of rural public cultural service facilities, and rural squares and rural cultural activity centers have become good places for farmers and herdsmen to relax.
 In Jiang'amaili Village, Uzan Town, Nilek County, villager Nadira Enivar will bring her children to the newly built cultural activity room when she has free time. She said: 'The warm winter and cool summer environment here is good. Children have books to read. Adults can exercise, sing and dance, listen to lectures and watch exhibitions. We are all very happy.'
 Source: Pomegranate Cloud/Xinjiang Daily
 (First instance: Luo Jianglong Second instance: Liu Le Third instance: Shi Wei)

title: 德国恢复所有陆地边界管控措施 一度造成边境道路拥堵
summary: 4JTOXdckCQs world.huanqiu.com article 德国恢复所有陆地边界管控措施 一度造成边境道路拥堵 /e3pmh22ph/e3pmh2398 当地时间16日， 德国政府宣布其所有陆地边界实施管控措施，恢复护照检查，以限制非法移民入境 。据了解，这一管控措施为期6个月，到期后可能延期。 该措施导致从波兰一侧往德国方向的道路出现严重拥堵。 总台记者 沃龙： 目前我所在的位置...
text: 4JTOXdckCQs world.huanqiu.com article 德国恢复所有陆地边界管控措施 一度造成边境道路拥堵 /e3pmh22ph/e3pmh2398 当地时间16日， 德国政府宣布其所有陆地边界实施管控措施，恢复护照检查，以限制非法移民入境 。据了解，这一管控措施为期6个月，到期后可能延期。 该措施导致从波兰一侧往德国方向的道路出现严重拥堵。 总台记者 沃龙： 目前我所在的位置是波兰边境城市斯武比采，16日德国政府正式宣布全面恢复陆地边境的护照检查制度。从我身后的奥得河边境桥，大家可以看出从波兰一侧前往德国的车辆开始排起了长队并且缓慢前行，而从德国一侧往波兰方向的道路目前是畅通无阻。 德国政府表示，实施这一管控措施是为了限制非法移民、应对潜在的恐怖主义威胁和跨境犯罪等问题，以保护德国的安全。然而，这一措施对波兰一侧民众的生活造成了极大不便。许多波兰居民需要每天到德国一侧工作、学习，严重的交通拥堵让他们开始抱怨起来。 波兰居民 丹尼尔： 由于有很多非法移民想进入德国，最初德国在主要的边境入口实施了管控，但现在管控扩展到了德国全境。在一定程度上需要这样的限制，但限制措施让很多货运卡车在高速公路口岸出现拥堵。目前我们市区里的口岸桥也出现了拥堵现象，人们已经开始抱怨起来了。 总台记者 沃龙： 从我身后的卡车长龙不难看出，德国政府的边境管控政策已经严重影响了申根区自由往来的便利性。究其原因，非法移民已经成为欧洲多个国家亟需解决的问题，而德国政府的政策能否奏效，有待我们进一步观察。 1726541710147 责编：魏少璞 央视新闻客户端 1726541710147 1 1 [] 4JQER6jEVN1 学习进行时｜'让黄河成为造福人民的幸福河'—— 4JOhy1dmG1x translated_summary: 4JTOXdckCQs world.huanqiu.com article Germany resumes all land border control measures, causing border road congestion /e3pmh22ph/e3pmh2398 Local time on the 16th, the German government announced that all its land borders will implement control measures and resume passport checks to restrict the entry of illegal immigrants. It is understood that this control measure is for 6 months and may be extended after expiration. The measure caused serious congestion on the road from the Polish side to Germany. CCTV reporter Wo Long: I am currently in the Polish border city of Slubice. On the 16th, the German government officially announced the full restoration of the passport inspection system at the land border. From the Oder River border bridge behind me, you can see that the vehicles from the Polish side to Germany have begun to line up and move slowly, while the road from the German side to Poland is currently unobstructed. The German government said that the implementation of this control measure is to restrict illegal immigration, respond to potential terrorist threats and cross-border crimes, and protect Germany's security. However, this measure has caused great inconvenience to the lives of the people on the Polish side. Many Polish residents need to go to the German side to work and study every day, and the serious traffic congestion has caused them to complain. Polish resident Daniel: Because there are many illegal immigrants who want to enter Germany, Germany initially implemented controls at the main border entrances, but now the controls have been extended to the entire territory of Germany. Such restrictions are necessary to a certain extent, but the restrictions have caused many freight trucks to be congested at the highway ports. At present, there is also congestion at the port bridge in our urban area, and people have begun to complain. CCTV reporter Wo Long: It is not difficult to see from the long line of trucks behind me that the German government’s border control policy has seriously affected the convenience of free travel in the Schengen area. The reason is that illegal immigration has become a problem that many European countries need to solve urgently, and whether the German government’s policy can work remains to be further observed. title: 北京中轴线地铁2号线专列上线运营
summary: 北京中轴线地铁2号线专列上线运营。北京地铁供图 北京中轴线地铁2号线专列上线运营。北京地铁供图 中新网北京9月7日电 为庆祝北京中轴线申遗成功，传播北京中轴线历史文化，'古都映像地铁行'北京中轴线地铁2号线专列发车启动仪式暨北京中轴线地铁纪念票捐赠仪式7日举办。 发车仪式上，北京市政府参事室参事于平阐述了北京中轴线成为世界文化遗产对首都发展的重要意义，并表示中轴线专列不仅是一次创意的呈现，更是对文...
text: 北京中轴线地铁2号线专列上线运营。北京地铁供图 北京中轴线地铁2号线专列上线运营。北京地铁供图 中新网北京9月7日电 为庆祝北京中轴线申遗成功，传播北京中轴线历史文化，'古都映像地铁行'北京中轴线地铁2号线专列发车启动仪式暨北京中轴线地铁纪念票捐赠仪式7日举办。 发车仪式上，北京市政府参事室参事于平阐述了北京中轴线成为世界文化遗产对首都发展的重要意义，并表示中轴线专列不仅是一次创意的呈现，更是对文化遗产的尊重与传承。 北京地铁运营公司副总经理贾建平表示，北京地铁2号线环线与北京城区二环路重叠，与南北交通大动脉8号线组合成一个'中'字，继北京中轴线地铁8号线专列于今年2月开通后，今天又开通了地铁2号线专列，这与北京中轴线承载的中国传统文化不谋而合，充分展现了古代都城的历史文化、景观韵律与壮美秩序。 本次推出的北京中轴线地铁2号线专列以北京中轴线的15个遗产点的典型建筑和历史文化为基础，将空间秩序纳入时间的轨道，利用地铁空间的连续性与整体性，对北京中轴线历史文化景观进行镜像式表现，体现了人文与自然、时间与空间、传统与现代的完美统一。北京中轴线地铁2号线专列的设计方案由北京建筑大学建筑与城市规划学院的设计团队共同创作完成。北京中轴线地铁2号线专列运行时间为2024年9月7日—2025年3月7日。 本次活动中，北京地铁推出了13款北京中轴线文化地铁票卡，票卡以北京中轴线代表性建筑为设计原型，采用写实设计和装饰手法展现了北京中轴线风貌。同时，北京地铁公司将地铁票卡套装捐赠给北京京企北京中轴线保护公益基金会，助力北京中轴线文化遗产保护与传承。 为进一步增强乘客的参与感和体验感，北京地铁公司于9月7日13时至17时，在鼓楼大街站投放了北京中轴线系列文化展板和中轴文化遗产特色印章，供乘客打卡集章和感受北京中轴文化，还可以通过微信扫码线上观看'云上中轴'展览，进行多方位、多角度、多层次的深入体验北京中轴文化。 自2024年年初以来，北京京企中轴线保护公益基金会联手'中腾基金'和腾讯数字文化实验室，与北京地铁运营公司相继打造了北京中轴线地铁8号线、2号线专列，并通过北京中轴线文化地铁票卡发行、印章打卡等活动形式，加强了对北京中轴线文化遗产价值的宣传与推广，为乘客提供了高品质的出行服务和出行体验。(完) 【 编辑:刘文曦 】
translated_summary:
Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 2 special train is online and operational. Beijing subway pictures
 The special train of Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 2 is online for operation. Beijing subway pictures
 China News Service, Beijing, September 7 (Xinhua) In order to celebrate the successful application of the Beijing Central Axis for World Heritage and spread the history and culture of the Beijing Central Axis, the 'Ancient Capital Image Subway Line' special train launch ceremony of Beijing Central Axis Subway Line 2 and the donation ceremony of Beijing Central Axis Subway Commemorative Ticket were held on the 7th.
 At the departure ceremony, Yu Ping, counselor of the Counselor's Office of the Beijing Municipal Government, elaborated on the importance of Beijing's central axis becoming a world cultural heritage to the development of the capital, and said that the central axis train is not only a creative presentation, but also a respect and inheritance of cultural heritage.
 Jia Jianping, deputy general manager of Beijing Metro Operation Company, said that the Beijing Metro Line 2 ring line overlaps with the Beijing Urban Second Ring Road and is combined with the North-South Transportation Artery Line 8 to form a 'middle' character. Following the Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 8 special train After opening in February this year, a special train for Metro Line 2 was opened today This coincides with the traditional Chinese culture carried by the central axis of Beijing, fully demonstrating the history, culture, landscape rhythm and magnificent order of the ancient capital.
 The Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 2 special train launched this time is based on the typical architecture and history and culture of the 15 heritage points on the Beijing Central Axis, integrating spatial order into the track of time, and using the continuity and integrity of the subway space to improve Beijing The central axis historical and cultural landscape is mirrored, reflecting humanity and nature, time and space The perfect unity of tradition and modernity. The design plan for the Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 2 was jointly created by the design team of the School of Architecture and Urban Planning of Beijing University of Architecture and Architecture. The special train operation time of Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 2 is September 7, 2024 — March 7, 2025.
 In this event, Beijing Metro launched 13 Beijing Central Axis Cultural Subway Ticket Cards. The ticket cards are designed based on representative buildings on the Beijing Central Axis and use realistic design and decoration techniques to show the style of the Beijing Central Axis. At the same time, the Beijing Subway Company donated the subway ticket card set to the Beijing Central Axis Protection Charity Foundation, a Beijing-based company, to help protect and inherit the cultural heritage of the Beijing Central Axis.
 In order to further enhance passengers' sense of participation and experience, the Beijing Metro Company launched the Beijing Central Axis series of cultural exhibition boards and Central Axis cultural heritage characteristic seals at Gulou Street Station from 13:00 to 17:00 on September 7, for passengers to check in and collect stamps and Feel the Beijing Central Axis culture, and you can also watch the 'Cloud Central Axis' exhibition through the WeChat QR code scanning line for multi-faceted, multi-faceted, Experience Beijing’s central axis culture in depth from multiple angles and levels.
 Since the beginning of 2024, the Beijing Beijing Enterprise Central Axis Protection Charity Foundation has joined forces with the 'Zhongteng Fund' and Tencent Digital Culture Laboratory to build special trains for Beijing Central Axis Metro Line 8 and Line 2 with Beijing Metro Operation Company, and through Beijing Central Axis Cultural Metro ticket card issuance, seal check-in and other activities It has strengthened the publicity and promotion of the cultural heritage value of Beijing's central axis and provided passengers with high-quality travel services and travel experiences. ( Finished )
 【 editor: Liu Wenxi 】

title: 科技强国建设扎实推进（奋进强国路 阔步新征程）
summary: 累计建成基站近400万个，5G移动电话用户达9.5亿户，建成全球规模最大、技术领先的5G网络，用户普及率超过60%——这是中国5G发展的速度； 标准必要专利声明量全球占比达42%，向国际标准化组织提交文稿超过16万篇——这是中国5G创新的高度； 从珠穆朗玛峰海拔6500米前进营地到新疆塔里木油田万米深井，一座座5G基站跨越山河、联通广袤天地——这是中国5G覆盖的广度； 数字工厂、智能矿山、远程医疗...
text: 累计建成基站近400万个，5G移动电话用户达9.5亿户，建成全球规模最大、技术领先的5G网络，用户普及率超过60%——这是中国5G发展的速度； 标准必要专利声明量全球占比达42%，向国际标准化组织提交文稿超过16万篇——这是中国5G创新的高度； 从珠穆朗玛峰海拔6500米前进营地到新疆塔里木油田万米深井，一座座5G基站跨越山河、联通广袤天地——这是中国5G覆盖的广度； 数字工厂、智能矿山、远程医疗、线上课堂，97个国民经济大类中的七成以上用上了5G——这是中国5G应用的深度…… 5G助力加快实现高水平科技自立自强，为高质量发展注入新动能，也折射出我国科技事业的蓬勃发展和巨大成就。 习近平总书记强调：'中国式现代化要靠科技现代化作支撑，实现高质量发展要靠科技创新培育新动能。' 科技兴则民族兴，科技强则国家强。新中国成立75年来特别是党的十八大以来，我国科技事业取得历史性成就、发生历史性变革，进入创新型国家行列，建设科技强国的基础更加坚实。 基础前沿领域重大原创成果持续涌现 习近平总书记指出：'加强基础研究，是实现高水平科技自立自强的迫切要求，是建设世界科技强国的必由之路。' 基础研究的地基打得牢，科技事业大厦才能建得高。 把一篇23页的数学论文转化为全球领先的5G技术，需要付出多少努力？华为给出的答案是：超过1万人奋斗15年。 坚持创新耕耘，华为把基础研究成果变成技术和标准，掌握了大规模天线阵列、全息波束赋形、网络切片等关键技术，研制出世界领先的产品。 基础研究是科技创新的源头活水。如今，华为每年在基础研究领域的投入在200亿元以上，在全球建立了26个研发能力中心，拥有700多位数学家、800多位物理学家、120多位化学家，基础研究各领域专家达到6000多人。 根深才能叶茂，源远方能流长。党的十八大以来，我国坚持'四个面向'，持续加强基础研究，为创新发展提供基础理论支撑和技术源头供给。2023年，我国基础研究经费支出增长9.3%，基础研究投入占全社会研发经费比重连续5年超过6%。 新时代以来，我国科研人员在基础前沿领域取得一批重大原创成果：'中国天眼'等大国重器接连取得世界级发现，化学小分子诱导人体细胞实现重编程，二氧化碳人工合成淀粉实现'技术造物'……科技事业大厦的底座日益夯实，国家科技创新的底蕴和后劲更加充实。 关键核心技术攻关能力不断提升 习近平总书记强调：'要充分发挥市场在科技资源配置中的决定性作用，更好发挥政府各方面作用，调动产学研各环节的积极性，形成共促关键核心技术攻关的工作格局。' 当全球5G定义还处在'十字路口'时，对于'5G是什么？它的愿景、需求、网络体系架构什么样'等问题，中国科技人员已做了深入研究。 2013年2月，依托'新一代宽带无线移动通信网'国家科技重大专项，我国成立了由产学研用各方组成的5G推进组（IMT—2020推进组），承担起推动5G技术研发、验证技术方案、支撑国际标准制定的重要使命。 '我们持续开展关键技术征集与评估，9个指标中有8个被纳入国际标准，为全球统一5G标准提供了有力支撑。'中国通信标准化协会理事长闻库说。 5G研发攻关过程中，我国不仅攻克大规模天线等基础技术，还在网络架构、灵活空口等系统设计方面实现了主导，为5G发展奠定了坚实的基础；以华为、中兴为代表的厂商在加快自身技术创新的同时，带动上下游厂商攻克一系列技术和产业化难关，推动网络、基站、芯片、器件、终端等产品加速成熟。 '以应用带动系统，以系统带动设备，以设备带动终端，以终端带动芯片，把整个产业链的上下游串联了起来，实现了从算法、关键技术、标准、产品到应用的全链条多项关键技术的突破。'中国工程院院士邬贺铨说。 关键核心技术是国之重器，必须牢牢掌握在自己手里。我们要建成的科技强国，必须具备的基本要素之一就是'拥有强大的关键核心技术攻关能力，有力支撑高质量发展和高水平安全'。 近年来，通过关键核心技术攻关，我国铸就了一批'国之重器'：白鹤滩水电站全力运转；伶仃洋上，世界级跨海集群工程深中通道正式开通；集成电路、人工智能等新兴产业蓬勃发展；自主研制15兆瓦重型燃气轮机总装下线；国产大飞机顺利交付运营……一系列拥有自主知识产权、具有战略意义的重大科技成果从图纸变为现实，描画出科技创新活力奔涌的时代图景。 创新驱动高质量发展取得新成效 习近平总书记指出：'扎实推动科技创新和产业创新深度融合，助力发展新质生产力。' 清晨，一架无人机从浙江舟山的渔船上起飞，1小时后就将上百斤重的鲜活海鱼运送到上海。通过多频协同、低空覆盖优化等手段，5G网络覆盖这条上百公里的低空物流航线，对无人机的高度、位置、轨迹动态等进行实时感知、精准监测，为低空经济发展提供通信保障。 从'建得好'到'用得好'，5G不仅成为支撑经济社会数字化、智能化转型的关键基础设施，更成为国民经济的先导性、引领性产业，为推进高质量发展注入了强劲动能。 自动化生产线上，5G带来稳定的无线连接，使机械臂运行更快更稳；5G的大带宽和低时延等特点，使远程手术更加精准；自动驾驶示范区内，5G让车、路、网实现高度协同；4K/8K超清视频等应用不断丰富，点亮智慧新生活……5G与各行各业互联深度融合，'一业带百业'的作用不断彰显。 放眼今天的中国，高性能装备、智能机器人等，有力推动着产业转型升级；一批水稻、小麦、玉米新品种创制成功，可再生能源总装机历史性地超越火电，支撑发展和保障安全的创新战略格局不断形成……2013年至2023年，我国规模以上装备制造业、高技术制造业增加值年均分别增长8.7%、10.3%，战略性新兴产业发展壮大，未来产业谋篇布局，以高科技、高效能、高质量为特征的新质生产力加快发展。 充分认识科技的战略先导地位和根本支撑作用，锚定2035年建成科技强国的战略目标，鼓足干劲、团结奋斗，我国科技创新事业必将再创辉煌，为中国式现代化提供强大科技支撑。 《 人民日报 》（ 2024年09月23日 01 版）
translated_summary: Nearly 4 million base stations have been built, 950 million 5G mobile phone users have been built, the world's largest and most technologically advanced 5G network has been built, and the user penetration rate has exceeded 60% - this is the speed of China's 5G development; The number of standard essential patent declarations accounts for 42% of the world, and more than 160,000 manuscripts have been submitted to the International Organization for Standardization - this is the height of China's 5G innovation; From the 6,500-meter-high forward camp on Mount Everest to the 10,000-meter-deep well of the Tarim Oilfield in Xinjiang, 5G base stations span mountains and rivers and connect the vast world - this is the breadth of China's 5G coverage; Digital factories, smart mines, telemedicine, online classes, more than 70% of the 97 major categories of the national economy use 5G - this is the depth of China's 5G application... 5G helps accelerate the realization of high-level scientific and technological self-reliance and self-improvement, injects new impetus into high-quality development, and also reflects the vigorous development and great achievements of my country's science and technology. General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: "Chinese-style modernization must be supported by scientific and technological modernization, and the realization of high-quality development must rely on scientific and technological innovation to cultivate new momentum. "If science and technology prosper, the nation will prosper, and if science and technology are strong, the country will be strong. Over the past 75 years since the founding of the People's Republic of China, especially since the 18th CPC National Congress, my country's science and technology has achieved historic achievements and undergone historic changes. China has entered the ranks of innovative countries, and the foundation for building a strong country in science and technology has become more solid. Major original achievements in basic frontier fields continue to emerge General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: "Strengthening basic research is an urgent requirement for achieving high-level scientific and technological self-reliance and is the only way to build a world power in science and technology." Only when the foundation of basic research is solid can the building of science and technology be built high. How much effort does it take to transform a 23-page math paper into the world's leading 5G technology? Huawei's answer is: more than 10,000 people worked hard for 15 years. Adhering to innovation and hard work, Huawei has turned basic research results into technology and standards, mastered key technologies such as large-scale antenna arrays, holographic beamforming, and network slicing, and developed world-leading products. Basic research is the source of scientific and technological innovation. Today, Huawei invests more than 20 billion yuan in basic research every year, has established 26 R&D centers around the world, has more than 700 mathematicians, more than 800 physicists, more than 120 chemists, and more than 6,000 experts in various fields of basic research. Only with deep roots can the leaves flourish, and only with distant sources can the flow be long. Since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, my country has adhered to the "four orientations" and continued to strengthen basic research to provide basic theoretical support and technical source supply for innovative development. In 2023, my country's basic research expenditure increased by 9.3%, and the proportion of basic research investment in the total social R&D expenditure exceeded 6% for five consecutive years. Since the new era, Chinese researchers have made a number of major original achievements in basic frontier fields: "China Sky Eye" and other major national weapons have made world-class discoveries one after another, chemical small molecules induce human cells to achieve reprogramming, and carbon dioxide artificial synthesis of starch achieves "technological creation"... The foundation of the science and technology building is becoming increasingly solid, and the foundation and stamina of national scientific and technological innovation are becoming more substantial. The ability to tackle key core technologies continues to improve General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: "We must give full play to the decisive role of the market in the allocation of scientific and technological resources, better play the role of all aspects of the government, mobilize the enthusiasm of all links of industry, academia and research, and form a working pattern to jointly promote the research and development of key core technologies." When the global definition of 5G is still at a "crossroads", Chinese scientific and technological personnel have conducted in-depth research on issues such as "What is 5G? What is its vision, demand, and network architecture?" In February 2013, relying on the national major science and technology project "New Generation Broadband Wireless Mobile Communication Network", my country established a 5G Promotion Group (IMT-2020 Promotion Group) composed of industry, academia, research and application parties, and assumed the important mission of promoting 5G technology research and development, verifying technical solutions, and supporting the formulation of international standards. "We continue to collect and evaluate key technologies, and 8 of the 9 indicators have been included in international standards, providing strong support for the global unified 5G standards." Wen Ku, chairman of the China Communications Standards Association, said. In the process of 5G research and development, my country has not only overcome basic technologies such as large-scale antennas, but also achieved dominance in system design such as network architecture and flexible air interface, laying a solid foundation for the development of 5G; while accelerating their own technological innovation, manufacturers represented by Huawei and ZTE have driven upstream and downstream manufacturers to overcome a series of technical and industrialization difficulties, and promoted the accelerated maturity of products such as networks, base stations, chips, devices, and terminals. "Applications drive systems, systems drive equipment, equipment drives terminals, and terminals drive chips, connecting the upstream and downstream of the entire industrial chain, and achieving breakthroughs in multiple key technologies in the entire chain from algorithms, key technologies, standards, products to applications." Wu Hequan, an academician of the Chinese Academy of Engineering, said. Key core technologies are the country's heavy weapons and must be firmly in our own hands. One of the basic elements that we must have to build a strong country in science and technology is to have a strong ability to tackle key core technologies and strongly support high-quality development and high-level security. In recent years, through the research and development of key core technologies, my country has created a number of "national heavy equipment": the Baihetan Hydropower Station is in full operation; the world-class cross-sea cluster project Shenzhen-Zhongshan Channel has been officially opened on the Lingdingyang; emerging industries such as integrated circuits and artificial intelligence are booming; the independently developed 15-megawatt heavy-duty gas turbine has been assembled and rolled off the assembly line; domestic large aircraft have been successfully delivered and put into operation... A series of major scientific and technological achievements with independent intellectual property rights and strategic significance have been transformed from drawings into reality, depicting the era of surging vitality of scientific and technological innovation. Innovation-driven high-quality development has achieved new results. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: "Solidly promote the deep integration of scientific and technological innovation and industrial innovation, and help develop new quality productivity." In the early morning, a drone took off from a fishing boat in Zhoushan, Zhejiang, and delivered hundreds of kilograms of fresh sea fish to Shanghai in an hour. Through multi-frequency coordination and low-altitude coverage optimization, the 5G network covers this low-altitude logistics route of hundreds of kilometers, and conducts real-time perception and precise monitoring of the altitude, position, trajectory dynamics, etc. of the drone, providing communication guarantee for the development of low-altitude economy. From "well-built" to "well-used", 5G has not only become a key infrastructure to support the digital and intelligent transformation of the economy and society, but also a leading industry in the national economy, injecting strong momentum into the promotion of high-quality development. On the automated production line, 5G brings stable wireless connections, making the robot arms run faster and more stable; 5G's large bandwidth and low latency make remote surgery more precise; in the autonomous driving demonstration area, 5G enables vehicles, roads, and networks to achieve a high degree of coordination; 4K/8K ultra-clear video and other applications are constantly enriched, lighting up a new smart life... 5G is deeply integrated with all walks of life, and the role of "one industry leading a hundred industries" is constantly demonstrated. Looking at China today, high-performance equipment, intelligent robots, etc. are vigorously promoting industrial transformation and upgrading; a number of new varieties of rice, wheat and corn have been successfully created, and the total installed capacity of renewable energy has historically surpassed thermal power. An innovative strategic pattern that supports development and ensures safety is constantly taking shape... From 2013 to 2023, the added value of my country's equipment manufacturing industry and high-tech manufacturing industry above designated size will increase by 8.7% and 10.3% respectively on average per year. Strategic emerging industries will develop and grow, and future industries will be planned and laid out. New quality productivity characterized by high technology, high efficiency and high quality will accelerate its development. We must fully recognize the strategic leading position and fundamental supporting role of science and technology, anchor the strategic goal of building a strong country in science and technology by 2035, work hard and unite to strive, and my country's scientific and technological innovation will surely create new glories and provide strong scientific and technological support for Chinese-style modernization. "People's Daily" (Page 01, September 23, 2024)

title: 外媒：Meta宣布禁止'今日俄罗斯'等俄媒使用旗下应用平台

text: 4JTSMCPvuqw 作者：姜蔼玲 world.huanqiu.com article 外媒：Meta宣布禁止'今日俄罗斯'等俄媒使用旗下应用平台 /e3pmh22ph/e3pmh26vv 【环球网报道】据路透社报道，美国脸书母公司Meta当地时间16日宣布，将禁止'今日俄罗斯'国际新闻通讯社（Rossiya Segodnya）、'今日俄罗斯'电视台（RT）等俄罗斯官方媒体使用旗下应用平台。 报道称，根据该公司说法，禁止这些俄媒使用脸书平台的理由是'使用欺骗性手段在网上实施秘密影响行动'。路透社称，这一禁令标志着这家全球最大社交媒体公司针对俄罗斯官方媒体方面的行动急剧升级。 报道称，Meta在一份书面声明中写道，'经过慎重考虑，我们扩大了对俄罗斯国家媒体机构持续执行（有关措施的）范围。'今日俄罗斯'国际新闻通讯社、RT及其他相关实体因涉外干扰活动，现已被禁止在全球范围内使用我们的应用平台。' 报道称，Meta还提到，这项禁令将在未来几天内实施。除了脸书，Meta旗下应用平台还包括Instagram、WhatsApp、Threads。 路透社称，俄罗斯大使馆未立即回应置评请求，白宫拒绝对此发表评论。 据法新社9月13日报道，美国国务卿布林肯13日指责俄罗斯媒体机构'今日俄罗斯'电视台是'俄罗斯情报机构事实上的分支'，被用来'对付世界各国'。'今日俄罗斯'电视台总编辑西蒙尼扬说，在布林肯向记者发表上述讲话之前，她正'拿着爆米花等待'。她在社交平台'电报'上说：'美国国务院将宣布我们是世界上最好的间谍。作好准备。'另据俄罗斯卫星社补充，西蒙尼扬在回应美国新制裁时还表示，她'没有白活'。 translated_summary: 4JTSMCPvuqw Author: Jiang Ai Ling world.huanqiu.com article Foreign media: Meta announced that it would ban Russian media such as "Russia Today" from using its application platform /e3pmh22ph/e3pmh26vv [Global Network Report] According to Reuters, Meta, the parent company of Facebook in the United States, announced on the 16th that it would ban Russian official media such as "Russia Today" International News Agency (Rossiya Segodnya) and "Russia Today" TV (RT) from using its application platform. The report said that according to the company, the reason for banning these Russian media from using the Facebook platform is "using deceptive means to carry out secret influence operations online." Reuters said that this ban marks a sharp escalation of the actions of the world's largest social media company against Russian official media. According to the report, Meta wrote in a written statement, "After careful consideration, we have expanded the scope of the continued implementation of (relevant measures) against Russian state media organizations. "Russia Today" International News Agency, RT and other related entities have been banned from using our application platform worldwide due to foreign interference activities. ' Meta also mentioned that the ban will be implemented in the next few days, according to the report. In addition to Facebook, Meta's application platforms also include Instagram, WhatsApp, and Threads. Reuters said that the Russian Embassy did not immediately respond to a request for comment, and the White House declined to comment. According to AFP on September 13, US Secretary of State Blinken accused the Russian media agency "Russia Today" TV station on the 13th of being a "de facto branch of the Russian intelligence agency" and being used "to deal with countries around the world." Simonyan, editor-in-chief of "Russia Today" TV station, said that before Blinken made the above speech to reporters, she was "waiting with popcorn." She said on the social platform "Telegram": "The US State Department will declare that we are the best spies in the world. Be prepared. "According to the Russian Satellite News Agency, Simonyan also said in response to the new US sanctions that she "did not live in vain." 1726548117269 Global Network Copyright Works, without written authorization, reprinting or mirroring is strictly prohibited, and violators will be held accountable for legal liability. title: 让退役军人成为全社会尊重的人（金台点兵）
summary: 退役军人是党和国家的宝贵财富，是推进中国式现代化的重要力量，退役军人工作事关改革发展稳定和强军兴军事业。 今年'八一'前夕，全国退役军人工作会议在北京召开。习近平总书记对退役军人工作作出重要指示强调，'切实把退役军人接收安置好、服务保障好、教育管理好、作用发挥好、权益维护好，让军人成为全社会尊崇的职业、让退役军人成为全社会尊重的人。'谆谆嘱托，充分体现了对退役军人工作的高度重视和对广大退役军人的亲...
text: 退役军人是党和国家的宝贵财富，是推进中国式现代化的重要力量，退役军人工作事关改革发展稳定和强军兴军事业。 今年'八一'前夕，全国退役军人工作会议在北京召开。习近平总书记对退役军人工作作出重要指示强调，'切实把退役军人接收安置好、服务保障好、教育管理好、作用发挥好、权益维护好，让军人成为全社会尊崇的职业、让退役军人成为全社会尊重的人。'谆谆嘱托，充分体现了对退役军人工作的高度重视和对广大退役军人的亲切关怀。 日前，国务院、中央军委公布《退役军人安置条例》，自2024年9月1日起施行。《条例》从工作机制、安置方式、工作流程和待遇保障等方面，对退役军人安置作出明确规定。一字一句，令人暖心。 做好退役军人工作，是我们党一以贯之的优良传统。党的十八大以来，退役军人工作不断开拓新局面，组织管理体系不断健全，工作运行体系不断完善，政策制度体系不断加强，退役军人的获得感、幸福感、荣誉感成色更足、更可持续。 来自党和政府的关心温暖、来自社会的尊重关爱，化作千千万万退役军人永葆本色、矢志奋斗的力量。 由9名退役老兵组成的新疆且末县老兵治沙队，迎战漫漫黄沙，努力学习技术，提高树苗成活率，为且末群众安居乐业筑起绿色屏障；扎根基层，河南临颍县公安局党委委员兼驻村民警陈晓磐骑着摩托车服务群众，足迹遍布全乡近9000户人家，及时帮助群众解决难题；中国科学院南海海洋研究所二级研究员尚晓东，从一名部队院校教员成长为物理海洋学者，带领团队研制出高速响应的'海洋探测快速温度传感器'……我们看到，在基层治理、乡村振兴、创新创业等重要阵地上，一批批退役军人大展身手、大有作为，用实际行动书写着退役军人的使命担当。 脱下军装，他们永葆军人本色，在新的人生阶段踔厉奋发、勇往直前；走出军营，他们牢记使命担当，在祖国需要的地方扎根坚守、无私奉献。 做好退役军人工作，肩负着党和人民的殷切期待，关系着广大退役军人切身利益，必将激发广大现役官兵保家卫国的军心士气，激励更多有志青年投身国防和军队建设。 可喜的是，近年来，各级党委和政府用心用情用力做好退役军人工作，为退役军人在新的岗位上干事创业创造条件、搭建舞台。'阳光安置'工作机制进一步健全，转业军官'直通车'安置不断拓展，机关、群团组织、事业单位和国有企业安置安排工作退役士兵比例持续优化；签约合作近2万家企业，累计为退役军人提供近130万个优质岗位；举办两届全国退役军人创业创新大赛，1.5万余个创业项目，逾4万名退役军人参与……在各项政策的支持下，广大退役军人正以多种方式走上新的'战位'，继续发光发热。 满腔热忱为退役军人服务，把党和国家对退役军人的关心关爱落到实处，必将激励广大退役军人爱国奉献、奋发有为，为以中国式现代化全面推进强国建设、民族复兴伟业作出新的更大贡献。 《 人民日报 》（ 2024年09月01日 05 版）
translated_summary: Veterans are the precious wealth of the Party and the country, and an important force in promoting China's modernization. Veteran work is related to reform, development, stability and the cause of strengthening the army. On the eve of August 1 this year, the National Veteran Work Conference was held in Beijing. General Secretary Xi Jinping made important instructions on the work of veterans, emphasizing that "we must earnestly receive and place veterans, provide good services and guarantees, educate and manage them well, give full play to their roles, and safeguard their rights and interests, so that soldiers can become a profession respected by the whole society and veterans can become people respected by the whole society." The earnest instructions fully reflect the high attention paid to the work of veterans and the kind care for the vast number of veterans. Recently, the State Council and the Central Military Commission promulgated the "Regulations on the Placement of Veterans", which will come into effect on September 1, 2024. The "Regulations" clearly stipulates the placement of veterans in terms of work mechanisms, placement methods, work processes and benefits. Every word is heartwarming. Doing a good job in veteran work is a consistent and fine tradition of our party. Since the 18th CPC National Congress, the work of veterans has continuously opened up new prospects, the organizational management system has been continuously improved, the work operation system has been continuously improved, and the policy and system system has been continuously strengthened, so that the veterans' sense of gain, happiness and honor has become more substantial and sustainable. The care and warmth from the Party and the government, and the respect and care from the society, have become the power for thousands of veterans to maintain their true colors and strive for success. The veterans' desertification control team in Qiemo County, Xinjiang, composed of 9 retired veterans, faced the endless yellow sand, worked hard to learn technology, improved the survival rate of seedlings, and built a green barrier for the people of Qiemo to live and work in peace and contentment; taking root in the grassroots, Chen Xiaopan, a member of the Party Committee of the Public Security Bureau of Linying County, Henan Province and a village policeman, rode a motorcycle to serve the people, and his footprints were all over the township. Nearly 9,000 households helped the people solve problems in a timely manner; Shang Xiaodong, a second-level researcher at the South China Sea Institute of Oceanology, Chinese Academy of Sciences, grew from a military college instructor to a physical oceanographer, and led the team to develop a high-speed response "fast temperature sensor for ocean detection"... We have seen that in important positions such as grassroots governance, rural revitalization, innovation and entrepreneurship, batches of retired soldiers have shown their skills and made great achievements, and written the mission and responsibility of retired soldiers with practical actions. Taking off their military uniforms, they always maintain their military qualities, forge ahead and forge ahead in the new stage of life; leaving the barracks, they keep their mission in mind, take root and persevere in places where the motherland needs them, and make selfless contributions. Doing a good job in veterans' affairs is the earnest expectation of the Party and the people, and is related to the vital interests of the majority of veterans. It will surely inspire the morale of the majority of active officers and soldiers to defend the country, and encourage more aspiring young people to devote themselves to national defense and military construction. Fortunately, in recent years, party committees and governments at all levels have worked hard to do a good job in veterans' affairs, creating conditions and building a stage for veterans to start businesses in new positions. The "sunshine resettlement" work mechanism has been further improved, the "through train" resettlement of retired officers has been continuously expanded, and the proportion of retired soldiers in the resettlement and arrangement of organs, mass organizations, institutions and state-owned enterprises has been continuously optimized; nearly 20,000 companies have signed contracts and provided nearly 1.3 million high-quality jobs for veterans; two national veterans' entrepreneurship and innovation competitions have been held, with more than 15,000 entrepreneurial projects and more than 40,000 veterans participating... With the support of various policies, the majority of veterans are taking up new "battle positions" in various ways and continue to shine. Serving veterans with enthusiasm and putting the care and concern of the Party and the state for veterans into practice will surely inspire the majority of veterans to be patriotic, dedicated, and motivated, and make new and greater contributions to comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation with Chinese-style modernization. "People's Daily" (Page 05, September 1, 2024)

translated_summary: 4JViafjebbf world.huanqiu.com article WHO: The explosion of communication equipment in Lebanon seriously disrupted the country's health system /e3pmh22ph/e3pmh2398 On September 19, local time, the Director-General of the World Health Organization, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, said that the casualties caused by the explosion of communication equipment in Lebanon seriously disrupted the country's already fragile health system. He also said that WHO has distributed medical supplies such as blood bags and first aid kits in the country. On the same day, Mike Ryan, Deputy Director-General of the World Health Organization and Executive Director of the Health Emergency Plan, said that the entire health system in Lebanon is facing and under tremendous pressure. Lebanese Minister of Public Health Firas Abyad said at a press conference on the 19th that the explosion of communication equipment in Lebanon on the 17th and 18th has caused 37 deaths and 2,931 injuries.
